57#define TAB_NAVIGATION_DISABLED
58
59/* Interval for updating the rubberband selection, in milliseconds. */
60#define RUBBERBAND_TIMEOUT_INTERVAL10 10
61
62/* Initial unpositioned icon value */
63#define ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1 -1
64
65/* Timeout for making the icon currently selected for keyboard operation visible.
66 * If this is 0, you can get into trouble with extra scrolling after holding
67 * down the arrow key for awhile when there are many items.
68 */
69#define KEYBOARD_ICON_REVEAL_TIMEOUT10 10
70
71/* Maximum amount of milliseconds the mouse button is allowed to stay down
72 * and still be considered a click.
73 */
74#define MAX_CLICK_TIME1500 1500
75
76/* Button assignments. */
77#define DRAG_BUTTON1 1
78#define RUBBERBAND_BUTTON1 1
79#define MIDDLE_BUTTON2 2
80#define CONTEXTUAL_MENU_BUTTON3 3
81#define DRAG_MENU_BUTTON2 2
82
83/* Maximum size (pixels) allowed for icons at the standard zoom level. */
84#define MINIMUM_IMAGE_SIZE24 24
85#define MAXIMUM_IMAGE_SIZE96 96
86
87#define ICON_PAD_LEFT4 4
88#define ICON_PAD_RIGHT4 4
89
90#define ICON_PAD_TOP4 4
91#define ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4 4
92
93#define CONTAINER_PAD_LEFT4 4
94#define CONTAINER_PAD_RIGHT4 4
95#define CONTAINER_PAD_TOP4 4
96#define CONTAINER_PAD_BOTTOM4 4
97
98#define STANDARD_ICON_GRID_WIDTH155 155
99
100/* Desktop layout mode defines */
101#define DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 10
102#define DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 10
103#define SNAP_SIZE_X78 78
104#define SNAP_SIZE_Y20 20
105
106/* If icon size is bigger than this, request large embedded text.
107 * Its selected so that the non-large text should fit in "normal" icon sizes
108 */
109#define ICON_SIZE_FOR_LARGE_EMBEDDED_TEXT55 55
110
111#define SNAP_HORIZONTAL(func,x)((func ((double)((x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10) ((func ((double)((x) - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_X78) * SNAP_SIZE_X78) + DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10)
112#define SNAP_VERTICAL(func, y)((func ((double)((y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10) ((func ((double)((y) - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_Y20) * SNAP_SIZE_Y20) + DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10)
113
114#define SNAP_NEAREST_HORIZONTAL(x)((eel_round ((double)((x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10) SNAP_HORIZONTAL (eel_round, x)((eel_round ((double)((x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10)
115#define SNAP_NEAREST_VERTICAL(y)((eel_round ((double)((y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10) SNAP_VERTICAL (eel_round, y)((eel_round ((double)((y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10)
116
117#define SNAP_CEIL_HORIZONTAL(x)((ceil ((double)((x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10) SNAP_HORIZONTAL (ceil, x)((ceil ((double)((x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10)
118#define SNAP_CEIL_VERTICAL(y)((ceil ((double)((y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10) SNAP_VERTICAL (ceil, y)((ceil ((double)((y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10)
119

230G_DEFINE_TYPE (CajaIconContainer, caja_icon_container, EEL_TYPE_CANVAS)static void caja_icon_container_init (CajaIconContainer *self

*klass); static GType caja_icon_container_get_type_once (void
); static gpointer caja_icon_container_parent_class = ((void*
)0); static gint CajaIconContainer_private_offset; static void
caja_icon_container_class_intern_init (gpointer klass) { caja_icon_container_parent_class
= g_type_class_peek_parent (klass); if (CajaIconContainer_private_offset
!= 0) g_type_class_adjust_private_offset (klass, &CajaIconContainer_private_offset
); caja_icon_container_class_init ((CajaIconContainerClass*) klass
); } __attribute__ ((__unused__)) static inline gpointer caja_icon_container_get_instance_private
(CajaIconContainer *self) { return (((gpointer) ((guint8*) (
self) + (glong) (CajaIconContainer_private_offset)))); } GType
caja_icon_container_get_type (void) { static GType static_g_define_type_id
= 0; if ((__extension__ ({ _Static_assert (sizeof *(&static_g_define_type_id
) == sizeof (gpointer), "Expression evaluates to false"); (void
) (0 ? (gpointer) * (&static_g_define_type_id) : ((void*)
0)); (!(__extension__ ({ _Static_assert (sizeof *(&static_g_define_type_id
) == sizeof (gpointer), "Expression evaluates to false"); __typeof__
(*(&static_g_define_type_id)) gapg_temp_newval; __typeof__
((&static_g_define_type_id)) gapg_temp_atomic = (&static_g_define_type_id
); __atomic_load (gapg_temp_atomic, &gapg_temp_newval, 5)
; gapg_temp_newval; })) && g_once_init_enter_pointer (
&static_g_define_type_id)); })) ) { GType g_define_type_id
= caja_icon_container_get_type_once (); (__extension__ ({ _Static_assert
(sizeof *(&static_g_define_type_id) == sizeof (gpointer)
, "Expression evaluates to false"); 0 ? (void) (*(&static_g_define_type_id
) = (g_define_type_id)) : (void) 0; g_once_init_leave_pointer
((&static_g_define_type_id), (gpointer) (guintptr) (g_define_type_id
)); })) ; } return static_g_define_type_id; } __attribute__ (
(__noinline__)) static GType caja_icon_container_get_type_once

), (GInstanceInitFunc)(void (*)(void)) caja_icon_container_init
, (GTypeFlags) 0); { {{};} } return g_define_type_id; };

232/* The CajaIconContainer signals. */
233enum
234{
235 ACTIVATE,
236 ACTIVATE_ALTERNATE,
237 BAND_SELECT_STARTED,
238 BAND_SELECT_ENDED,
239 BUTTON_PRESS,
240 CAN_ACCEPT_ITEM,
241 CONTEXT_CLICK_BACKGROUND,
242 CONTEXT_CLICK_SELECTION,
243 MIDDLE_CLICK,
244 GET_CONTAINER_URI,
245 GET_ICON_URI,
246 GET_ICON_DROP_TARGET_URI,
247 GET_STORED_ICON_POSITION,
248 ICON_POSITION_CHANGED,
249 GET_STORED_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP,
250 STORE_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP,
251 ICON_TEXT_CHANGED,
252 ICON_STRETCH_STARTED,
253 ICON_STRETCH_ENDED,
254 RENAMING_ICON,
255 LAYOUT_CHANGED,
256 MOVE_COPY_ITEMS,
257 HANDLE_NETSCAPE_URL,

262 SELECTION_CHANGED,
263 ICON_ADDED,
264 ICON_REMOVED,
265 CLEARED,
266 START_INTERACTIVE_SEARCH,
267 LAST_SIGNAL
268};

281/* Functions dealing with CajaIcons. */
282
283static void
284icon_free (CajaIcon *icon)
285{
286 /* Destroy this canvas item; the parent will unref it. */
287 eel_canvas_item_destroy (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
288 g_free (icon);
289}
290
291static gboolean
292icon_is_positioned (const CajaIcon *icon)
293{
294 return icon->x != ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1 && icon->y != ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1;
295}
296
297/* x, y are the top-left coordinates of the icon. */
298static void
299icon_set_position_full (CajaIcon *icon,
300 double x, double y,
301 gboolean force)
302{
303 CajaIconContainer *container;
304 int x1, x2, y1, y2;
305 EelDRect icon_bounds;
306 GdkDisplay *display;
307
308 if (!force && icon->x == x && icon->y == y)
309 {
310 return;
311 }
312
313 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)->canvas)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *
) ((icon->item)))))->canvas)))));
314
315 if (icon == get_icon_being_renamed (container))
316 {
317 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
318 }
319 double pixels_per_unit;
320 int container_left, container_top, container_right, container_bottom;
321 int container_x, container_y, container_width, container_height;
322 int item_width, item_height;
323 int height_above, width_left;
324 int min_x, max_x, min_y, max_y;
325 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_fixed_size (container))
326 {
327 /*Use the older and well tested code in x11*/
328 display = gdk_screen_get_display (gdk_screen_get_default());
329 if (GDK_IS_X11_DISPLAY (display)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(display)); GType __t = ((gdk_x11_display_get_type())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))))
330 {
331 int scale;
332
333 /* FIXME: This should be:
334
335 container_x = GTK_WIDGET (container)->allocation.x;
336 container_width = GTK_WIDGET (container)->allocation.width;
337 container_height = GTK_WIDGET (container)->allocation.height;
338
339 But for some reason the widget allocation is sometimes not done
340 at startup, and the allocation is then only 45x60. which is
341 really bad.
342
343 For now, we have a cheesy workaround:
344 */
345 scale = gtk_widget_get_scale_factor (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
346 container_x = 0;
347 container_y = 0;
348 container_width = WidthOfScreen (gdk_x11_screen_get_xscreen (gdk_screen_get_default ()))((gdk_x11_screen_get_xscreen (gdk_screen_get_default ()))->
width) / scale - container_x
349 - container->details->left_margin
350 - container->details->right_margin;
351 container_height = HeightOfScreen (gdk_x11_screen_get_xscreen (gdk_screen_get_default ()))((gdk_x11_screen_get_xscreen (gdk_screen_get_default ()))->
height) / scale - container_y
352 - container->details->top_margin
353 - container->details->bottom_margin;
354 }
355 else
356 {
357 GdkWindow *window;
358 GdkMonitor *monitor;
359 GdkRectangle workarea = {0};
360
361 window = gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET(container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
362 monitor = gdk_display_get_monitor_at_window (gdk_display_get_default(), window);
363 gdk_monitor_get_workarea(monitor, &workarea);
364 container_x = 0;
365 container_y = 0;
366 container_width = workarea.width - container_x
367 - container->details->left_margin
368 - container->details->right_margin;
369 container_height = workarea.height - container_y
370 - container->details->top_margin
371 - container->details->bottom_margin;
372 }
373
374 pixels_per_unit = EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))))->pixels_per_unit;
375 /* Clip the position of the icon within our desktop bounds */
376 container_left = container_x / pixels_per_unit;
377 container_top = container_y / pixels_per_unit;
378 container_right = container_left + container_width / pixels_per_unit;
379 container_bottom = container_top + container_height / pixels_per_unit;
380
381 icon_get_bounding_box (icon, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2,
382 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM);
383 item_width = x2 - x1;
384 item_height = y2 - y1;
385
386 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
387
388 /* determine icon rectangle relative to item rectangle */
389 height_above = icon_bounds.y0 - y1;
390 width_left = icon_bounds.x0 - x1;
391
392 min_x = container_left + DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + width_left;
393 max_x = container_right - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 - item_width + width_left;
394 x = CLAMP (x, min_x, max_x)(((x) > (max_x)) ? (max_x) : (((x) < (min_x)) ? (min_x)
: (x)));
395
396 min_y = container_top + height_above + DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10;
397 max_y = container_bottom - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 - item_height + height_above;
398 y = CLAMP (y, min_y, max_y)(((y) > (max_y)) ? (max_y) : (((y) < (min_y)) ? (min_y)
: (y)));
399 }
400
401 if (icon->x == ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1)
402 {
403 icon->x = 0;
404 }
405 if (icon->y == ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1)
406 {
407 icon->y = 0;
408 }
409
410 eel_canvas_item_move (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
411 x - icon->x,
412 y - icon->y);
413
414 icon->x = x;
415 icon->y = y;
416}
417
418static void
419icon_set_position (CajaIcon *icon,
420 double x, double y)
421{
422 icon_set_position_full (icon, x, y, FALSE(0));
423}
424
425static void
426icon_get_size (CajaIconContainer *container,
427 CajaIcon *icon,
428 guint *size)
429{
430 if (size != NULL((void*)0))
431 {
432 *size = MAX (caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (container->details->zoom_level)(((caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (container->details->
zoom_level) * icon->scale) > (16)) ? (caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level
(container->details->zoom_level) * icon->scale) : (
16))
433 * icon->scale, CAJA_ICON_SIZE_SMALLEST)(((caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (container->details->
zoom_level) * icon->scale) > (16)) ? (caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level
(container->details->zoom_level) * icon->scale) : (
16));
434 }
435}
436
437/* The icon_set_size function is used by the stretching user
438 * interface, which currently stretches in a way that keeps the aspect
439 * ratio. Later we might have a stretching interface that stretches Y
440 * separate from X and we will change this around.
441 */
442static void
443icon_set_size (CajaIconContainer *container,
444 CajaIcon *icon,
445 guint icon_size,
446 gboolean snap,
447 gboolean update_position)
448{
449 guint old_size;
450 double scale;
451
452 icon_get_size (container, icon, &old_size);
453 if (icon_size == old_size)
454 {
455 return;
456 }
457
458 scale = (double) icon_size /
459 caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level
460 (container->details->zoom_level);
461 caja_icon_container_move_icon (container, icon,
462 icon->x, icon->y,
463 scale, FALSE(0),
464 snap, update_position);
465}
466
467static void
468icon_raise (CajaIcon *icon)
469{
470 EelCanvasItem *item, *band;
471
472 item = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))));
473 band = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (item->canvas)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((item->canvas)))))->details->rubberband_info.selection_rectangle;
474
475 eel_canvas_item_send_behind (item, band);
476}
477
478static void
479emit_stretch_started (CajaIconContainer *container, CajaIcon *icon)
480{
481 g_signal_emit (container,
482 signals[ICON_STRETCH_STARTED], 0,
483 icon->data);
484}
485
486static void
487emit_stretch_ended (CajaIconContainer *container, CajaIcon *icon)
488{
489 g_signal_emit (container,
490 signals[ICON_STRETCH_ENDED], 0,
491 icon->data);
492}
493
494static void
495icon_toggle_selected (CajaIconContainer *container,
496 CajaIcon *icon)
497{
498 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
499
500 icon->is_selected = !icon->is_selected;
501 eel_canvas_item_set (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
502 "highlighted_for_selection", (gboolean) icon->is_selected,
503 NULL((void*)0));
504
505 /* If the icon is deselected, then get rid of the stretch handles.
506 * No harm in doing the same if the item is newly selected.
507 */
508 if (icon == container->details->stretch_icon)
509 {
510 container->details->stretch_icon = NULL((void*)0);
511 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_show_stretch_handles (icon->item, FALSE(0));
512 /* snap the icon if necessary */
513 if (container->details->keep_aligned)
514 {
515 caja_icon_container_move_icon (container,
516 icon,
517 icon->x, icon->y,
518 icon->scale,
519 FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)));
520 }
521
522 emit_stretch_ended (container, icon);
523 }
524
525 /* Raise each newly-selected icon to the front as it is selected. */
526 if (icon->is_selected)
527 {
528 icon_raise (icon);
529 }
530}
531
532/* Select an icon. Return TRUE if selection has changed. */
533static gboolean
534icon_set_selected (CajaIconContainer *container,
535 CajaIcon *icon,
536 gboolean select)
537{
538 g_assert (select == FALSE || select == TRUE)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_119
; if (select == (0) || select == (!(0))) _g_boolean_var_119 =
1; else _g_boolean_var_119 = 0; _g_boolean_var_119; }), 1)) ;
else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 538, ((const char*) (__func__)), "select == FALSE || select == TRUE"
); } while (0);
539 g_assert (icon->is_selected == FALSE || icon->is_selected == TRUE)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_120
; if (icon->is_selected == (0) || icon->is_selected == (
!(0))) _g_boolean_var_120 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_120 = 0; _g_boolean_var_120
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 539, ((const char*) (__func__)), "icon->is_selected == FALSE || icon->is_selected == TRUE"
); } while (0);
540
541 if (select == icon->is_selected)
542 {
543 return FALSE(0);
544 }
545
546 icon_toggle_selected (container, icon);
547 g_assert (select == icon->is_selected)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_121
; if (select == icon->is_selected) _g_boolean_var_121 = 1;
else _g_boolean_var_121 = 0; _g_boolean_var_121; }), 1)) ; else
g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 547, ((const char*) (__func__)), "select == icon->is_selected"
); } while (0);
548 return TRUE(!(0));
549}
550
551static inline void
552icon_get_bounding_box (CajaIcon *icon,
553 int *x1_return, int *y1_return,
554 int *x2_return, int *y2_return,
555 CajaIconCanvasItemBoundsUsage usage)
556{
557 double x1, y1, x2, y2;
558
559 if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_DISPLAY)
560 {
561 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
562 &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
563 }
564 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT)
565 {
566 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (icon->item,
567 &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
568 }
569 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM)
570 {
571 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_entire_item (icon->item,
572 &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
573 }
574 else
575 {
576 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 576, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
577 }
578
579 if (x1_return != NULL((void*)0))
580 {
581 *x1_return = x1;
582 }
583
584 if (y1_return != NULL((void*)0))
585 {
586 *y1_return = y1;
587 }
588
589 if (x2_return != NULL((void*)0))
590 {
591 *x2_return = x2;
592 }
593
594 if (y2_return != NULL((void*)0))
595 {
596 *y2_return = y2;
597 }
598}
599
600/* Utility functions for CajaIconContainer. */
601
602gboolean
603caja_icon_container_scroll (CajaIconContainer *container,
604 int delta_x, int delta_y)
605{
606 GtkAdjustment *hadj, *vadj;
607 int old_h_value, old_v_value;
608
609 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
610 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
611
612 /* Store the old ajustment values so we can tell if we
613 * ended up actually scrolling. We may not have in a case
614 * where the resulting value got pinned to the adjustment
615 * min or max.
616 */
617 old_h_value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj);
618 old_v_value = gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj);
619
620 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj) + delta_x);
621 gtk_adjustment_set_value (vadj, gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj) + delta_y);
622
623 /* return TRUE if we did scroll */
624 return gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj) != old_h_value || gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj) != old_v_value;
625}
626
627static void
628pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback (CajaIconCanvasItem *item,
629 CajaIconContainer *container)
630{
631 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_122
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_122 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_122 =
0; _g_boolean_var_122; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 631, ((const char*) (
__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (0
);
632 g_assert (container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_123
; if (container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_123 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_123 = 0; _g_boolean_var_123
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 632, ((const char*) (__func__)), "container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal != NULL"
); } while (0);
633 g_assert (container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal->item == item)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_124
; if (container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal->item
== item) _g_boolean_var_124 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_124 = 0
; _g_boolean_var_124; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 633, ((const char*) (
__func__)), "container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal->item == item"
); } while (0);
634
635 container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal = NULL((void*)0);
636}
637
638static CajaIcon*
639get_pending_icon_to_reveal (CajaIconContainer *container)
640{
641 return container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal;
642}
643
644static void
645set_pending_icon_to_reveal (CajaIconContainer *container, CajaIcon *icon)
646{
647 CajaIcon *old_icon;
648
649 old_icon = container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal;
650
651 if (icon == old_icon)
652 {
653 return;
654 }
655
656 if (old_icon != NULL((void*)0))
657 {
658 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_funcg_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
659 (old_icon->item,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
660 G_CALLBACK (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
661 container)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback)))
, (container));
662 }
663
664 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
665 {
666 g_signal_connect (icon->item, "destroy",g_signal_connect_data ((icon->item), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback))), (container), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
667 G_CALLBACK (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback),g_signal_connect_data ((icon->item), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback))), (container), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
668 container)g_signal_connect_data ((icon->item), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (pending_icon_to_reveal_destroy_callback))), (container), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
669 }
670
671 container->details->pending_icon_to_reveal = icon;
672}
673
674static void
675item_get_canvas_bounds (EelCanvasItem *item,
676 EelIRect *bounds,
677 gboolean safety_pad)
678{
679 EelDRect world_rect;
680
681 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (item,
682 &world_rect.x0,
683 &world_rect.y0,
684 &world_rect.x1,
685 &world_rect.y1);
686 eel_canvas_item_i2w (item->parent,
687 &world_rect.x0,
688 &world_rect.y0);
689 eel_canvas_item_i2w (item->parent,
690 &world_rect.x1,
691 &world_rect.y1);
692 if (safety_pad)
693 {
694 world_rect.x0 -= ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4;
695 world_rect.x1 += ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4;
696
697 world_rect.y0 -= ICON_PAD_TOP4 + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4;
698 world_rect.y1 += ICON_PAD_TOP4 + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4;
699 }
700
701 eel_canvas_w2c (item->canvas,
702 world_rect.x0,
703 world_rect.y0,
704 &bounds->x0,
705 &bounds->y0);
706 eel_canvas_w2c (item->canvas,
707 world_rect.x1,
708 world_rect.y1,
709 &bounds->x1,
710 &bounds->y1);
711}
712
713static void
714icon_get_row_and_column_bounds (CajaIconContainer *container,
715 CajaIcon *icon,
716 EelIRect *bounds,
717 gboolean safety_pad)
718{
719 GList *p;
720 EelIRect one_bounds;
721 CajaIcon *one_icon = NULL((void*)0);
722
723 item_get_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))), bounds, safety_pad);
724
725 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next) {
726 one_icon = p->data;
727
728 if (icon == one_icon) {
729 continue;
730 }
731
732 if (compare_icons_horizontal (container, icon, one_icon) == 0) {
733 item_get_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (one_icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((one_icon->item))))), &one_bounds, safety_pad);
734 bounds->x0 = MIN (bounds->x0, one_bounds.x0)(((bounds->x0) < (one_bounds.x0)) ? (bounds->x0) : (
one_bounds.x0));
735 bounds->x1 = MAX (bounds->x1, one_bounds.x1)(((bounds->x1) > (one_bounds.x1)) ? (bounds->x1) : (
one_bounds.x1));
736 }
737
738 if (compare_icons_vertical (container, icon, one_icon) == 0) {
739 item_get_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (one_icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((one_icon->item))))), &one_bounds, safety_pad);
740 bounds->y0 = MIN (bounds->y0, one_bounds.y0)(((bounds->y0) < (one_bounds.y0)) ? (bounds->y0) : (
one_bounds.y0));
741 bounds->y1 = MAX (bounds->y1, one_bounds.y1)(((bounds->y1) > (one_bounds.y1)) ? (bounds->y1) : (
one_bounds.y1));
742 }
743 }
744
745}
746
747static void
748reveal_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
749 CajaIcon *icon)
750{
751 GtkAllocation allocation;
752 GtkAdjustment *hadj, *vadj;
753 EelIRect bounds;
754
755 if (!icon_is_positioned (icon)) {
756 set_pending_icon_to_reveal (container, icon);
757 return;
758 }
759
760 set_pending_icon_to_reveal (container, NULL((void*)0));
761
762 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
763
764 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
765 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
766
767 if (caja_icon_container_is_auto_layout (container)) {
768 /* ensure that we reveal the entire row/column */
769 icon_get_row_and_column_bounds (container, icon, &bounds, TRUE(!(0)));
770 } else {
771 item_get_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))), &bounds, TRUE(!(0)));
772 }
773 if (bounds.y0 < gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj)) {
774 gtk_adjustment_set_value (vadj, bounds.y0);
775 } else if (bounds.y1 > gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj) + allocation.height) {
776 gtk_adjustment_set_value (vadj, bounds.y1 - allocation.height);
777 }
778
779 if (bounds.x0 < gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj)) {
780 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, bounds.x0);
781 } else if (bounds.x1 > gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj) + allocation.width) {
782 if (bounds.x1 - allocation.width > bounds.x0) {
783 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, bounds.x0);
784 } else {
785 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, bounds.x1 - allocation.width);
786 }
787 }
788}
789
790static void
791process_pending_icon_to_reveal (CajaIconContainer *container)
792{
793 CajaIcon *pending_icon_to_reveal;
794
795 pending_icon_to_reveal = get_pending_icon_to_reveal (container);
796
797 if (pending_icon_to_reveal != NULL((void*)0)) {
798 reveal_icon (container, pending_icon_to_reveal);
799 }
800}
801
802static gboolean
803keyboard_icon_reveal_timeout_callback (gpointer data)
804{
805 CajaIconContainer *container;
806 CajaIcon *icon;
807
808 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((data)))));
809 icon = container->details->keyboard_icon_to_reveal;
810
811 g_assert (icon != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_125
; if (icon != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_125 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_125
= 0; _g_boolean_var_125; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 811, ((const char*) (
__func__)), "icon != NULL"); } while (0);
812
813 /* Only reveal the icon if it's still the keyboard focus or if
814 * it's still selected. Someone originally thought we should
815 * cancel this reveal if the user manages to sneak a direct
816 * scroll in before the timeout fires, but we later realized
817 * this wouldn't actually be an improvement
818 * (see bugzilla.gnome.org 40612).
819 */
820 if (icon == container->details->keyboard_focus
821 || icon->is_selected) {
822 reveal_icon (container, icon);
823 }
824 container->details->keyboard_icon_reveal_timer_id = 0;
825
826 return FALSE(0);
827}
828
829static void
830unschedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (CajaIconContainer *container)
831{
832 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
833
834 details = container->details;
835
836 if (details->keyboard_icon_reveal_timer_id != 0) {
837 g_source_remove (details->keyboard_icon_reveal_timer_id);
838 }
839}
840
841static void
842schedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (CajaIconContainer *container,
843 CajaIcon *icon)
844{
845 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
846
847 details = container->details;
848
849 unschedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (container);
850
851 details->keyboard_icon_to_reveal = icon;
852 details->keyboard_icon_reveal_timer_id
853 = g_timeout_add (KEYBOARD_ICON_REVEAL_TIMEOUT10,
854 keyboard_icon_reveal_timeout_callback,
855 container);
856}
857
858static void
859clear_keyboard_focus (CajaIconContainer *container)
860{
861 if (container->details->keyboard_focus != NULL((void*)0))
862 {
863 eel_canvas_item_set (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (container->details->keyboard_focus->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((container->details->keyboard_focus
->item))))),
864 "highlighted_as_keyboard_focus", 0,
865 NULL((void*)0));
866 }
867
868 container->details->keyboard_focus = NULL((void*)0);
869}
870
871static inline void
872emit_atk_focus_state_change (CajaIcon *icon, gboolean focused)
873{
874 AtkObject *atk_object = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object (G_OBJECT (icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
875 atk_object_notify_state_change (atk_object, ATK_STATE_FOCUSED, focused);
876}
877
878/* Set @icon as the icon currently selected for keyboard operations. */
879static void
880set_keyboard_focus (CajaIconContainer *container,
881 CajaIcon *icon)
882{
883 g_assert (icon != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_126
; if (icon != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_126 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_126
= 0; _g_boolean_var_126; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 883, ((const char*) (
__func__)), "icon != NULL"); } while (0);
884
885 if (icon == container->details->keyboard_focus)
886 {
887 return;
888 }
889
890 clear_keyboard_focus (container);
891
892 container->details->keyboard_focus = icon;
893
894 eel_canvas_item_set (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (container->details->keyboard_focus->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((container->details->keyboard_focus
->item))))),
895 "highlighted_as_keyboard_focus", 1,
896 NULL((void*)0));
897
898 emit_atk_focus_state_change (icon, TRUE(!(0)));
899}
900
901static void
902set_keyboard_rubberband_start (CajaIconContainer *container,
903 CajaIcon *icon)
904{
905 container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start = icon;
906}
907
908static void
909clear_keyboard_rubberband_start (CajaIconContainer *container)
910{
911 container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start = NULL((void*)0);
912}
913
914/* carbon-copy of eel_canvas_group_bounds(), but
915 * for CajaIconContainerItems it returns the
916 * bounds for the “entire item”.
917 */
918static void
919get_icon_bounds_for_canvas_bounds (EelCanvasGroup *group,
920 double *x1, double *y1,
921 double *x2, double *y2,
922 CajaIconCanvasItemBoundsUsage usage)
923{
924 EelCanvasItem *child;
925 GList *list;
926 double tx1, ty1, tx2, ty2;
927 double minx, miny, maxx, maxy;
928 int set;
929
930 /* Get the bounds of the first visible item */
931
932 child = NULL((void*)0); /* Unnecessary but eliminates a warning. */
933
934 set = FALSE(0);
935
936 for (list = group->item_list; list; list = list->next)
43
←
Loop condition is false. Execution continues on line 968
→
937 {
938 child = list->data;
939
940 if (child->flags & EEL_CANVAS_ITEM_VISIBLE)
941 {
942 set = TRUE(!(0));
943 if (!CAJA_IS_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(child)); GType __t = (caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))) ||
944 usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_DISPLAY)
945 {
946 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (child, &minx, &miny, &maxx, &maxy);
947 }
948 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT)
949 {
950 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((child))))),
951 &minx, &miny, &maxx, &maxy);
952 }
953 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM)
954 {
955 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_entire_item (CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((child))))),
956 &minx, &miny, &maxx, &maxy);
957 }
958 else
959 {
960 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 960, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
961 }
962 break;
963 }
964 }
965
966 /* If there were no visible items, return an empty bounding box */
967
968 if (!set
43.1
'set' is 0
)
44
←
Taking true branch
→
969 {
970 *x1 = *y1 = *x2 = *y2 = 0.0;
45
←
Dereference of null pointer (loaded from variable 'x2')
971 return;
972 }
973
974 /* Now we can grow the bounds using the rest of the items */
975
976 list = list->next;
977
978 for (; list; list = list->next)
979 {
980 child = list->data;
981
982 if (!(child->flags & EEL_CANVAS_ITEM_VISIBLE))
983 continue;
984
985 if (!CAJA_IS_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(child)); GType __t = (caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type()); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))) ||
986 usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_DISPLAY)
987 {
988 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (child, &tx1, &ty1, &tx2, &ty2);
989 }
990 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT)
991 {
992 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((child))))),
993 &tx1, &ty1, &tx2, &ty2);
994 }
995 else if (usage == BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM)
996 {
997 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_entire_item (CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (child)((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((child))))),
998 &tx1, &ty1, &tx2, &ty2);
999 }
1000 else
1001 {
1002 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1002, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
1003 }
1004
1005 if (tx1 < minx)
1006 minx = tx1;
1007
1008 if (ty1 < miny)
1009 miny = ty1;
1010
1011 if (tx2 > maxx)
1012 maxx = tx2;
1013
1014 if (ty2 > maxy)
1015 maxy = ty2;
1016 }
1017
1018 /* Make the bounds be relative to our parent's coordinate system */
1019
1020 if (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (group)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((group)))))->parent)
1021 {
1022 minx += group->xpos;
1023 miny += group->ypos;
1024 maxx += group->xpos;
1025 maxy += group->ypos;
1026 }
1027
1028 if (x1 != NULL((void*)0))
1029 {
1030 *x1 = minx;
1031 }
1032
1033 if (y1 != NULL((void*)0))
1034 {
1035 *y1 = miny;
1036 }
1037
1038 if (x2 != NULL((void*)0))
1039 {
1040 *x2 = maxx;
1041 }
1042
1043 if (y2 != NULL((void*)0))
1044 {
1045 *y2 = maxy;
1046 }
1047}
1048
1049static void
1050get_all_icon_bounds (CajaIconContainer *container,
1051 double *x1, double *y1,
1052 double *x2, double *y2,
1053 CajaIconCanvasItemBoundsUsage usage)
1054{
1055 /* FIXME bugzilla.gnome.org 42477: Do we have to do something about the rubberband
1056 * here? Any other non-icon items?
1057 */
1058 get_icon_bounds_for_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_GROUP (EEL_CANVAS (container)->root)((((EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))),
42
←
Calling 'get_icon_bounds_for_canvas_bounds'
→
1059 x1, y1, x2, y2, usage);
41
←
Passing null pointer value via 4th parameter 'x2'
→
1060}
1061
1062/* Don't preserve visible white space the next time the scroll region
1063 * is recomputed when the container is not empty. */
1064void
1065caja_icon_container_reset_scroll_region (CajaIconContainer *container)
1066{
1067 container->details->reset_scroll_region_trigger = TRUE(!(0));
1068}
1069
1070/* Set a new scroll region without eliminating any of the currently-visible area. */
1071static void
1072canvas_set_scroll_region_include_visible_area (EelCanvas *canvas,
1073 double x1, double y1,
1074 double x2, double y2)
1075{
1076 double old_x1, old_y1, old_x2, old_y2;
1077 double old_scroll_x, old_scroll_y;
1078 double height, width;
1079 GtkAllocation allocation;
1080
1081 eel_canvas_get_scroll_region (canvas, &old_x1, &old_y1, &old_x2, &old_y2);
1082 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (canvas)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((canvas))))), &allocation);
1083
1084 width = (allocation.width) / canvas->pixels_per_unit;
1085 height = (allocation.height) / canvas->pixels_per_unit;
1086
1087 old_scroll_x = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (canvas)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((canvas)))))));
1088 old_scroll_y = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (canvas)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((canvas)))))));
1089
1090 x1 = MIN (x1, old_x1 + old_scroll_x)(((x1) < (old_x1 + old_scroll_x)) ? (x1) : (old_x1 + old_scroll_x
));
1091 y1 = MIN (y1, old_y1 + old_scroll_y)(((y1) < (old_y1 + old_scroll_y)) ? (y1) : (old_y1 + old_scroll_y
));
1092 x2 = MAX (x2, old_x1 + old_scroll_x + width)(((x2) > (old_x1 + old_scroll_x + width)) ? (x2) : (old_x1
+ old_scroll_x + width));
1093 y2 = MAX (y2, old_y1 + old_scroll_y + height)(((y2) > (old_y1 + old_scroll_y + height)) ? (y2) : (old_y1
+ old_scroll_y + height));
1094
1095 eel_canvas_set_scroll_region
1096 (canvas, x1, y1, x2, y2);
1097}
1098
1099void
1100caja_icon_container_update_scroll_region (CajaIconContainer *container)
1101{
1102 double x1, y1, x2, y2;
1103 double pixels_per_unit;
1104 GtkAdjustment *hadj, *vadj;
1105 float step_increment;
1106 gboolean reset_scroll_region;
1107 GtkAllocation allocation;
1108
1109 pixels_per_unit = EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))))->pixels_per_unit;
1110
1111 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_fixed_size (container))
1112 {
1113 /* Set the scroll region to the size of the container allocation */
1114 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1115 eel_canvas_set_scroll_region
1116 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
1117 (double) - container->details->left_margin / pixels_per_unit,
1118 (double) - container->details->top_margin / pixels_per_unit,
1119 ((double) (allocation.width - 1)
1120 - container->details->left_margin
1121 - container->details->right_margin)
1122 / pixels_per_unit,
1123 ((double) (allocation.height - 1)
1124 - container->details->top_margin
1125 - container->details->bottom_margin)
1126 / pixels_per_unit);
1127 return;
1128 }
1129
1130 reset_scroll_region = container->details->reset_scroll_region_trigger
1131 || caja_icon_container_is_empty (container)
1132 || caja_icon_container_is_auto_layout (container);
1133
1134 /* The trigger is only cleared when container is non-empty, so
1135 * callers can reliably reset the scroll region when an item
1136 * is added even if extraneous relayouts are called when the
1137 * window is still empty.
1138 */
1139 if (!caja_icon_container_is_empty (container))
1140 {
1141 container->details->reset_scroll_region_trigger = FALSE(0);
1142 }
1143
1144 get_all_icon_bounds (container, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2, BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM);
1145
1146 /* Add border at the "end"of the layout (i.e. after the icons), to
1147 * ensure we get some space when scrolled to the end.
1148 * For horizontal layouts, we add a bottom border.
1149 * Vertical layout is used by the compact view so the end
1150 * depends on the RTL setting.
1151 */
1152 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
1153 {
1154 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
1155 {
1156 x1 -= ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + CONTAINER_PAD_LEFT4;
1157 }
1158 else
1159 {
1160 x2 += ICON_PAD_RIGHT4 + CONTAINER_PAD_RIGHT4;
1161 }
1162 }
1163 else
1164 {
1165 y2 += ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4 + CONTAINER_PAD_BOTTOM4;
1166 }
1167
1168 /* Auto-layout assumes a 0, 0 scroll origin and at least allocation->width.
1169 * Then we lay out to the right or to the left, so
1170 * x can be < 0 and > allocation */
1171 if (caja_icon_container_is_auto_layout (container))
1172 {
1173 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1174 x1 = MIN (x1, 0)(((x1) < (0)) ? (x1) : (0));
1175 x2 = MAX (x2, allocation.width / pixels_per_unit)(((x2) > (allocation.width / pixels_per_unit)) ? (x2) : (allocation
.width / pixels_per_unit));
1176 y1 = 0;
1177 }
1178 else
1179 {
1180 /* Otherwise we add the padding that is at the start of the
1181 layout */
1182 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
1183 {
1184 x2 += ICON_PAD_RIGHT4 + CONTAINER_PAD_RIGHT4;
1185 }
1186 else
1187 {
1188 x1 -= ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + CONTAINER_PAD_LEFT4;
1189 }
1190 y1 -= ICON_PAD_TOP4 + CONTAINER_PAD_TOP4;
1191 }
1192
1193 x2 -= 1;
1194 x2 = MAX(x1, x2)(((x1) > (x2)) ? (x1) : (x2));
1195
1196 y2 -= 1;
1197 y2 = MAX(y1, y2)(((y1) > (y2)) ? (y1) : (y2));
1198
1199 if (reset_scroll_region)
1200 {
1201 eel_canvas_set_scroll_region
1202 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
1203 x1, y1, x2, y2);
1204 }
1205 else
1206 {
1207 canvas_set_scroll_region_include_visible_area
1208 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
1209 x1, y1, x2, y2);
1210 }
1211
1212 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
1213 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
1214
1215 /* Scroll by 1/4 icon each time you click. */
1216 step_increment = caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level
1217 (container->details->zoom_level) / 4;
1218 if (gtk_adjustment_get_step_increment (hadj) != step_increment)
1219 {
1220 gtk_adjustment_set_step_increment (hadj, step_increment);
1221 }
1222 if (gtk_adjustment_get_step_increment (vadj) != step_increment)
1223 {
1224 gtk_adjustment_set_step_increment (vadj, step_increment);
1225 }
1226}
1227
1228static int
1229compare_icons (gconstpointer a, gconstpointer b, gpointer icon_container)
1230{
1231 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
1232 const CajaIcon *icon_a, *icon_b;
1233
1234 icon_a = a;
1235 icon_b = b;
1236 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (icon_container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((icon_container
)))->g_class))));
1237
1238 return klass->compare_icons (icon_container, icon_a->data, icon_b->data);
1239}
1240
1241static void
1242sort_icons (CajaIconContainer *container,
1243 GList **icons)
1244{
1245 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
1246
1247 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
1248 g_assert (klass->compare_icons != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_127
; if (klass->compare_icons != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_127
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_127 = 0; _g_boolean_var_127; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1248, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->compare_icons != NULL"
); } while (0);
1249
1250 *icons = g_list_sort_with_data (*icons, compare_icons, container);
1251}
1252
1253static void
1254resort (CajaIconContainer *container)
1255{
1256 sort_icons (container, &container->details->icons);
1257}
1258
1259typedef struct
1260{
1261 double width;
1262 double height;
1263 double x_offset;
1264 double y_offset;
1265} IconPositions;
1266
1267static void
1268lay_down_one_line (CajaIconContainer *container,
1269 GList *line_start,
1270 GList *line_end,
1271 double y,
1272 double max_height,
1273 GArray *positions,
1274 gboolean whole_text)
1275{
1276 GList *p;
1277 double x, y_offset;
1278 IconPositions *position;
1279 int i;
1280 gboolean is_rtl;
1281 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
1282
1283 is_rtl = caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container);
1284
1285 /* Lay out the icons along the baseline. */
1286 x = ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
1287 i = 0;
1288 for (p = line_start; p != line_end; p = p->next)
1289 {
1290 icon = p->data;
1291
1292 position = &g_array_index (positions, IconPositions, i++)(((IconPositions*) (void *) (positions)->data) [(i++)]);
1293
1294 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1295 {
1296 y_offset = (max_height - position->height) / 2;
1297 }
1298 else
1299 {
1300 y_offset = position->y_offset;
1301 }
1302
1303 icon_set_position
1304 (icon,
1305 is_rtl ? get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, x + position->x_offset) : x + position->x_offset,
1306 y + y_offset);
1307 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_entire_text (icon->item, whole_text);
1308
1309 icon->saved_ltr_x = is_rtl ? get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, icon->x) : icon->x;
1310
1311 x += position->width;
1312 }
1313}
1314
1315static void
1316lay_down_one_column (CajaIconContainer *container,
1317 GList *line_start,
1318 GList *line_end,
1319 double x,
1320 double y_start,
1321 double y_iter,
1322 GArray *positions)
1323{
1324 GList *p;
1325 double y;
1326 int i;
1327 gboolean is_rtl;
1328 IconPositions *position = NULL((void*)0);
1329 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
1330
1331 is_rtl = caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container);
1332
1333 /* Lay out the icons along the baseline. */
1334 y = y_start;
1335 i = 0;
1336 for (p = line_start; p != line_end; p = p->next)
1337 {
1338 icon = p->data;
1339
1340 position = &g_array_index (positions, IconPositions, i++)(((IconPositions*) (void *) (positions)->data) [(i++)]);
1341
1342 icon_set_position
1343 (icon,
1344 is_rtl ? get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, x + position->x_offset) : x + position->x_offset,
1345 y + position->y_offset);
1346
1347 icon->saved_ltr_x = is_rtl ? get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, icon->x) : icon->x;
1348
1349 y += y_iter;
1350 }
1351}
1352
1353static void
1354lay_down_icons_horizontal (CajaIconContainer *container,
1355 GList *icons,
1356 double start_y)
1357{
1358 GList *p, *line_start;
1359 CajaIcon *icon;
1360 double canvas_width, y;
1361 EelDRect bounds;
1362 EelDRect icon_bounds;
1363 EelDRect text_bounds;
1364 double max_height_above, max_height_below;
1365 double line_width;
1366 gboolean gridded_layout;
1367 double grid_width;
1368 double max_text_width, max_icon_width;
1369 int icon_width;
1370 int i;
1371 GtkAllocation allocation;
1372 GArray *positions;
1373 IconPositions *position = NULL((void*)0);
1374
1375 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_128
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_128 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_128 =
0; _g_boolean_var_128; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 1375, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
1376
1377 if (icons == NULL((void*)0))
1378 {
1379 return;
1380 }
1381
1382 positions = g_array_new (FALSE(0), FALSE(0), sizeof (IconPositions));
1383 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1384
1385 /* Lay out icons a line at a time. */
1386 canvas_width = CANVAS_WIDTH(container, allocation)((allocation.width - container->details->left_margin - container
->details->right_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1387 max_icon_width = max_text_width = 0.0;
1388
1389 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1390 {
1391 /* Would it be worth caching these bounds for the next loop? */
1392 for (p = icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
1393 {
1394 icon = p->data;
1395
1396 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1397 max_icon_width = MAX (max_icon_width, ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0))(((max_icon_width) > (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0
))) ? (max_icon_width) : (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.
x0)));
1398
1399 text_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_text_rectangle (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
1400 max_text_width = MAX (max_text_width, ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))(((max_text_width) > (ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0
))) ? (max_text_width) : (ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.
x0)));
1401 }
1402
1403 grid_width = max_icon_width + max_text_width + ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4;
1404 }
1405 else
1406 {
1407 int num_columns;
1408
1409 num_columns = floor(canvas_width / STANDARD_ICON_GRID_WIDTH155);
1410 num_columns = fmax(num_columns, 1);
1411 /* Minimum of one column */
1412 grid_width = canvas_width / num_columns - 1;
1413 /* -1 prevents jitter */
1414 }
1415
1416 gridded_layout = !caja_icon_container_is_tighter_layout (container);
1417
1418 line_width = container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE ? ICON_PAD_LEFT4 : 0;
1419 line_start = icons;
1420 y = start_y + CONTAINER_PAD_TOP4;
1421 i = 0;
1422
1423 max_height_above = 0;
1424 max_height_below = 0;
1425 for (p = icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
1426 {
1427 double height_above, height_below;
1428
1429 icon = p->data;
1430
1431 /* Assume it's only one level hierarchy to avoid costly affine calculations */
1432 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (icon->item,
1433 &bounds.x0, &bounds.y0,
1434 &bounds.x1, &bounds.y1);
1435
1436 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1437 text_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_text_rectangle (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
1438
1439 if (gridded_layout)
1440 {
1441 icon_width = ceil ((bounds.x1 - bounds.x0)/grid_width) * grid_width;
1442
1443 }
1444 else
1445 {
1446 icon_width = (bounds.x1 - bounds.x0) + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4 + 8; /* 8 pixels extra for fancy selection box */
1447 }
1448
1449 /* Calculate size above/below baseline */
1450 height_above = icon_bounds.y1 - bounds.y0;
1451 height_below = bounds.y1 - icon_bounds.y1;
1452
1453 /* If this icon doesn't fit, it's time to lay out the line that's queued up. */
1454 if (line_start != p && line_width + icon_width >= canvas_width )
1455 {
1456 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1457 {
1458 y += ICON_PAD_TOP4;
1459 }
1460 else
1461 {
1462 /* Advance to the baseline. */
1463 y += ICON_PAD_TOP4 + max_height_above;
1464 }
1465
1466 lay_down_one_line (container, line_start, p, y, max_height_above, positions, FALSE(0));
1467
1468 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1469 {
1470 y += max_height_above + max_height_below + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4;
1471 }
1472 else
1473 {
1474 /* Advance to next line. */
1475 y += max_height_below + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4;
1476 }
1477
1478 line_width = container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE ? ICON_PAD_LEFT4 : 0;
1479 line_start = p;
1480 i = 0;
1481
1482 max_height_above = height_above;
1483 max_height_below = height_below;
1484 }
1485 else
1486 {
1487 if (height_above > max_height_above)
1488 {
1489 max_height_above = height_above;
1490 }
1491 if (height_below > max_height_below)
1492 {
1493 max_height_below = height_below;
1494 }
1495 }
1496
1497 g_array_set_size (positions, i + 1);
1498 position = &g_array_index (positions, IconPositions, i++)(((IconPositions*) (void *) (positions)->data) [(i++)]);
1499 position->width = icon_width;
1500 position->height = icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds.y0;
1501
1502 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1503 {
1504 if (gridded_layout)
1505 {
1506 position->x_offset = max_icon_width + ICON_PAD_LEFT4 + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4 - (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0);
1507 }
1508 else
1509 {
1510 position->x_offset = icon_width - ((icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0) + (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0));
1511 }
1512 position->y_offset = 0;
1513 }
1514 else
1515 {
1516 position->x_offset = (icon_width - (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0)) / 2;
1517 position->y_offset = icon_bounds.y0 - icon_bounds.y1;
1518 }
1519
1520 /* Add this icon. */
1521 line_width += icon_width;
1522 }
1523
1524 /* Lay down that last line of icons. */
1525 if (line_start != NULL((void*)0))
1526 {
1527 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
1528 {
1529 y += ICON_PAD_TOP4;
1530 }
1531 else
1532 {
1533 /* Advance to the baseline. */
1534 y += ICON_PAD_TOP4 + max_height_above;
1535 }
1536
1537 lay_down_one_line (container, line_start, NULL((void*)0), y, max_height_above, positions, TRUE(!(0)));
1538
1539 /* Advance to next line. */
1540 y += max_height_below + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4;
1541 }
1542
1543 g_array_free (positions, TRUE(!(0)));
1544}
1545
1546static void
1547get_max_icon_dimensions (GList *icon_start,
1548 GList *icon_end,
1549 double *max_icon_width,
1550 double *max_icon_height,
1551 double *max_text_width,
1552 double *max_text_height,
1553 double *max_bounds_height)
1554{
1555 EelDRect icon_bounds;
1556 EelDRect text_bounds;
1557 GList *p;
1558 double y1, y2;
1559 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
1560
1561 *max_icon_width = *max_text_width = 0.0;
1562 *max_icon_height = *max_text_height = 0.0;
1563 *max_bounds_height = 0.0;
1564
1565 /* Would it be worth caching these bounds for the next loop? */
1566 for (p = icon_start; p != icon_end; p = p->next)
1567 {
1568 icon = p->data;
1569
1570 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1571 *max_icon_width = MAX (*max_icon_width, ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0))(((*max_icon_width) > (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.
x0))) ? (*max_icon_width) : (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds
.x0)));
1572 *max_icon_height = MAX (*max_icon_height, ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds.y0))(((*max_icon_height) > (ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds
.y0))) ? (*max_icon_height) : (ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds
.y0)));
1573
1574 text_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_text_rectangle (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
1575 *max_text_width = MAX (*max_text_width, ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))(((*max_text_width) > (ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.
x0))) ? (*max_text_width) : (ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds
.x0)));
1576 *max_text_height = MAX (*max_text_height, ceil (text_bounds.y1 - text_bounds.y0))(((*max_text_height) > (ceil (text_bounds.y1 - text_bounds
.y0))) ? (*max_text_height) : (ceil (text_bounds.y1 - text_bounds
.y0)));
1577
1578 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (icon->item,
1579 NULL((void*)0), &y1,
1580 NULL((void*)0), &y2);
1581 *max_bounds_height = MAX (*max_bounds_height, y2 - y1)(((*max_bounds_height) > (y2 - y1)) ? (*max_bounds_height)
: (y2 - y1));
1582 }
1583}
1584
1585/* column-wise layout. At the moment, this only works with label-beside-icon (used by "Compact View"). */
1586static void
1587lay_down_icons_vertical (CajaIconContainer *container,
1588 GList *icons,
1589 double start_y)
1590{
1591 GList *p, *line_start;
1592 double x, canvas_height;
1593 GArray *positions;
1594 IconPositions *position;
1595 EelDRect icon_bounds;
1596 EelDRect text_bounds;
1597 GtkAllocation allocation;
1598
1599 double line_height;
1600
1601 double max_height;
1602 double max_height_with_borders;
1603 double max_width;
1604 double max_width_in_column;
1605
1606 double max_bounds_height;
1607 double max_bounds_height_with_borders;
1608
1609 double max_text_width, max_icon_width;
1610 double max_text_height, max_icon_height;
1611 int i;
1612
1613 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
1614
1615 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_129
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_129 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_129 =
0; _g_boolean_var_129; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 1615, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
1616 g_assert (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_130
; if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE
) _g_boolean_var_130 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_130 = 0; _g_boolean_var_130
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1616, ((const char*) (__func__)), "container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE"
); } while (0);
1617
1618 if (icons == NULL((void*)0))
1619 {
1620 return;
1621 }
1622
1623 positions = g_array_new (FALSE(0), FALSE(0), sizeof (IconPositions));
1624 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1625
1626 /* Lay out icons a column at a time. */
1627 canvas_height = CANVAS_HEIGHT(container, allocation)((allocation.height - container->details->top_margin - container
->details->bottom_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((
container)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1628
1629 max_icon_width = max_text_width = 0.0;
1630 max_icon_height = max_text_height = 0.0;
1631 max_bounds_height = 0.0;
1632
1633 get_max_icon_dimensions (icons, NULL((void*)0),
1634 &max_icon_width, &max_icon_height,
1635 &max_text_width, &max_text_height,
1636 &max_bounds_height);
1637
1638 max_width = max_icon_width + max_text_width;
1639 max_height = MAX (max_icon_height, max_text_height)(((max_icon_height) > (max_text_height)) ? (max_icon_height
) : (max_text_height));
1640 max_height_with_borders = ICON_PAD_TOP4 + max_height;
1641
1642 max_bounds_height_with_borders = ICON_PAD_TOP4 + max_bounds_height;
1643
1644 line_height = ICON_PAD_TOP4;
1645 line_start = icons;
1646 x = 0;
1647 i = 0;
1648
1649 max_width_in_column = 0.0;
1650
1651 for (p = icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
1652 {
1653 int height;
1654
1655 icon = p->data;
1656
1657 /* If this icon doesn't fit, it's time to lay out the column that's queued up. */
1658
1659 /* We use the bounds height here, since for wrapping we also want to consider
1660 * overlapping emblems at the bottom. We may wrap a little bit too early since
1661 * the icon with the max. bounds height may actually not be in the last row, but
1662 * it is better than visual glitches
1663 */
1664 if (line_start != p && line_height + (max_bounds_height_with_borders-1) >= canvas_height )
1665 {
1666 x += ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
1667
1668 /* correctly set (per-column) width */
1669 if (!container->details->all_columns_same_width)
1670 {
1671 for (i = 0; i < (int) positions->len; i++)
1672 {
1673 position = &g_array_index (positions, IconPositions, i)(((IconPositions*) (void *) (positions)->data) [(i)]);
1674 position->width = max_width_in_column;
1675 }
1676 }
1677
1678 lay_down_one_column (container, line_start, p, x, CONTAINER_PAD_TOP4, max_height_with_borders, positions);
1679
1680 /* Advance to next column. */
1681 if (container->details->all_columns_same_width)
1682 {
1683 x += max_width + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4;
1684 }
1685 else
1686 {
1687 x += max_width_in_column + ICON_PAD_RIGHT4;
1688 }
1689
1690 line_height = ICON_PAD_TOP4;
1691 line_start = p;
1692 i = 0;
1693
1694 max_width_in_column = 0;
1695 }
1696
1697 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1698 text_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_text_rectangle (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
1699
1700 max_width_in_column = MAX (max_width_in_column,(((max_width_in_column) > (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds
.x0) + ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))) ? (max_width_in_column
) : (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0) + ceil (text_bounds
.x1 - text_bounds.x0)))
1701 ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0) +(((max_width_in_column) > (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds
.x0) + ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))) ? (max_width_in_column
) : (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0) + ceil (text_bounds
.x1 - text_bounds.x0)))
1702 ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))(((max_width_in_column) > (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds
.x0) + ceil (text_bounds.x1 - text_bounds.x0))) ? (max_width_in_column
) : (ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0) + ceil (text_bounds
.x1 - text_bounds.x0)));
1703
1704 g_array_set_size (positions, i + 1);
1705 position = &g_array_index (positions, IconPositions, i++)(((IconPositions*) (void *) (positions)->data) [(i++)]);
1706 if (container->details->all_columns_same_width)
1707 {
1708 position->width = max_width;
1709 }
1710 position->height = max_height;
1711 position->y_offset = ICON_PAD_TOP4;
1712 position->x_offset = ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
1713
1714 position->x_offset += max_icon_width - ceil (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0);
1715
1716 height = MAX (ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds.y0), ceil(text_bounds.y1 - text_bounds.y0))(((ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds.y0)) > (ceil(text_bounds
.y1 - text_bounds.y0))) ? (ceil (icon_bounds.y1 - icon_bounds
.y0)) : (ceil(text_bounds.y1 - text_bounds.y0)));
1717 position->y_offset += (max_height - height) / 2;
1718
1719 /* Add this icon. */
1720 line_height += max_height_with_borders;
1721 }
1722
1723 /* Lay down that last column of icons. */
1724 if (line_start != NULL((void*)0))
1725 {
1726 x += ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
1727 lay_down_one_column (container, line_start, NULL((void*)0), x, CONTAINER_PAD_TOP4, max_height_with_borders, positions);
1728 }
1729
1730 g_array_free (positions, TRUE(!(0)));
1731}
1732
1733static void
1734snap_position (CajaIconContainer *container,
1735 CajaIcon *icon,
1736 int *x, int *y)
1737{
1738 int center_x;
1739 int baseline_y;
1740 int icon_width;
1741 int icon_height;
1742 int total_width;
1743 int total_height;
1744 EelDRect icon_position;
1745 GtkAllocation allocation;
1746
1747 icon_position = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1748 icon_width = icon_position.x1 - icon_position.x0;
1749 icon_height = icon_position.y1 - icon_position.y0;
1750
1751 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1752 total_width = CANVAS_WIDTH (container, allocation)((allocation.width - container->details->left_margin - container
->details->right_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1753 total_height = CANVAS_HEIGHT (container, allocation)((allocation.height - container->details->top_margin - container
->details->bottom_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((
container)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1754
1755 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
1756 *x = get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, *x);
1757
1758 if (*x + icon_width / 2 < DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_X78)
1759 {
1760 *x = DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_X78 - icon_width / 2;
1761 }
1762
1763 if (*x + icon_width / 2 > total_width - (DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_X78))
1764 {
1765 *x = total_width - (DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_X78 + (icon_width / 2));
1766 }
1767
1768 if (*y + icon_height < DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20)
1769 {
1770 *y = DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20 - icon_height;
1771 }
1772
1773 if (*y + icon_height > total_height - (DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20))
1774 {
1775 *y = total_height - (DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20 + (icon_height / 2));
1776 }
1777
1778 center_x = *x + icon_width / 2;
1779 *x = SNAP_NEAREST_HORIZONTAL (center_x)((eel_round ((double)((center_x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10) - (icon_width / 2);
1780 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
1781 {
1782 *x = get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, *x);
1783 }
1784
1785 /* Find the grid position vertically and place on the proper baseline */
1786 baseline_y = *y + icon_height;
1787 baseline_y = SNAP_NEAREST_VERTICAL (baseline_y)((eel_round ((double)((baseline_y) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10);
1788 *y = baseline_y - icon_height;
1789}
1790
1791static int
1792compare_icons_by_position (gconstpointer a, gconstpointer b)
1793{
1794 CajaIcon *icon_a, *icon_b;
1795 int x1, y1, x2, y2;
1796 int center_a;
1797 int center_b;
1798
1799 icon_a = (CajaIcon*)a;
1800 icon_b = (CajaIcon*)b;
1801
1802 icon_get_bounding_box (icon_a, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2,
1803 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_DISPLAY);
1804 center_a = x1 + (x2 - x1) / 2;
1805 icon_get_bounding_box (icon_b, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2,
1806 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_DISPLAY);
1807 center_b = x1 + (x2 - x1) / 2;
1808
1809 return center_a == center_b ?
1810 icon_a->y - icon_b->y :
1811 center_a - center_b;
1812}
1813
1814static PlacementGrid *
1815placement_grid_new (CajaIconContainer *container, gboolean tight)
1816{
1817 PlacementGrid *grid;
1818 int width, height;
1819 int num_columns;
1820 int num_rows;
1821 int i;
1822 GtkAllocation allocation;
1823
1824 /* Get container dimensions */
1825 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1826 width = CANVAS_WIDTH(container, allocation)((allocation.width - container->details->left_margin - container
->details->right_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1827 height = CANVAS_HEIGHT(container, allocation)((allocation.height - container->details->top_margin - container
->details->bottom_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((
container)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1828
1829 num_columns = width / SNAP_SIZE_X78;
1830 num_rows = height / SNAP_SIZE_Y20;
1831
1832 if (num_columns == 0 || num_rows == 0)
1833 {
1834 return NULL((void*)0);
1835 }
1836
1837 grid = g_new0 (PlacementGrid, 1)(PlacementGrid *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) (1); gsize
__s = sizeof (PlacementGrid); gpointer __p; if (__s == 1) __p
= g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p (__n) &&
(__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L *2UL+1UL) / __s
)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s
); __p; }));
1838 grid->tight = tight;
1839 grid->num_columns = num_columns;
1840 grid->num_rows = num_rows;
1841
1842 grid->grid_memory = g_new0 (int, (num_rows * num_columns))(int *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) ((num_rows * num_columns
)); gsize __s = sizeof (int); gpointer __p; if (__s == 1) __p
= g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p (__n) &&
(__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L *2UL+1UL) / __s
)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s
); __p; }));
1843 grid->icon_grid = g_new0 (int *, num_columns)(int * *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) (num_columns)
; gsize __s = sizeof (int *); gpointer __p; if (__s == 1) __p
= g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p (__n) &&
(__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L *2UL+1UL) / __s
)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s
); __p; }));
1844
1845 for (i = 0; i < num_columns; i++)
1846 {
1847 grid->icon_grid[i] = grid->grid_memory + (i * num_rows);
1848 }
1849
1850 return grid;
1851}
1852
1853static void
1854placement_grid_free (PlacementGrid *grid)
1855{
1856 g_free (grid->icon_grid);
1857 g_free (grid->grid_memory);
1858 g_free (grid);
1859}
1860
1861static gboolean
1862placement_grid_position_is_free (PlacementGrid *grid, EelIRect pos)
1863{
1864 int x, y;
1865
1866 g_assert (pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_131
; if (pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns
) _g_boolean_var_131 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_131 = 0; _g_boolean_var_131
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1866, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns"
); } while (0);
1867 g_assert (pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_132
; if (pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows
) _g_boolean_var_132 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_132 = 0; _g_boolean_var_132
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1867, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows"
); } while (0);
1868 g_assert (pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_133
; if (pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns
) _g_boolean_var_133 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_133 = 0; _g_boolean_var_133
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1868, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns"
); } while (0);
1869 g_assert (pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_134
; if (pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows
) _g_boolean_var_134 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_134 = 0; _g_boolean_var_134
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1869, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows"
); } while (0);
1870
1871 for (x = pos.x0; x <= pos.x1; x++)
1872 {
1873 for (y = pos.y0; y <= pos.y1; y++)
1874 {
1875 if (grid->icon_grid[x][y] != 0)
1876 {
1877 return FALSE(0);
1878 }
1879 }
1880 }
1881
1882 return TRUE(!(0));
1883}
1884
1885static void
1886placement_grid_mark (PlacementGrid *grid, EelIRect pos)
1887{
1888 int x, y;
1889
1890 g_assert (pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_135
; if (pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns
) _g_boolean_var_135 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_135 = 0; _g_boolean_var_135
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1890, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.x0 >= 0 && pos.x0 < grid->num_columns"
); } while (0);
1891 g_assert (pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_136
; if (pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows
) _g_boolean_var_136 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_136 = 0; _g_boolean_var_136
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1891, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.y0 >= 0 && pos.y0 < grid->num_rows"
); } while (0);
1892 g_assert (pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_137
; if (pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns
) _g_boolean_var_137 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_137 = 0; _g_boolean_var_137
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1892, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.x1 >= 0 && pos.x1 < grid->num_columns"
); } while (0);
1893 g_assert (pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_138
; if (pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows
) _g_boolean_var_138 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_138 = 0; _g_boolean_var_138
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 1893, ((const char*) (__func__)), "pos.y1 >= 0 && pos.y1 < grid->num_rows"
); } while (0);
1894
1895 for (x = pos.x0; x <= pos.x1; x++)
1896 {
1897 for (y = pos.y0; y <= pos.y1; y++)
1898 {
1899 grid->icon_grid[x][y] = 1;
1900 }
1901 }
1902}
1903
1904static void
1905canvas_position_to_grid_position (PlacementGrid *grid,
1906 EelIRect canvas_position,
1907 EelIRect *grid_position)
1908{
1909 /* The first causes minimal moving around during a snap, but
1910 * can end up with partially overlapping icons. The second one won't
1911 * allow any overlapping, but can cause more movement to happen
1912 * during a snap. */
1913 if (grid->tight)
1914 {
1915 grid_position->x0 = ceil ((double)(canvas_position.x0 - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_X78);
1916 grid_position->y0 = ceil ((double)(canvas_position.y0 - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_Y20);
1917 grid_position->x1 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.x1 - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_X78);
1918 grid_position->y1 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.y1 - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_Y20);
1919 }
1920 else
1921 {
1922 grid_position->x0 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.x0 - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_X78);
1923 grid_position->y0 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.y0 - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_Y20);
1924 grid_position->x1 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.x1 - DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_X78);
1925 grid_position->y1 = floor ((double)(canvas_position.y1 - DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10) / SNAP_SIZE_Y20);
1926 }
1927
1928 grid_position->x0 = CLAMP (grid_position->x0, 0, grid->num_columns - 1)(((grid_position->x0) > (grid->num_columns - 1)) ? (
grid->num_columns - 1) : (((grid_position->x0) < (0)
) ? (0) : (grid_position->x0)));
1929 grid_position->y0 = CLAMP (grid_position->y0, 0, grid->num_rows - 1)(((grid_position->y0) > (grid->num_rows - 1)) ? (grid
->num_rows - 1) : (((grid_position->y0) < (0)) ? (0)
: (grid_position->y0)));
1930 grid_position->x1 = CLAMP (grid_position->x1, grid_position->x0, grid->num_columns - 1)(((grid_position->x1) > (grid->num_columns - 1)) ? (
grid->num_columns - 1) : (((grid_position->x1) < (grid_position
->x0)) ? (grid_position->x0) : (grid_position->x1)));
1931 grid_position->y1 = CLAMP (grid_position->y1, grid_position->y0, grid->num_rows - 1)(((grid_position->y1) > (grid->num_rows - 1)) ? (grid
->num_rows - 1) : (((grid_position->y1) < (grid_position
->y0)) ? (grid_position->y0) : (grid_position->y1)));
1932}
1933
1934static void
1935placement_grid_mark_icon (PlacementGrid *grid, CajaIcon *icon)
1936{
1937 EelIRect icon_pos;
1938 EelIRect grid_pos;
1939
1940 icon_get_bounding_box (icon,
1941 &icon_pos.x0, &icon_pos.y0,
1942 &icon_pos.x1, &icon_pos.y1,
1943 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT);
1944 canvas_position_to_grid_position (grid,
1945 icon_pos,
1946 &grid_pos);
1947 placement_grid_mark (grid, grid_pos);
1948}
1949
1950static void
1951find_empty_location (CajaIconContainer *container,
1952 PlacementGrid *grid,
1953 CajaIcon *icon,
1954 int start_x,
1955 int start_y,
1956 int *x,
1957 int *y)
1958{
1959 double icon_width, icon_height;
1960 int canvas_width;
1961 int canvas_height;
1962 int height_for_bound_check;
1963 EelIRect icon_position;
1964 EelDRect pixbuf_rect;
1965 gboolean collision;
1966 GtkAllocation allocation;
1967
1968 /* Get container dimensions */
1969 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
1970 canvas_width = CANVAS_WIDTH(container, allocation)((allocation.width - container->details->left_margin - container
->details->right_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1971 canvas_height = CANVAS_HEIGHT(container, allocation)((allocation.height - container->details->top_margin - container
->details->bottom_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((
container)))))->pixels_per_unit);
1972
1973 icon_get_bounding_box (icon,
1974 &icon_position.x0, &icon_position.y0,
1975 &icon_position.x1, &icon_position.y1,
1976 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT);
1977 icon_width = icon_position.x1 - icon_position.x0;
1978 icon_height = icon_position.y1 - icon_position.y0;
1979
1980 icon_get_bounding_box (icon,
1981 NULL((void*)0), &icon_position.y0,
1982 NULL((void*)0), &icon_position.y1,
1983 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM);
1984 height_for_bound_check = icon_position.y1 - icon_position.y0;
1985
1986 pixbuf_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
1987
1988 /* Start the icon on a grid location */
1989 snap_position (container, icon, &start_x, &start_y);
1990
1991 icon_position.x0 = start_x;
1992 icon_position.y0 = start_y;
1993 icon_position.x1 = icon_position.x0 + icon_width;
1994 icon_position.y1 = icon_position.y0 + icon_height;
1995
1996 do
1997 {
1998 EelIRect grid_position;
1999 gboolean need_new_column;
2000
2001 collision = FALSE(0);
2002
2003 canvas_position_to_grid_position (grid,
2004 icon_position,
2005 &grid_position);
2006
2007 need_new_column = icon_position.y0 + height_for_bound_check + DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 > canvas_height;
2008
2009 if (need_new_column ||
2010 !placement_grid_position_is_free (grid, grid_position))
2011 {
2012 icon_position.y0 += SNAP_SIZE_Y20;
2013 icon_position.y1 = icon_position.y0 + icon_height;
2014
2015 if (need_new_column)
2016 {
2017 /* Move to the next column */
2018 icon_position.y0 = DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20 - (pixbuf_rect.y1 - pixbuf_rect.y0);
2019 while (icon_position.y0 < DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10)
2020 {
2021 icon_position.y0 += SNAP_SIZE_Y20;
2022 }
2023 icon_position.y1 = icon_position.y0 + icon_height;
2024
2025 icon_position.x0 += SNAP_SIZE_X78;
2026 icon_position.x1 = icon_position.x0 + icon_width;
2027 }
2028
2029 collision = TRUE(!(0));
2030 }
2031 }
2032 while (collision && (icon_position.x1 < canvas_width));
2033
2034 *x = icon_position.x0;
2035 *y = icon_position.y0;
2036}
2037
2038static void
2039align_icons (CajaIconContainer *container)
2040{
2041 GList *unplaced_icons;
2042 GList *l;
2043 PlacementGrid *grid;
2044
2045 unplaced_icons = g_list_copy (container->details->icons);
2046
2047 unplaced_icons = g_list_sort (unplaced_icons,
2048 compare_icons_by_position);
2049
2050 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
2051 {
2052 unplaced_icons = g_list_reverse (unplaced_icons);
2053 }
2054
2055 grid = placement_grid_new (container, TRUE(!(0)));
2056
2057 if (!grid)
2058 {
2059 g_list_free (unplaced_icons);
2060 return;
2061 }
2062
2063 for (l = unplaced_icons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next)
2064 {
2065 CajaIcon *icon;
2066 int x, y;
2067
2068 icon = l->data;
2069 x = icon->saved_ltr_x;
2070 y = icon->y;
2071 find_empty_location (container, grid,
2072 icon, x, y, &x, &y);
2073
2074 icon_set_position (icon, x, y);
2075 icon->saved_ltr_x = icon->x;
2076 placement_grid_mark_icon (grid, icon);
2077 }
2078
2079 g_list_free (unplaced_icons);
2080
2081 placement_grid_free (grid);
2082
2083 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
2084 {
2085 caja_icon_container_set_rtl_positions (container);
2086 }
2087}
2088
2089static double
2090get_mirror_x_position (CajaIconContainer *container, CajaIcon *icon, double x)
2091{
2092 EelDRect icon_bounds;
2093 GtkAllocation allocation;
2094
2095 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
2096 icon_bounds = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
2097
2098 return CANVAS_WIDTH(container, allocation)((allocation.width - container->details->left_margin - container
->details->right_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->pixels_per_unit) - x - (icon_bounds.x1 - icon_bounds.x0);
2099}
2100
2101static void
2102caja_icon_container_set_rtl_positions (CajaIconContainer *container)
2103{
2104 GList *l;
2105 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2106
2107 if (!container->details->icons)
2108 {
2109 return;
2110 }
2111
2112 for (l = container->details->icons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next)
2113 {
2114 double x;
2115
2116 icon = l->data;
2117 x = get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, icon->saved_ltr_x);
2118 icon_set_position (icon, x, icon->y);
2119 }
2120}
2121
2122static void
2123lay_down_icons_vertical_desktop (CajaIconContainer *container, GList *icons)
2124{
2125 GList *p, *placed_icons, *unplaced_icons;
2126 int total, new_length, placed;
2127 CajaIcon *icon;
2128 int height;
2129 int x, y, x1, x2, y1, y2;
2130 EelDRect icon_rect;
2131 GtkAllocation allocation;
2132
2133 /* Get container dimensions */
2134 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
2135 height = CANVAS_HEIGHT(container, allocation)((allocation.height - container->details->top_margin - container
->details->bottom_margin) / ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((
container)))))->pixels_per_unit);
2136
2137 /* Determine which icons have and have not been placed */
2138 placed_icons = NULL((void*)0);
2139 unplaced_icons = NULL((void*)0);
2140
2141 total = g_list_length (container->details->icons);
2142 new_length = g_list_length (icons);
2143 placed = total - new_length;
2144 if (placed > 0)
2145 {
2146 PlacementGrid *grid;
2147 /* Add only placed icons in list */
2148 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2149 {
2150 icon = p->data;
2151 if (icon_is_positioned (icon))
2152 {
2153 icon_set_position(icon, icon->saved_ltr_x, icon->y);
