2154 placed_icons = g_list_prepend (placed_icons, icon);
2155 }
2156 else
2157 {
2158 icon->x = 0;
2159 icon->y = 0;
2160 unplaced_icons = g_list_prepend (unplaced_icons, icon);
2161 }
2162 }
2163 placed_icons = g_list_reverse (placed_icons);
2164 unplaced_icons = g_list_reverse (unplaced_icons);
2165
2166 grid = placement_grid_new (container, FALSE(0));
2167
2168 if (grid)
2169 {
2170 for (p = placed_icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2171 {
2172 placement_grid_mark_icon
2173 (grid, (CajaIcon*)p->data);
2174 }
2175
2176 /* Place unplaced icons in the best locations */
2177 for (p = unplaced_icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2178 {
2179 icon = p->data;
2180
2181 icon_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
2182
2183 /* Start the icon in the first column */
2184 x = DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10 + (SNAP_SIZE_X78 / 2) - ((icon_rect.x1 - icon_rect.x0) / 2);
2185 y = DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 + SNAP_SIZE_Y20 - (icon_rect.y1 - icon_rect.y0);
2186
2187 find_empty_location (container,
2188 grid,
2189 icon,
2190 x, y,
2191 &x, &y);
2192
2193 icon_set_position (icon, x, y);
2194 icon->saved_ltr_x = x;
2195 placement_grid_mark_icon (grid, icon);
2196 }
2197
2198 placement_grid_free (grid);
2199 }
2200
2201 g_list_free (placed_icons);
2202 g_list_free (unplaced_icons);
2203 }
2204 else
2205 {
2206 /* There are no placed icons. Just lay them down using our rules */
2207 x = DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10;
2208
2209 while (icons != NULL((void*)0))
2210 {
2211 int max_width, column_width, icon_height;
2212 int center_x;
2213 int baseline;
2214 int icon_height_for_bound_check;
2215 gboolean should_snap;
2216
2217 should_snap = !(container->details->tighter_layout && !container->details->keep_aligned);
2218
2219 y = DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10;
2220
2221 max_width = 0;
2222
2223 /* Calculate max width for column */
2224 for (p = icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2225 {
2226 int icon_width;
2227
2228 icon = p->data;
2229
2230 icon_get_bounding_box (icon, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2,
2231 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT);
2232 icon_width = x2 - x1;
2233 icon_height = y2 - y1;
2234
2235 icon_get_bounding_box (icon, NULL((void*)0), &y1, NULL((void*)0), &y2,
2236 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM);
2237 icon_height_for_bound_check = y2 - y1;
2238
2239 if (should_snap)
2240 {
2241 /* Snap the baseline to a grid position */
2242 icon_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
2243 baseline = y + (icon_rect.y1 - icon_rect.y0);
2244 baseline = SNAP_CEIL_VERTICAL (baseline)((ceil ((double)((baseline) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10);
2245 y = baseline - (icon_rect.y1 - icon_rect.y0);
2246 }
2247
2248 /* Check and see if we need to move to a new column */
2249 if (y != DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 && y + icon_height_for_bound_check > height)
2250 {
2251 break;
2252 }
2253
2254 if (max_width < icon_width)
2255 {
2256 max_width = icon_width;
2257 }
2258
2259 y += icon_height + DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10;
2260 }
2261
2262 y = DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10;
2263
2264 center_x = x + max_width / 2;
2265 column_width = max_width;
2266 if (should_snap)
2267 {
2268 /* Find the grid column to center on */
2269 center_x = SNAP_CEIL_HORIZONTAL (center_x)((ceil ((double)((center_x) - 10) / 78) * 78) + 10);
2270 column_width = (center_x - x) + (max_width / 2);
2271 }
2272
2273 /* Lay out column */
2274 for (p = icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2275 {
2276 icon = p->data;
2277 icon_get_bounding_box (icon, &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2,
2278 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_LAYOUT);
2279 icon_height = y2 - y1;
2280
2281 icon_get_bounding_box (icon, NULL((void*)0), &y1, NULL((void*)0), &y2,
2282 BOUNDS_USAGE_FOR_ENTIRE_ITEM);
2283 icon_height_for_bound_check = y2 - y1;
2284
2285 icon_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
2286
2287 if (should_snap)
2288 {
2289 baseline = y + (icon_rect.y1 - icon_rect.y0);
2290 baseline = SNAP_CEIL_VERTICAL (baseline)((ceil ((double)((baseline) - 10) / 20) * 20) + 10);
2291 y = baseline - (icon_rect.y1 - icon_rect.y0);
2292 }
2293
2294 /* Check and see if we need to move to a new column */
2295 if (y != DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10 && y > height - icon_height_for_bound_check &&
2296 /* Make sure we lay out at least one icon per column, to make progress */
2297 p != icons)
2298 {
2299 x += column_width + DESKTOP_PAD_HORIZONTAL10;
2300 break;
2301 }
2302
2303 icon_set_position (icon,
2304 center_x - (icon_rect.x1 - icon_rect.x0) / 2,
2305 y);
2306
2307 icon->saved_ltr_x = icon->x;
2308 y += icon_height + DESKTOP_PAD_VERTICAL10;
2309 }
2310 icons = p;
2311 }
2312 }
2313
2314 /* These modes are special. We freeze all of our positions
2315 * after we do the layout.
2316 */
2317 /* FIXME bugzilla.gnome.org 42478:
2318 * This should not be tied to the direction of layout.
2319 * It should be a separate switch.
2320 */
2321 caja_icon_container_freeze_icon_positions (container);
2322}
2323
2324static void
2325lay_down_icons (CajaIconContainer *container, GList *icons, double start_y)
2326{
2327 switch (container->details->layout_mode)
2328 {
2329 case CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_L_R_T_B:
2330 case CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_R_L_T_B:
2331 lay_down_icons_horizontal (container, icons, start_y);
2332 break;
2333
2334 case CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_T_B_L_R:
2335 case CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_T_B_R_L:
2336 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (container))
2337 {
2338 lay_down_icons_vertical_desktop (container, icons);
2339 }
2340 else
2341 {
2342 lay_down_icons_vertical (container, icons, start_y);
2343 }
2344 break;
2345
2346 default:
2347 g_assert_not_reached ()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 2347, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
2348 }
2349}
2350
2351static void
2352redo_layout_internal (CajaIconContainer *container)
2353{
2354 finish_adding_new_icons (container);
21
←
Calling 'finish_adding_new_icons'
→
2355
2356 /* Don't do any re-laying-out during stretching. Later we
2357 * might add smart logic that does this and leaves room for
2358 * the stretched icon, but if we do it we want it to be fast
2359 * and only re-lay-out when it's really needed.
2360 */
2361 if (container->details->auto_layout
2362 && container->details->drag_state != DRAG_STATE_STRETCH)
2363 {
2364 resort (container);
2365 lay_down_icons (container, container->details->icons, 0);
2366 }
2367
2368 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
2369 {
2370 caja_icon_container_set_rtl_positions (container);
2371 }
2372
2373 caja_icon_container_update_scroll_region (container);
2374
2375 process_pending_icon_to_reveal (container);
2376 process_pending_icon_to_rename (container);
2377 caja_icon_container_update_visible_icons (container);
2378}
2379
2380static gboolean
2381redo_layout_callback (gpointer callback_data)
2382{
2383 CajaIconContainer *container;
2384
2385 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (callback_data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((callback_data)))));
2386 redo_layout_internal (container);
2387 container->details->idle_id = 0;
2388
2389 return FALSE(0);
2390}
2391
2392static void
2393unschedule_redo_layout (CajaIconContainer *container)
2394{
2395 if (container->details->idle_id != 0)
2396 {
2397 g_source_remove (container->details->idle_id);
2398 container->details->idle_id = 0;
2399 }
2400}
2401
2402static void
2403schedule_redo_layout (CajaIconContainer *container)
2404{
2405 if (container->details->idle_id == 0
2406 && container->details->has_been_allocated)
2407 {
2408 container->details->idle_id = g_idle_add
2409 (redo_layout_callback, container);
2410 }
2411}
2412
2413static void
2414redo_layout (CajaIconContainer *container)
2415{
2416 unschedule_redo_layout (container);
2417 redo_layout_internal (container);
20
←
Calling 'redo_layout_internal'
→
2418}
2419
2420static void
2421reload_icon_positions (CajaIconContainer *container,
2422 gboolean layout_changed)
2423{
2424 GList *p, *no_position_icons;
2425 gboolean have_stored_position;
2426 CajaIconPosition position;
2427 EelDRect bounds;
2428 double bottom;
2429 EelCanvasItem *item;
2430 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2431
2432 g_assert (!container->details->auto_layout)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_139
; if (!container->details->auto_layout) _g_boolean_var_139
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_139 = 0; _g_boolean_var_139; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 2432, ((const char*) (__func__)), "!container->details->auto_layout"
); } while (0);
2433
2434 resort (container);
2435
2436 no_position_icons = NULL((void*)0);
2437
2438 /* Place all the icons with positions. */
2439 bottom = 0;
2440 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2441 {
2442 icon = p->data;
2443
2444 have_stored_position = FALSE(0);
2445 g_signal_emit (container,
2446 signals[GET_STORED_ICON_POSITION], 0,
2447 icon->data,
2448 &position,
2449 &have_stored_position);
2450 if (have_stored_position)
2451 {
2452 icon_set_position_full (icon, position.x, position.y,
2453 /* if only layout changed, don't bother
2454 * updating already valid info. If however
2455 * e.g. zoom changed, x and y might now be
2456 * overflowing and need recomputing */
2457 !layout_changed);
2458 item = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))));
2459 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_bounds_for_layout (icon->item,
2460 &bounds.x0,
2461 &bounds.y0,
2462 &bounds.x1,
2463 &bounds.y1);
2464 eel_canvas_item_i2w (item->parent,
2465 &bounds.x0,
2466 &bounds.y0);
2467 eel_canvas_item_i2w (item->parent,
2468 &bounds.x1,
2469 &bounds.y1);
2470 if (bounds.y1 > bottom)
2471 {
2472 bottom = bounds.y1;
2473 }
2474 }
2475 else if (layout_changed)
2476 {
2477 no_position_icons = g_list_prepend (no_position_icons, icon);
2478 }
2479 }
2480
2481 if (layout_changed)
2482 {
2483 /* If layout changed, place all the other icons that don't have stored
2484 * positions yet */
2485 no_position_icons = g_list_reverse (no_position_icons);
2486 lay_down_icons (container, no_position_icons, bottom + ICON_PAD_BOTTOM4);
2487 }
2488
2489 g_list_free (no_position_icons);
2490}
2491
2492/* Container-level icon handling functions. */
2493
2494static gboolean
2495button_event_modifies_selection (GdkEventButton *event)
2496{
2497 return (event->state & (GDK_CONTROL_MASK | GDK_SHIFT_MASK)) != 0;
2498}
2499
2500/* invalidate the cached label sizes for all the icons */
2501static void
2502invalidate_label_sizes (CajaIconContainer *container)
2503{
2504 GList *p;
2505 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2506
2507 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2508 {
2509 icon = p->data;
2510
2511 caja_icon_canvas_item_invalidate_label_size (icon->item);
2512 }
2513}
2514
2515/* invalidate the entire labels (i.e. their attributes) for all the icons */
2516static void
2517invalidate_labels (CajaIconContainer *container)
2518{
2519 GList *p;
2520 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2521
2522 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2523 {
2524 icon = p->data;
2525
2526 caja_icon_canvas_item_invalidate_label (icon->item);
2527 }
2528}
2529
2530static gboolean
2531select_range (CajaIconContainer *container,
2532 CajaIcon *icon1,
2533 CajaIcon *icon2,
2534 gboolean unselect_outside_range)
2535{
2536 gboolean selection_changed;
2537 GList *p;
2538 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2539 CajaIcon *unmatched_icon;
2540 gboolean select;
2541
2542 selection_changed = FALSE(0);
2543
2544 unmatched_icon = NULL((void*)0);
2545 select = FALSE(0);
2546 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2547 {
2548 icon = p->data;
2549
2550 if (unmatched_icon == NULL((void*)0))
2551 {
2552 if (icon == icon1)
2553 {
2554 unmatched_icon = icon2;
2555 select = TRUE(!(0));
2556 }
2557 else if (icon == icon2)
2558 {
2559 unmatched_icon = icon1;
2560 select = TRUE(!(0));
2561 }
2562 }
2563
2564 if (select || unselect_outside_range)
2565 {
2566 selection_changed |= icon_set_selected
2567 (container, icon, select);
2568 }
2569
2570 if (unmatched_icon != NULL((void*)0) && icon == unmatched_icon)
2571 {
2572 select = FALSE(0);
2573 }
2574
2575 }
2576
2577 if (selection_changed && icon2 != NULL((void*)0))
2578 {
2579 emit_atk_focus_state_change (icon2, TRUE(!(0)));
2580 }
2581 return selection_changed;
2582}
2583
2584static gboolean
2585select_one_unselect_others (CajaIconContainer *container,
2586 CajaIcon *icon_to_select)
2587{
2588 gboolean selection_changed;
2589 GList *p;
2590 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2591
2592 selection_changed = FALSE(0);
2593
2594 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2595 {
2596 icon = p->data;
2597
2598 selection_changed |= icon_set_selected
2599 (container, icon, icon == icon_to_select);
2600 }
2601
2602 if (selection_changed && icon_to_select != NULL((void*)0))
2603 {
2604 emit_atk_focus_state_change (icon_to_select, TRUE(!(0)));
2605 reveal_icon (container, icon_to_select);
2606 }
2607 return selection_changed;
2608}
2609
2610static gboolean
2611unselect_all (CajaIconContainer *container)
2612{
2613 return select_one_unselect_others (container, NULL((void*)0));
2614}
2615
2616void
2617caja_icon_container_move_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
2618 CajaIcon *icon,
2619 int x, int y,
2620 double scale,
2621 gboolean raise,
2622 gboolean snap,
2623 gboolean update_position)
2624{
2625 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
2626 gboolean emit_signal;
2627 CajaIconPosition position;
2628
2629 details = container->details;
2630
2631 emit_signal = FALSE(0);
2632
2633 if (icon == get_icon_being_renamed (container))
2634 {
2635 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
2636 }
2637
2638 if (scale != icon->scale)
2639 {
2640 icon->scale = scale;
2641 caja_icon_container_update_icon (container, icon);
2642 if (update_position)
2643 {
2644 redo_layout (container);
2645 emit_signal = TRUE(!(0));
2646 }
2647 }
2648
2649 if (!details->auto_layout && !details->lock_icons_position)
2650 {
2651 if (details->keep_aligned && snap)
2652 {
2653 snap_position (container, icon, &x, &y);
2654 }
2655
2656 if (x != icon->x || y != icon->y)
2657 {
2658 icon_set_position (icon, x, y);
2659 emit_signal = update_position;
2660 }
2661
2662 icon->saved_ltr_x = caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container) ? get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, icon->x) : icon->x;
2663 }
2664
2665 if (emit_signal)
2666 {
2667 position.x = icon->saved_ltr_x;
2668 position.y = icon->y;
2669 position.scale = scale;
2670 g_signal_emit (container,
2671 signals[ICON_POSITION_CHANGED], 0,
2672 icon->data, &position);
2673 }
2674
2675 if (raise)
2676 {
2677 icon_raise (icon);
2678 }
2679
2680 /* FIXME bugzilla.gnome.org 42474:
2681 * Handling of the scroll region is inconsistent here. In
2682 * the scale-changing case, redo_layout is called, which updates the
2683 * scroll region appropriately. In other cases, it's up to the
2684 * caller to make sure the scroll region is updated. This could
2685 * lead to hard-to-track-down bugs.
2686 */
2687}
2688
2689/* Implementation of rubberband selection. */
2690static void
2691rubberband_select (CajaIconContainer *container,
2692 const EelDRect *previous_rect,
2693 const EelDRect *current_rect)
2694{
2695 GList *p;
2696 gboolean selection_changed, is_in, canvas_rect_calculated;
2697 EelIRect canvas_rect;
2698 EelCanvas *canvas;
2699 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
2700
2701 selection_changed = FALSE(0);
2702 canvas_rect_calculated = FALSE(0);
2703
2704 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
2705 {
2706 icon = p->data;
2707
2708 if (!canvas_rect_calculated)
2709 {
2710 /* Only do this calculation once, since all the canvas items
2711 * we are interating are in the same coordinate space
2712 */
2713 canvas = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))))->canvas;
2714 eel_canvas_w2c (canvas,
2715 current_rect->x0,
2716 current_rect->y0,
2717 &canvas_rect.x0,
2718 &canvas_rect.y0);
2719 eel_canvas_w2c (canvas,
2720 current_rect->x1,
2721 current_rect->y1,
2722 &canvas_rect.x1,
2723 &canvas_rect.y1);
2724 canvas_rect_calculated = TRUE(!(0));
2725 }
2726
2727 is_in = caja_icon_canvas_item_hit_test_rectangle (icon->item, canvas_rect);
2728
2729 selection_changed |= icon_set_selected
2730 (container, icon,
2731 is_in ^ icon->was_selected_before_rubberband);
2732 }
2733
2734 if (selection_changed)
2735 {
2736 g_signal_emit (container,
2737 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
2738 }
2739}
2740
2741static int
2742rubberband_timeout_callback (gpointer data)
2743{
2744 CajaIconContainer *container;
2745 GtkWidget *widget;
2746 CajaIconRubberbandInfo *band_info;
2747 int x, y;
2748 double x1, y1, x2, y2;
2749 double world_x, world_y;
2750 int x_scroll, y_scroll;
2751 int adj_x, adj_y;
2752 GdkDisplay *display;
2753 GdkSeat *seat;
2754 gboolean adj_changed;
2755 GtkAllocation allocation;
2756
2757 EelDRect selection_rect;
2758
2759 widget = GTK_WIDGET (data)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((data)))));
2760 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((data)))));
2761 band_info = &container->details->rubberband_info;
2762
2763 g_assert (band_info->timer_id != 0)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_140
; if (band_info->timer_id != 0) _g_boolean_var_140 = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_140 = 0; _g_boolean_var_140; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 2763, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "band_info->timer_id != 0"); } while (0);
2764 g_assert (EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle) ||do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_141
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((band_info->selection_rectangle)); GType __t = ((eel_canvas_rect_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) || (((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((band_info->selection_rectangle)); GType __t = ((eel_canvas_rect_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_141 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_141 =
0; _g_boolean_var_141; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 2765, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle) || EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle)"
); } while (0)
2765 EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_141
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((band_info->selection_rectangle)); GType __t = ((eel_canvas_rect_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))) || (((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((band_info->selection_rectangle)); GType __t = ((eel_canvas_rect_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_141 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_141 =
0; _g_boolean_var_141; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 2765, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle) || EEL_IS_CANVAS_RECT (band_info->selection_rectangle)"
); } while (0);
2766
2767 adj_changed = FALSE(0);
2768 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &allocation);
2769
2770 adj_x = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
2771 if (adj_x != band_info->last_adj_x)
2772 {
2773 band_info->last_adj_x = adj_x;
2774 adj_changed = TRUE(!(0));
2775 }
2776
2777 adj_y = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
2778 if (adj_y != band_info->last_adj_y)
2779 {
2780 band_info->last_adj_y = adj_y;
2781 adj_changed = TRUE(!(0));
2782 }
2783 display = gtk_widget_get_display (widget);
2784 seat = gdk_display_get_default_seat (display);
2785
2786 gdk_window_get_device_position (gtk_widget_get_window (widget),
2787 gdk_seat_get_pointer (seat),
2788 &x, &y, NULL((void*)0));
2789
2790 if (x < 0)
2791 {
2792 x_scroll = x;
2793 x = 0;
2794 }
2795 else if (x >= allocation.width)
2796 {
2797 x_scroll = x - allocation.width + 1;
2798 x = allocation.width - 1;
2799 }
2800 else
2801 {
2802 x_scroll = 0;
2803 }
2804
2805 if (y < 0)
2806 {
2807 y_scroll = y;
2808 y = 0;
2809 }
2810 else if (y >= allocation.height)
2811 {
2812 y_scroll = y - allocation.height + 1;
2813 y = allocation.height - 1;
2814 }
2815 else
2816 {
2817 y_scroll = 0;
2818 }
2819
2820 if (y_scroll == 0 && x_scroll == 0
2821 && (int) band_info->prev_x == x && (int) band_info->prev_y == y && !adj_changed)
2822 {
2823 return TRUE(!(0));
2824 }
2825
2826 caja_icon_container_scroll (container, x_scroll, y_scroll);
2827
2828 /* Remember to convert from widget to scrolled window coords */
2829 eel_canvas_window_to_world (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
2830 x + gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))))),
2831 y + gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))))),
2832 &world_x, &world_y);
2833
2834 if (world_x < band_info->start_x)
2835 {
2836 x1 = world_x;
2837 x2 = band_info->start_x;
2838 }
2839 else
2840 {
2841 x1 = band_info->start_x;
2842 x2 = world_x;
2843 }
2844
2845 if (world_y < band_info->start_y)
2846 {
2847 y1 = world_y;
2848 y2 = band_info->start_y;
2849 }
2850 else
2851 {
2852 y1 = band_info->start_y;
2853 y2 = world_y;
2854 }
2855
2856 /* Don't let the area of the selection rectangle be empty.
2857 * Aside from the fact that it would be funny when the rectangle disappears,
2858 * this also works around a crash in libart that happens sometimes when a
2859 * zero height rectangle is passed.
2860 */
2861 x2 = MAX (x1 + 1, x2)(((x1 + 1) > (x2)) ? (x1 + 1) : (x2));
2862 y2 = MAX (y1 + 1, y2)(((y1 + 1) > (y2)) ? (y1 + 1) : (y2));
2863
2864 eel_canvas_item_set
2865 (band_info->selection_rectangle,
2866 "x1", x1, "y1", y1,
2867 "x2", x2, "y2", y2,
2868 NULL((void*)0));
2869
2870 selection_rect.x0 = x1;
2871 selection_rect.y0 = y1;
2872 selection_rect.x1 = x2;
2873 selection_rect.y1 = y2;
2874
2875 rubberband_select (container,
2876 &band_info->prev_rect,
2877 &selection_rect);
2878
2879 band_info->prev_x = x;
2880 band_info->prev_y = y;
2881
2882 band_info->prev_rect = selection_rect;
2883
2884 return TRUE(!(0));
2885}
2886
2887/*borrowed from Nemo, makes Caja rubberbanding follow same selectors as Nemo and presumably Nautilus */
2888static void
2889start_rubberbanding (CajaIconContainer *container,
2890 GdkEventButton *event)
2891{
2892 AtkObject *accessible;
2893 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
2894 CajaIconRubberbandInfo *band_info;
2895 GdkRGBA bg_color, border_color;
2896 GdkRGBA *c;
2897 GList *p;
2898 CajaIcon *icon;
2899 GtkStyleContext *context;
2900
2901 details = container->details;
2902 band_info = &details->rubberband_info;
2903
2904 g_signal_emit (container,
2905 signals[BAND_SELECT_STARTED], 0);
2906
2907 for (p = details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next) {
2908 icon = p->data;
2909 icon->was_selected_before_rubberband = icon->is_selected;
2910 }
2911
2912 eel_canvas_window_to_world
2913 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), event->x, event->y,
2914 &band_info->start_x, &band_info->start_y);
2915
2916 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
2917 gtk_style_context_save (context);
2918 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, GTK_STYLE_CLASS_RUBBERBAND"rubberband");
2919
2920 gtk_style_context_get (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_NORMAL,
2921 GTK_STYLE_PROPERTY_BACKGROUND_COLOR"background-color",
2922 &c, NULL((void*)0));
2923
2924 bg_color = *c;
2925
2926 gtk_style_context_get (context, GTK_STATE_FLAG_NORMAL,
2927 GTK_STYLE_PROPERTY_BORDER_COLOR"border-color",
2928 &c, NULL((void*)0));
2929
2930 border_color = *c;
2931 gdk_rgba_free (c);
2932
2933 gtk_style_context_restore (context);
2934
2935 band_info->selection_rectangle = eel_canvas_item_new
2936 (eel_canvas_root
2937 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))))),
2938 EEL_TYPE_CANVAS_RECT(eel_canvas_rect_get_type ()),
2939 "x1", band_info->start_x,
2940 "y1", band_info->start_y,
2941 "x2", band_info->start_x,
2942 "y2", band_info->start_y,
2943 "fill_color_rgba", &bg_color,
2944 "outline_color_rgba", &border_color,
2945 "width_pixels", 1,
2946 NULL((void*)0));
2947
2948 accessible = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object
2949 (G_OBJECT (band_info->selection_rectangle)((((GObject*) (void *) ((band_info->selection_rectangle)))
)));
2950 atk_object_set_name (accessible, "selection");
2951 atk_object_set_description (accessible, _("The selection rectangle")dcgettext (((void*)0), "The selection rectangle", 5));
2952
2953 band_info->prev_x = event->x - gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
2954 band_info->prev_y = event->y - gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
2955
2956 band_info->active = TRUE(!(0));
2957
2958 if (band_info->timer_id == 0) {
2959 band_info->timer_id = g_timeout_add
2960 (RUBBERBAND_TIMEOUT_INTERVAL10,
2961 rubberband_timeout_callback,
2962 container);
2963 }
2964
2965 eel_canvas_item_grab (band_info->selection_rectangle,
2966 (GDK_POINTER_MOTION_MASK
2967 | GDK_BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK
2968 | GDK_SCROLL_MASK),
2969 NULL((void*)0),
2970 (GdkEvent *)event);
2971}
2972
2973static void
2974stop_rubberbanding (CajaIconContainer *container)
2975{
2976 CajaIconRubberbandInfo *band_info;
2977 GList *icons;
2978
2979 band_info = &container->details->rubberband_info;
2980
2981 g_assert (band_info->timer_id != 0)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_142
; if (band_info->timer_id != 0) _g_boolean_var_142 = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_142 = 0; _g_boolean_var_142; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 2981, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "band_info->timer_id != 0"); } while (0);
2982 g_source_remove (band_info->timer_id);
2983 band_info->timer_id = 0;
2984
2985 band_info->active = FALSE(0);
2986
2987 /* Destroy this canvas item; the parent will unref it. */
2988 eel_canvas_item_ungrab (band_info->selection_rectangle);
2989 eel_canvas_item_destroy (band_info->selection_rectangle);
2990 band_info->selection_rectangle = NULL((void*)0);
2991
2992 /* if only one item has been selected, use it as range
2993 * selection base (cf. handle_icon_button_press) */
2994 icons = caja_icon_container_get_selected_icons (container);
2995 if (g_list_length (icons) == 1)
2996 {
2997 container->details->range_selection_base_icon = icons->data;
2998 }
2999 g_list_free (icons);
3000
3001 g_signal_emit (container,
3002 signals[BAND_SELECT_ENDED], 0);
3003}
3004
3005/* Keyboard navigation. */
3006
3007typedef gboolean (* IsBetterIconFunction) (CajaIconContainer *container,
3008 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3009 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3010 CajaIcon *candidate,
3011 void *data);
3012
3013static CajaIcon *
3014find_best_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
3015 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3016 IsBetterIconFunction function,
3017 void *data)
3018{
3019 GList *p;
3020 CajaIcon *best, *candidate;
3021
3022 best = NULL((void*)0);
3023 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
3024 {
3025 candidate = p->data;
3026
3027 if (candidate != start_icon)
3028 {
3029 if ((* function) (container, start_icon, best, candidate, data))
3030 {
3031 best = candidate;
3032 }
3033 }
3034 }
3035 return best;
3036}
3037
3038static CajaIcon *
3039find_best_selected_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
3040 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3041 IsBetterIconFunction function,
3042 void *data)
3043{
3044 GList *p;
3045 CajaIcon *best, *candidate;
3046
3047 best = NULL((void*)0);
3048 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
3049 {
3050 candidate = p->data;
3051
3052 if (candidate != start_icon && candidate->is_selected)
3053 {
3054 if ((* function) (container, start_icon, best, candidate, data))
3055 {
3056 best = candidate;
3057 }
3058 }
3059 }
3060 return best;
3061}
3062
3063static int
3064compare_icons_by_uri (CajaIconContainer *container,
3065 CajaIcon *icon_a,
3066 CajaIcon *icon_b)
3067{
3068 char *uri_a, *uri_b;
3069 int result;
3070
3071 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_143
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_143 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_143 =
0; _g_boolean_var_143; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 3071, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
3072 g_assert (icon_a != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_144
; if (icon_a != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_144 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_144
= 0; _g_boolean_var_144; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 3072, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "icon_a != NULL"); } while (0);
3073 g_assert (icon_b != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_145
; if (icon_b != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_145 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_145
= 0; _g_boolean_var_145; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 3073, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "icon_b != NULL"); } while (0);
3074 g_assert (icon_a != icon_b)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_146
; if (icon_a != icon_b) _g_boolean_var_146 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_146
= 0; _g_boolean_var_146; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 3074, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "icon_a != icon_b"); } while (0);
3075
3076 uri_a = caja_icon_container_get_icon_uri (container, icon_a);
3077 uri_b = caja_icon_container_get_icon_uri (container, icon_b);
3078 result = strcmp (uri_a, uri_b);
3079 g_assert (result != 0)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_147
; if (result != 0) _g_boolean_var_147 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_147
= 0; _g_boolean_var_147; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 3079, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "result != 0"); } while (0);
3080 g_free (uri_a);
3081 g_free (uri_b);
3082
3083 return result;
3084}
3085
3086static int
3087get_cmp_point_x (CajaIconContainer *container,
3088 EelDRect icon_rect)
3089{
3090 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
3091 {
3092 if (gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
3093 {
3094 return icon_rect.x0;
3095 }
3096 else
3097 {
3098 return icon_rect.x1;
3099 }
3100 }
3101 else
3102 {
3103 return (icon_rect.x0 + icon_rect.x1) / 2;
3104 }
3105}
3106
3107static int
3108get_cmp_point_y (CajaIconContainer *container,
3109 EelDRect icon_rect)
3110{
3111 if (container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
3112 {
3113 return (icon_rect.y0 + icon_rect.y1)/2;
3114 }
3115 else
3116 {
3117 return icon_rect.y1;
3118 }
3119}
3120
3121static int
3122compare_icons_horizontal (CajaIconContainer *container,
3123 CajaIcon *icon_a,
3124 CajaIcon *icon_b)
3125{
3126 EelDRect world_rect;
3127 int ax, bx;
3128
3129 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_a->item);
3130 eel_canvas_w2c
3131 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3132 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3133 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3134 &ax,
3135 NULL((void*)0));
3136 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_b->item);
3137 eel_canvas_w2c
3138 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3139 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3140 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3141 &bx,
3142 NULL((void*)0));
3143
3144 if (ax < bx)
3145 {
3146 return -1;
3147 }
3148 if (ax > bx)
3149 {
3150 return +1;
3151 }
3152 return 0;
3153}
3154
3155static int
3156compare_icons_vertical (CajaIconContainer *container,
3157 CajaIcon *icon_a,
3158 CajaIcon *icon_b)
3159{
3160 EelDRect world_rect;
3161 int ay, by;
3162
3163 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_a->item);
3164 eel_canvas_w2c
3165 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3166 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3167 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3168 NULL((void*)0),
3169 &ay);
3170 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_b->item);
3171 eel_canvas_w2c
3172 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3173 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3174 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3175 NULL((void*)0),
3176 &by);
3177
3178 if (ay < by)
3179 {
3180 return -1;
3181 }
3182 if (ay > by)
3183 {
3184 return +1;
3185 }
3186 return 0;
3187}
3188
3189static int
3190compare_icons_horizontal_first (CajaIconContainer *container,
3191 CajaIcon *icon_a,
3192 CajaIcon *icon_b)
3193{
3194 EelDRect world_rect;
3195 int ax, ay, bx, by;
3196
3197 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_a->item);
3198 eel_canvas_w2c
3199 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3200 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3201 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3202 &ax,
3203 &ay);
3204 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_b->item);
3205 eel_canvas_w2c
3206 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3207 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3208 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3209 &bx,
3210 &by);
3211
3212 if (ax < bx)
3213 {
3214 return -1;
3215 }
3216 if (ax > bx)
3217 {
3218 return +1;
3219 }
3220 if (ay < by)
3221 {
3222 return -1;
3223 }
3224 if (ay > by)
3225 {
3226 return +1;
3227 }
3228 return compare_icons_by_uri (container, icon_a, icon_b);
3229}
3230
3231static int
3232compare_icons_vertical_first (CajaIconContainer *container,
3233 CajaIcon *icon_a,
3234 CajaIcon *icon_b)
3235{
3236 EelDRect world_rect;
3237 int ax, ay, bx, by;
3238
3239 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_a->item);
3240 eel_canvas_w2c
3241 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3242 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3243 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3244 &ax,
3245 &ay);
3246 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon_b->item);
3247 eel_canvas_w2c
3248 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3249 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3250 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3251 &bx,
3252 &by);
3253
3254 if (ay < by)
3255 {
3256 return -1;
3257 }
3258 if (ay > by)
3259 {
3260 return +1;
3261 }
3262 if (ax < bx)
3263 {
3264 return -1;
3265 }
3266 if (ax > bx)
3267 {
3268 return +1;
3269 }
3270 return compare_icons_by_uri (container, icon_a, icon_b);
3271}
3272
3273static gboolean
3274leftmost_in_top_row (CajaIconContainer *container,
3275 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3276 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3277 CajaIcon *candidate,
3278 void *data)
3279{
3280 if (best_so_far == NULL((void*)0))
3281 {
3282 return TRUE(!(0));
3283 }
3284 return compare_icons_vertical_first (container, best_so_far, candidate) > 0;
3285}
3286
3287static gboolean
3288rightmost_in_top_row (CajaIconContainer *container,
3289 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3290 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3291 CajaIcon *candidate,
3292 void *data)
3293{
3294 if (best_so_far == NULL((void*)0))
3295 {
3296 return TRUE(!(0));
3297 }
3298 return ((compare_icons_vertical (container, best_so_far, candidate) > 0) &&
3299 (compare_icons_horizontal (container, best_so_far, candidate) < 0));
3300}
3301
3302static gboolean
3303rightmost_in_bottom_row (CajaIconContainer *container,
3304 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3305 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3306 CajaIcon *candidate,
3307 void *data)
3308{
3309 if (best_so_far == NULL((void*)0))
3310 {
3311 return TRUE(!(0));
3312 }
3313 return compare_icons_vertical_first (container, best_so_far, candidate) < 0;
3314}
3315
3316static int
3317compare_with_start_row (CajaIconContainer *container,
3318 CajaIcon *icon)
3319{
3320 EelCanvasItem *item;
3321
3322 item = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))));
3323
3324 if (container->details->arrow_key_start_y < item->y1)
3325 {
3326 return -1;
3327 }
3328 if (container->details->arrow_key_start_y > item->y2)
3329 {
3330 return +1;
3331 }
3332 return 0;
3333}
3334
3335static int
3336compare_with_start_column (CajaIconContainer *container,
3337 CajaIcon *icon)
3338{
3339 EelCanvasItem *item;
3340
3341 item = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))));
3342
3343 if (container->details->arrow_key_start_x < item->x1)
3344 {
3345 return -1;
3346 }
3347 if (container->details->arrow_key_start_x > item->x2)
3348 {
3349 return +1;
3350 }
3351 return 0;
3352}
3353
3354static gboolean
3355same_row_right_side_leftmost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3356 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3357 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3358 CajaIcon *candidate,
3359 void *data)
3360{
3361 /* Candidates not on the start row do not qualify. */
3362 if (compare_with_start_row (container, candidate) != 0)
3363 {
3364 return FALSE(0);
3365 }
3366
3367 /* Candidates that are farther right lose out. */
3368 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3369 {
3370 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3371 best_so_far,
3372 candidate) < 0)
3373 {
3374 return FALSE(0);
3375 }
3376 }
3377
3378 /* Candidate to the left of the start do not qualify. */
3379 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3380 candidate,
3381 start_icon) <= 0)
3382 {
3383 return FALSE(0);
3384 }
3385
3386 return TRUE(!(0));
3387}
3388
3389static gboolean
3390same_row_left_side_rightmost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3391 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3392 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3393 CajaIcon *candidate,
3394 void *data)
3395{
3396 /* Candidates not on the start row do not qualify. */
3397 if (compare_with_start_row (container, candidate) != 0)
3398 {
3399 return FALSE(0);
3400 }
3401
3402 /* Candidates that are farther left lose out. */
3403 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3404 {
3405 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3406 best_so_far,
3407 candidate) > 0)
3408 {
3409 return FALSE(0);
3410 }
3411 }
3412
3413 /* Candidate to the right of the start do not qualify. */
3414 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3415 candidate,
3416 start_icon) >= 0)
3417 {
3418 return FALSE(0);
3419 }
3420
3421 return TRUE(!(0));
3422}
3423
3424static gboolean
3425next_row_leftmost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3426 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3427 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3428 CajaIcon *candidate,
3429 void *data)
3430{
3431 /* sort out icons that are not below the current row */
3432 if (compare_with_start_row (container, candidate) >= 0)
3433 {
3434 return FALSE(0);
3435 }
3436
3437 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3438 {
3439 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3440 best_so_far,
3441 candidate) > 0)
3442 {
3443 /* candidate is above best choice, but below the current row */
3444 return TRUE(!(0));
3445 }
3446
3447 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3448 best_so_far,
3449 candidate) > 0)
3450 {
3451 return TRUE(!(0));
3452 }
3453 }
3454
3455 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3456}
3457
3458static gboolean
3459next_row_rightmost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3460 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3461 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3462 CajaIcon *candidate,
3463 void *data)
3464{
3465 /* sort out icons that are not below the current row */
3466 if (compare_with_start_row (container, candidate) >= 0)
3467 {
3468 return FALSE(0);
3469 }
3470
3471 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3472 {
3473 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3474 best_so_far,
3475 candidate) > 0)
3476 {
3477 /* candidate is above best choice, but below the current row */
3478 return TRUE(!(0));
3479 }
3480
3481 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3482 best_so_far,
3483 candidate) < 0)
3484 {
3485 return TRUE(!(0));
3486 }
3487 }
3488
3489 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3490}
3491
3492static gboolean
3493next_column_bottommost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3494 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3495 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3496 CajaIcon *candidate,
3497 void *data)
3498{
3499 /* sort out icons that are not on the right of the current column */
3500 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) >= 0)
3501 {
3502 return FALSE(0);
3503 }
3504
3505 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3506 {
3507 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3508 best_so_far,
3509 candidate) > 0)
3510 {
3511 /* candidate is above best choice, but below the current row */
3512 return TRUE(!(0));
3513 }
3514
3515 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3516 best_so_far,
3517 candidate) < 0)
3518 {
3519 return TRUE(!(0));
3520 }
3521 }
3522
3523 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3524}
3525
3526static gboolean
3527previous_row_rightmost (CajaIconContainer *container,
3528 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3529 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3530 CajaIcon *candidate,
3531 void *data)
3532{
3533 /* sort out icons that are not above the current row */
3534 if (compare_with_start_row (container, candidate) <= 0)
3535 {
3536 return FALSE(0);
3537 }
3538
3539 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3540 {
3541 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3542 best_so_far,
3543 candidate) < 0)
3544 {
3545 /* candidate is below the best choice, but above the current row */
3546 return TRUE(!(0));
3547 }
3548
3549 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3550 best_so_far,
3551 candidate) < 0)
3552 {
3553 return TRUE(!(0));
3554 }
3555 }
3556
3557 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3558}
3559
3560static gboolean
3561same_column_above_lowest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3562 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3563 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3564 CajaIcon *candidate,
3565 void *data)
3566{
3567 /* Candidates not on the start column do not qualify. */
3568 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) != 0)
3569 {
3570 return FALSE(0);
3571 }
3572
3573 /* Candidates that are higher lose out. */
3574 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3575 {
3576 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3577 best_so_far,
3578 candidate) > 0)
3579 {
3580 return FALSE(0);
3581 }
3582 }
3583
3584 /* Candidates below the start do not qualify. */
3585 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3586 candidate,
3587 start_icon) >= 0)
3588 {
3589 return FALSE(0);
3590 }
3591
3592 return TRUE(!(0));
3593}
3594
3595static gboolean
3596same_column_below_highest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3597 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3598 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3599 CajaIcon *candidate,
3600 void *data)
3601{
3602 /* Candidates not on the start column do not qualify. */
3603 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) != 0)
3604 {
3605 return FALSE(0);
3606 }
3607
3608 /* Candidates that are lower lose out. */
3609 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3610 {
3611 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3612 best_so_far,
3613 candidate) < 0)
3614 {
3615 return FALSE(0);
3616 }
3617 }
3618
3619 /* Candidates above the start do not qualify. */
3620 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3621 candidate,
3622 start_icon) <= 0)
3623 {
3624 return FALSE(0);
3625 }
3626
3627 return TRUE(!(0));
3628}
3629
3630static gboolean
3631previous_column_highest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3632 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3633 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3634 CajaIcon *candidate,
3635 void *data)
3636{
3637 /* sort out icons that are not before the current column */
3638 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) <= 0)
3639 {
3640 return FALSE(0);
3641 }
3642
3643 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3644 {
3645 if (compare_icons_horizontal (container,
3646 best_so_far,
3647 candidate) < 0)
3648 {
3649 /* candidate is right of the best choice, but left of the current column */
3650 return TRUE(!(0));
3651 }
3652
3653 if (compare_icons_vertical (container,
3654 best_so_far,
3655 candidate) > 0)
3656 {
3657 return TRUE(!(0));
3658 }
3659 }
3660
3661 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3662}
3663
3664static gboolean
3665next_column_highest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3666 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3667 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3668 CajaIcon *candidate,
3669 void *data)
3670{
3671 /* sort out icons that are not after the current column */
3672 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) >= 0)
3673 {
3674 return FALSE(0);
3675 }
3676
3677 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3678 {
3679 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3680 best_so_far,
3681 candidate) > 0)
3682 {
3683 /* candidate is left of the best choice, but right of the current column */
3684 return TRUE(!(0));
3685 }
3686
3687 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3688 best_so_far,
3689 candidate) > 0)
3690 {
3691 return TRUE(!(0));
3692 }
3693 }
3694
3695 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3696}
3697
3698static gboolean
3699previous_column_lowest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3700 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3701 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3702 CajaIcon *candidate,
3703 void *data)
3704{
3705 /* sort out icons that are not before the current column */
3706 if (compare_with_start_column (container, candidate) <= 0)
3707 {
3708 return FALSE(0);
3709 }
3710
3711 if (best_so_far != NULL((void*)0))
3712 {
3713 if (compare_icons_horizontal_first (container,
3714 best_so_far,
3715 candidate) < 0)
3716 {
3717 /* candidate is right of the best choice, but left of the current column */
3718 return TRUE(!(0));
3719 }
3720
3721 if (compare_icons_vertical_first (container,
3722 best_so_far,
3723 candidate) < 0)
3724 {
3725 return TRUE(!(0));
3726 }
3727 }
3728
3729 return best_so_far == NULL((void*)0);
3730}
3731
3732static gboolean
3733last_column_lowest (CajaIconContainer *container,
3734 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3735 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3736 CajaIcon *candidate,
3737 void *data)
3738{
3739 if (best_so_far == NULL((void*)0))
3740 {
3741 return TRUE(!(0));
3742 }
3743 return compare_icons_horizontal_first (container, best_so_far, candidate) < 0;
3744}
3745
3746static gboolean
3747closest_in_90_degrees (CajaIconContainer *container,
3748 CajaIcon *start_icon,
3749 CajaIcon *best_so_far,
3750 CajaIcon *candidate,
3751 void *data)
3752{
3753 EelDRect world_rect;
3754 int x, y;
3755 int dx, dy;
3756 int dist;
3757 int *best_dist;
3758
3759 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (candidate->item);
3760 eel_canvas_w2c
3761 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3762 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3763 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3764 &x,
3765 &y);
3766
3767 dx = x - container->details->arrow_key_start_x;
3768 dy = y - container->details->arrow_key_start_y;
3769
3770 switch (container->details->arrow_key_direction)
3771 {
3772 case GTK_DIR_UP:
3773 if (dy > 0 ||
3774 ABS(dx)(((dx) < 0) ? -(dx) : (dx)) > ABS(dy)(((dy) < 0) ? -(dy) : (dy)))
3775 {
3776 return FALSE(0);
3777 }
3778 break;
3779 case GTK_DIR_DOWN:
3780 if (dy < 0 ||
3781 ABS(dx)(((dx) < 0) ? -(dx) : (dx)) > ABS(dy)(((dy) < 0) ? -(dy) : (dy)))
3782 {
3783 return FALSE(0);
3784 }
3785 break;
3786 case GTK_DIR_LEFT:
3787 if (dx > 0 ||
3788 ABS(dy)(((dy) < 0) ? -(dy) : (dy)) > ABS(dx)(((dx) < 0) ? -(dx) : (dx)))
3789 {
3790 return FALSE(0);
3791 }
3792 break;
3793 case GTK_DIR_RIGHT:
3794 if (dx < 0 ||
3795 ABS(dy)(((dy) < 0) ? -(dy) : (dy)) > ABS(dx)(((dx) < 0) ? -(dx) : (dx)))
3796 {
3797 return FALSE(0);
3798 }
3799 break;
3800 default:
3801 g_assert_not_reached()do { g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 3801, ((const char*) (__func__)), ((void*)0)); } while (0);
3802 }
3803
3804 dist = dx*dx + dy*dy;
3805 best_dist = data;
3806
3807 if (best_so_far == NULL((void*)0))
3808 {
3809 *best_dist = dist;
3810 return TRUE(!(0));
3811 }
3812
3813 if (dist < *best_dist)
3814 {
3815 *best_dist = dist;
3816 return TRUE(!(0));
3817 }
3818
3819 return FALSE(0);
3820}
3821
3822static EelDRect
3823get_rubberband (CajaIcon *icon1,
3824 CajaIcon *icon2)
3825{
3826 EelDRect rect1;
3827 EelDRect rect2;
3828 EelDRect ret;
3829
3830 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon1->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon1->item))))),
3831 &rect1.x0, &rect1.y0,
3832 &rect1.x1, &rect1.y1);
3833 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon2->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon2->item))))),
3834 &rect2.x0, &rect2.y0,
3835 &rect2.x1, &rect2.y1);
3836
3837 eel_drect_union (&ret, &rect1, &rect2);
3838
3839 return ret;
3840}
3841
3842static void
3843keyboard_move_to (CajaIconContainer *container,
3844 CajaIcon *icon,
3845 CajaIcon *from,
3846 GdkEventKey *event)
3847{
3848 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
3849 {
3850 return;
3851 }
3852
3853 if (event != NULL((void*)0) &&
3854 (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0 &&
3855 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) == 0)
3856 {
3857 /* Move the keyboard focus. Use Control modifier
3858 * rather than Alt to avoid Sawfish conflict.
3859 */
3860 set_keyboard_focus (container, icon);
3861 container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start = NULL((void*)0);
3862 }
3863 else if (event != NULL((void*)0) &&
3864 ((event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0 ||
3865 !container->details->auto_layout) &&
3866 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
3867 {
3868 /* Do rubberband selection */
3869 EelDRect rect;
3870
3871 if (from && !container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start)
3872 {
3873 set_keyboard_rubberband_start (container, from);
3874 }
3875
3876 set_keyboard_focus (container, icon);
3877
3878 if (icon && container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start)
3879 {
3880 rect = get_rubberband (container->details->keyboard_rubberband_start,
3881 icon);
3882 rubberband_select (container, NULL((void*)0), &rect);
3883 }
3884 }
3885 else if (event != NULL((void*)0) &&
3886 (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) == 0 &&
3887 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
3888 {
3889 /* Select range */
3890 CajaIcon *start_icon;
3891
3892 start_icon = container->details->range_selection_base_icon;
3893 if (start_icon == NULL((void*)0) || !start_icon->is_selected)
3894 {
3895 start_icon = icon;
3896 container->details->range_selection_base_icon = icon;
3897 }
3898
3899 set_keyboard_focus (container, icon);
3900
3901 if (select_range (container, start_icon, icon, TRUE(!(0))))
3902 {
3903 g_signal_emit (container,
3904 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
3905 }
3906 }
3907 else
3908 {
3909 /* Select icons and get rid of the special keyboard focus. */
3910 clear_keyboard_focus (container);
3911 clear_keyboard_rubberband_start (container);
3912
3913 container->details->range_selection_base_icon = icon;
3914 if (select_one_unselect_others (container, icon))
3915 {
3916 g_signal_emit (container,
3917 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
3918 }
3919 }
3920 schedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (container, icon);
3921}
3922
3923static void
3924keyboard_home (CajaIconContainer *container,
3925 GdkEventKey *event)
3926{
3927 CajaIcon *from;
3928 CajaIcon *to;
3929
3930 /* Home selects the first icon.
3931 * Control-Home sets the keyboard focus to the first icon.
3932 */
3933
3934 from = find_best_selected_icon (container, NULL((void*)0),
3935 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
3936 NULL((void*)0));
3937 to = find_best_icon (container, NULL((void*)0), leftmost_in_top_row, NULL((void*)0));
3938
3939 keyboard_move_to (container, to, from, event);
3940}
3941
3942static void
3943keyboard_end (CajaIconContainer *container,
3944 GdkEventKey *event)
3945{
3946 CajaIcon *to;
3947 CajaIcon *from;
3948
3949 /* End selects the last icon.
3950 * Control-End sets the keyboard focus to the last icon.
3951 */
3952 from = find_best_selected_icon (container, NULL((void*)0),
3953 leftmost_in_top_row,
3954 NULL((void*)0));
3955 to = find_best_icon (container, NULL((void*)0),
3956 caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) ?
3957 last_column_lowest :
3958 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
3959 NULL((void*)0));
3960
3961 keyboard_move_to (container, to, from, event);
3962}
3963
3964static void
3965record_arrow_key_start (CajaIconContainer *container,
3966 CajaIcon *icon,
3967 GtkDirectionType direction)
3968{
3969 EelDRect world_rect;
3970
3971 world_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
3972 eel_canvas_w2c
3973 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
3974 get_cmp_point_x (container, world_rect),
3975 get_cmp_point_y (container, world_rect),
3976 &container->details->arrow_key_start_x,
3977 &container->details->arrow_key_start_y);
3978 container->details->arrow_key_direction = direction;
3979}
3980
3981static void
3982keyboard_arrow_key (CajaIconContainer *container,
3983 GdkEventKey *event,
3984 GtkDirectionType direction,
3985 IsBetterIconFunction better_start,
3986 IsBetterIconFunction empty_start,
3987 IsBetterIconFunction better_destination,
3988 IsBetterIconFunction better_destination_fallback,
3989 IsBetterIconFunction better_destination_fallback_fallback,
3990 IsBetterIconFunction better_destination_manual)
3991{
3992 CajaIcon *from;
3993 CajaIcon *to;
3994 int data;
3995
3996 /* Chose the icon to start with.
3997 * If we have a keyboard focus, start with it.
3998 * Otherwise, use the single selected icon.
3999 * If there's multiple selection, use the icon farthest toward the end.
4000 */
4001
4002 from = container->details->keyboard_focus;
4003
4004 if (from == NULL((void*)0))
4005 {
4006 if (has_multiple_selection (container))
4007 {
4008 if (all_selected (container))
4009 {
4010 from = find_best_selected_icon
4011 (container, NULL((void*)0),
4012 empty_start, NULL((void*)0));
4013 }
4014 else
4015 {
4016 from = find_best_selected_icon
4017 (container, NULL((void*)0),
4018 better_start, NULL((void*)0));
4019 }
4020 }
4021 else
4022 {
4023 from = get_first_selected_icon (container);
4024 }
4025 }
4026
4027 /* If there's no icon, select the icon farthest toward the end.
4028 * If there is an icon, select the next icon based on the arrow direction.
4029 */
4030 if (from == NULL((void*)0))
4031 {
4032 to = from = find_best_icon
4033 (container, NULL((void*)0),
4034 empty_start, NULL((void*)0));
4035 }
4036 else
4037 {
4038 record_arrow_key_start (container, from, direction);
4039
4040 to = find_best_icon
4041 (container, from,
4042 container->details->auto_layout ? better_destination : better_destination_manual,
4043 &data);
4044
4045 /* Wrap around to next/previous row/column */
4046 if (to == NULL((void*)0) &&
4047 better_destination_fallback != NULL((void*)0)) {
4048 to = find_best_icon
4049 (container, from,
4050 better_destination_fallback,
4051 &data);
4052 }
4053
4054 /* With a layout like
4055 * 1 2 3
4056 * 4
4057 * (horizontal layout)
4058 *
4059 * or
4060 *
4061 * 1 4
4062 * 2
4063 * 3
4064 * (vertical layout)
4065 *
4066 * * pressing down for any of 1,2,3 (horizontal layout)
4067 * * pressing right for any of 1,2,3 (vertical layout)
4068 *
4069 * Should select 4.
4070 */
4071 if (to == NULL((void*)0) &&
4072 container->details->auto_layout &&
4073 better_destination_fallback_fallback != NULL((void*)0))
4074 {
4075 to = find_best_icon
4076 (container, from,
4077 better_destination_fallback_fallback,
4078 &data);
4079 }
4080
4081 if (to == NULL((void*)0))
4082 {
4083 to = from;
4084 }
4085
4086 }
4087
4088 keyboard_move_to (container, to, from, event);
4089}
4090
4091static gboolean
4092is_rectangle_selection_event (GdkEventKey *event)
4093{
4094 return (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0 &&
4095 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0;
4096}
4097
4098static void
4099keyboard_right (CajaIconContainer *container,
4100 GdkEventKey *event)
4101{
4102 IsBetterIconFunction fallback;
4103 IsBetterIconFunction next_column_fallback;
4104
4105 fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4106 if (container->details->auto_layout &&
4107 !caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4108 !is_rectangle_selection_event (event))
4109 {
4110 fallback = next_row_leftmost;
4111 }
4112
4113 next_column_fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4114 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4115 gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) != GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
4116 {
4117 next_column_fallback = next_column_bottommost;
4118 }
4119
4120 /* Right selects the next icon in the same row.
4121 * Control-Right sets the keyboard focus to the next icon in the same row.
4122 */
4123 keyboard_arrow_key (container,
4124 event,
4125 GTK_DIR_RIGHT,
4126 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
4127 caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container) ?
4128 rightmost_in_top_row : leftmost_in_top_row,
4129 same_row_right_side_leftmost,
4130 fallback,
4131 next_column_fallback,
4132 closest_in_90_degrees);
4133}
4134
4135static void
4136keyboard_left (CajaIconContainer *container,
4137 GdkEventKey *event)
4138{
4139 IsBetterIconFunction fallback;
4140 IsBetterIconFunction previous_column_fallback;
4141
4142 fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4143 if (container->details->auto_layout &&
4144 !caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4145 !is_rectangle_selection_event (event))
4146 {
4147 fallback = previous_row_rightmost;
4148 }
4149
4150 previous_column_fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4151 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4152 gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
4153 {
4154 previous_column_fallback = previous_column_lowest;
4155 }
4156
4157 /* Left selects the next icon in the same row.
4158 * Control-Left sets the keyboard focus to the next icon in the same row.
4159 */
4160 keyboard_arrow_key (container,
4161 event,
4162 GTK_DIR_LEFT,
4163 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
4164 caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container) ?
4165 rightmost_in_top_row : leftmost_in_top_row,
4166 same_row_left_side_rightmost,
4167 fallback,
4168 previous_column_fallback,
4169 closest_in_90_degrees);
4170}
4171
4172static void
4173keyboard_down (CajaIconContainer *container,
4174 GdkEventKey *event)
4175{
4176 IsBetterIconFunction fallback;
4177 IsBetterIconFunction next_row_fallback;
4178
4179 fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4180 if (container->details->auto_layout &&
4181 caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4182 !is_rectangle_selection_event (event))
4183 {
4184 if (gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
4185 {
4186 fallback = previous_column_highest;
4187 }
4188 else
4189 {
4190 fallback = next_column_highest;
4191 }
4192 }
4193
4194 next_row_fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4195 if (!caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
4196 {
4197 if (gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
4198 {
4199 next_row_fallback = next_row_leftmost;
4200 }
4201 else
4202 {
4203 next_row_fallback = next_row_rightmost;
4204 }
4205 }
4206
4207 /* Down selects the next icon in the same column.
4208 * Control-Down sets the keyboard focus to the next icon in the same column.
4209 */
4210 keyboard_arrow_key (container,
4211 event,
4212 GTK_DIR_DOWN,
4213 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
4214 caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container) ?
4215 rightmost_in_top_row : leftmost_in_top_row,
4216 same_column_below_highest,
4217 fallback,
4218 next_row_fallback,
4219 closest_in_90_degrees);
4220}
4221
4222static void
4223keyboard_up (CajaIconContainer *container,
4224 GdkEventKey *event)
4225{
4226 IsBetterIconFunction fallback;
4227
4228 fallback = NULL((void*)0);
4229 if (container->details->auto_layout &&
4230 caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
4231 !is_rectangle_selection_event (event))
4232 {
4233 if (gtk_widget_get_direction (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))) == GTK_TEXT_DIR_RTL)
4234 {
4235 fallback = next_column_bottommost;
4236 }
4237 else
4238 {
4239 fallback = previous_column_lowest;
4240 }
4241 }
4242
4243 /* Up selects the next icon in the same column.
4244 * Control-Up sets the keyboard focus to the next icon in the same column.
4245 */
4246 keyboard_arrow_key (container,
4247 event,
4248 GTK_DIR_UP,
4249 rightmost_in_bottom_row,
4250 caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container) ?
4251 rightmost_in_top_row : leftmost_in_top_row,
4252 same_column_above_lowest,
4253 fallback,
4254 NULL((void*)0),
4255 closest_in_90_degrees);
4256}
4257
4258static void
4259keyboard_space (CajaIconContainer *container,
4260 GdkEventKey *event)
4261{
4262 CajaIcon *icon;
4263
4264 if (!has_selection (container) &&
4265 container->details->keyboard_focus != NULL((void*)0))
4266 {
4267 keyboard_move_to (container,
4268 container->details->keyboard_focus,
4269 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
4270 }
4271 else if ((event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0 &&
4272 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) == 0)
4273 {
4274 /* Control-space toggles the selection state of the current icon. */
4275 if (container->details->keyboard_focus != NULL((void*)0))
4276 {
4277 icon_toggle_selected (container, container->details->keyboard_focus);
4278 g_signal_emit (container, signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4279 if (container->details->keyboard_focus->is_selected)
4280 {
4281 container->details->range_selection_base_icon = container->details->keyboard_focus;
4282 }
4283 }
4284 else
4285 {
4286 icon = find_best_selected_icon (container,
4287 NULL((void*)0),
4288 leftmost_in_top_row,
4289 NULL((void*)0));
4290 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
4291 {
4292 icon = find_best_icon (container,
4293 NULL((void*)0),
4294 leftmost_in_top_row,
4295 NULL((void*)0));
4296 }
4297 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
4298 {
4299 set_keyboard_focus (container, icon);
4300 }
4301 }
4302 }
4303 else if ((event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
4304 {
4305 activate_selected_items_alternate (container, NULL((void*)0));
4306 }
4307 else
4308 {
4309 activate_selected_items (container);
4310 }
4311}
4312
4313/* look for the first icon that matches the longest part of a given
4314 * search pattern
4315 */
4316typedef struct
4317{
4318 gunichar *name;
4319 int last_match_length;
4320} BestNameMatch;
4321
4322#ifndef TAB_NAVIGATION_DISABLED
4323static void
4324select_previous_or_next_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
4325 gboolean next,
4326 GdkEventKey *event)
4327{
4328 CajaIcon *icon;
4329 const GList *item;
4330
4331 item = NULL((void*)0);
4332 /* Chose the icon to start with.
4333 * If we have a keyboard focus, start with it.
4334 * Otherwise, use the single selected icon.
4335 */
4336 icon = container->details->keyboard_focus;
4337 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
4338 {
4339 icon = get_first_selected_icon (container);
4340 }
4341
4342 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
4343 {
4344 /* must have at least @icon in the list */
4345 g_assert (container->details->icons != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_148
; if (container->details->icons != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_148
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_148 = 0; _g_boolean_var_148; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 4345, ((const char*) (__func__)), "container->details->icons != NULL"
); } while (0);
4346 item = g_list_find (container->details->icons, icon);
4347 g_assert (item != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_149
; if (item != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_149 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_149
= 0; _g_boolean_var_149; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 4347, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "item != NULL"); } while (0);
4348
4349 item = next ? item->next : item->prev;
4350 if (item == NULL((void*)0))
4351 {
4352 item = next ? g_list_first (container->details->icons) : g_list_last (container->details->icons);
4353 }
4354
4355 }
4356 else if (container->details->icons != NULL((void*)0))
4357 {
4358 /* no selection yet, pick the first or last item to select */
4359 item = next ? g_list_first (container->details->icons) : g_list_last (container->details->icons);
4360 }
4361
4362 icon = (item != NULL((void*)0)) ? item->data : NULL((void*)0);
4363
4364 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
4365 {
4366 keyboard_move_to (container, icon, NULL((void*)0), event);
4367 }
4368}
4369#endif
4370
4371static void
4372destroy (GtkWidget *object)
4373{
4374 CajaIconContainer *container;
4375
4376 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (object)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((object)))));
4377
4378 caja_icon_container_clear (container);
4379
4380 if (container->details->rubberband_info.timer_id != 0)
4381 {
4382 g_source_remove (container->details->rubberband_info.timer_id);
4383 container->details->rubberband_info.timer_id = 0;
4384 }
4385
4386 if (container->details->idle_id != 0)
4387 {
4388 g_source_remove (container->details->idle_id);
4389 container->details->idle_id = 0;
4390 }
4391
4392 if (container->details->stretch_idle_id != 0)
4393 {
4394 g_source_remove (container->details->stretch_idle_id);
4395 container->details->stretch_idle_id = 0;
4396 }
4397
4398 if (container->details->align_idle_id != 0)
4399 {
4400 g_source_remove (container->details->align_idle_id);
4401 container->details->align_idle_id = 0;
4402 }
4403
4404 if (container->details->selection_changed_id != 0)
4405 {
4406 g_source_remove (container->details->selection_changed_id);
4407 container->details->selection_changed_id = 0;
4408 }
4409
4410 if (container->details->size_allocation_count_id != 0)
4411 {
4412 g_source_remove (container->details->size_allocation_count_id);
4413 container->details->size_allocation_count_id = 0;
4414 }
4415
4416 /* destroy interactive search dialog */
4417 if (container->details->search_window)
4418 {
4419 gtk_widget_destroy (container->details->search_window);
4420 container->details->search_window = NULL((void*)0);
4421 container->details->search_entry = NULL((void*)0);
4422 if (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
4423 {
4424 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
4425 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout = 0;
4426 }
4427 }
4428
4429 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->destroy (object);
4430}
4431
4432static void
4433finalize (GObject *object)
4434{
4435 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
4436
4437 details = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (object)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((object)))))->details;
4438
4439 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func (caja_icon_view_preferences,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_icon_view_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object))
4440 text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_icon_view_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object))
4441 object)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_icon_view_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object));
4442 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_func (caja_desktop_preferences,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_desktop_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object))
4443 text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_desktop_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object))
4444 object)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((caja_desktop_preferences
), (GSignalMatchType) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA
), 0, 0, ((void*)0), (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
), (object));
4445
4446 g_hash_table_destroy (details->icon_set);
4447 details->icon_set = NULL((void*)0);
4448
4449 g_free (details->font);
4450
4451 if (details->a11y_item_action_queue != NULL((void*)0))
4452 {
4453 while (!g_queue_is_empty (details->a11y_item_action_queue))
4454 {
4455 g_free (g_queue_pop_head (details->a11y_item_action_queue));
4456 }
4457 g_queue_free (details->a11y_item_action_queue);
4458 }
4459 if (details->a11y_item_action_idle_handler != 0)
4460 {
4461 g_source_remove (details->a11y_item_action_idle_handler);
4462 }
4463
4464 g_free (details);
4465
4466 G_OBJECT_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->finalize (object);
4467}
4468
4469/* GtkWidget methods. */
4470
4471static gboolean
4472clear_size_allocation_count (gpointer data)
4473{
4474 CajaIconContainer *container;
4475
4476 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((data)))));
4477
4478 container->details->size_allocation_count_id = 0;
4479 container->details->size_allocation_count = 0;
4480
4481 return FALSE(0);
4482}
4483
4484static void
4485size_allocate (GtkWidget *widget,
4486 GtkAllocation *allocation)
4487{
4488 CajaIconContainer *container;
4489 gboolean need_layout_redone;
4490 GtkAllocation wid_allocation;
4491
4492 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
4493
4494 need_layout_redone = !container->details->has_been_allocated;
4495 gtk_widget_get_allocation (widget, &wid_allocation);
4496
4497 if (allocation->width != wid_allocation.width)
4498 {
4499 need_layout_redone = TRUE(!(0));
4500 }
4501
4502 if (allocation->height != wid_allocation.height)
4503 {
4504 need_layout_redone = TRUE(!(0));
4505 }
4506
4507 /* Under some conditions we can end up in a loop when size allocating.
4508 * This happens when the icons don't fit without a scrollbar, but fits
4509 * when a scrollbar is added (bug #129963 for details).
4510 * We keep track of this looping by increasing a counter in size_allocate
4511 * and clearing it in a high-prio idle (the only way to detect the loop is
4512 * done).
4513 * When we've done at more than two iterations (with/without scrollbar)
4514 * we terminate this looping by not redoing the layout when the width
4515 * is wider than the current one (i.e when removing the scrollbar).
4516 */
4517 if (container->details->size_allocation_count_id == 0)
4518 {
4519 container->details->size_allocation_count_id =
4520 g_idle_add_full (G_PRIORITY_HIGH-100,
4521 clear_size_allocation_count,
4522 container, NULL((void*)0));
4523 }
4524 container->details->size_allocation_count++;
4525 if (container->details->size_allocation_count > 2 &&
4526 allocation->width >= wid_allocation.width)
4527 {
4528 need_layout_redone = FALSE(0);
4529 }
4530
4531 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->size_allocate (widget, allocation);
4532
4533 container->details->has_been_allocated = TRUE(!(0));
4534
4535 if (need_layout_redone)
4536 {
4537 redo_layout (container);
4538 }
4539}
4540
4541static GtkSizeRequestMode
4542get_request_mode (GtkWidget *widget)
4543{
4544 /* Don't trade size at all, since we get whatever we get anyway. */
4545 return GTK_SIZE_REQUEST_CONSTANT_SIZE;
4546}
4547
4548 /* We need to implement these since the GtkScrolledWindow uses them
4549 to guess whether to show scrollbars or not, and if we don't report
4550 anything it'll tend to get it wrong causing double calls
4551 to size_allocate (at different sizes) during its size allocation. */
4552static void
4553get_prefered_width (GtkWidget *widget,
4554 gint *minimum_size,
4555 gint *natural_size)
4556{
4557 EelCanvasGroup *root;
4558 double x1, x2;
4559 int cx1, cx2;
4560 int width;
4561
4562 root = eel_canvas_root (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))));
4563 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (root)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((root))))),
4564 &x1, NULL((void*)0), &x2, NULL((void*)0));
4565 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))), x1, 0, &cx1, NULL((void*)0));
4566 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))), x2, 0, &cx2, NULL((void*)0));
4567
4568 width = cx2 - cx1;
4569 if (natural_size) {
4570 *natural_size = width;
4571 }
4572 if (minimum_size) {
4573 *minimum_size = width;
4574 }
4575}
4576
4577static void
4578get_prefered_height (GtkWidget *widget,
4579 gint *minimum_size,
4580 gint *natural_size)
4581{
4582 EelCanvasGroup *root;
4583 double y1, y2;
4584 int cy1, cy2;
4585 int height;
4586
4587 root = eel_canvas_root (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))));
4588 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (root)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((root))))),
4589 NULL((void*)0), &y1, NULL((void*)0), &y2);
4590 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))), 0, y1, NULL((void*)0), &cy1);
4591 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (widget)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((widget))))), 0, y2, NULL((void*)0), &cy2);
4592
4593 height = cy2 - cy1;
4594 if (natural_size) {
4595 *natural_size = height;
4596 }
4597 if (minimum_size) {
4598 *minimum_size = height;
4599 }
4600}
4601
4602static gboolean
4603draw (GtkWidget *widget, cairo_t *cr)
4604{
4605 if (!CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))))->details->is_desktop)
4606 {
4607 eel_background_draw (widget, cr);
4608 }
4609 /*If this is the desktop on wayland, we must draw it from here
4610 *Calling eel_background_draw() from caja_desktop_window_class_init()
4611 *as we do in x11 gives a black background on wayland
4612 *Wayland is always composited but never has a root window
4613 *We don't have a root window to draw on
4614 *the code used for x11 without compositing somehow fails too
4615 *But we can get caja's toplevel window from here and draw on it
4616 */
4617 if ((!(GDK_IS_X11_DISPLAY (gdk_display_get_default())(((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance*) (
(gdk_display_get_default())); GType __t = ((gdk_x11_display_get_type
())); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; })))))) && (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))))->details->is_desktop))
4618 {
4619 GtkWidget *toplevel = gtk_widget_get_toplevel(widget);
4620 eel_background_draw (toplevel, cr);
4621 }
4622
4623 return GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->draw (widget,
4624 cr);
4625}
4626
4627static void
4628realize (GtkWidget *widget)
4629{
4630 GtkAdjustment *vadj, *hadj;
4631 CajaIconContainer *container;
4632
4633 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->realize (widget);
4634
4635 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
4636
4637 /* Set up DnD. */
4638 caja_icon_dnd_init (container);
4639
4640 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (widget)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((widget))))));
4641 g_signal_connect (hadj, "value_changed",g_signal_connect_data ((hadj), ("value_changed"), (((GCallback
) (handle_hadjustment_changed))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
4642 G_CALLBACK (handle_hadjustment_changed), widget)g_signal_connect_data ((hadj), ("value_changed"), (((GCallback
) (handle_hadjustment_changed))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
4643
4644 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (widget)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((widget))))));
4645 g_signal_connect (vadj, "value_changed",g_signal_connect_data ((vadj), ("value_changed"), (((GCallback
) (handle_vadjustment_changed))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
4646 G_CALLBACK (handle_vadjustment_changed), widget)g_signal_connect_data ((vadj), ("value_changed"), (((GCallback
) (handle_vadjustment_changed))), (widget), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
4647
4648}
4649
4650static void
4651unrealize (GtkWidget *widget)
4652{
4653 CajaIconContainer *container;
4654
4655 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
4656
4657 caja_icon_dnd_fini (container);
4658
4659 if (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
4660 {
4661 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
4662 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout = 0;
4663 }
4664
4665 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->unrealize (widget);
4666}
4667
4668static void
4669style_updated (GtkWidget *widget)
4670{
4671 CajaIconContainer *container;
4672
4673 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
4674 container->details->use_drop_shadows = container->details->drop_shadows_requested;
4675
4676 /* Don't chain up to parent, if this is a desktop container,
4677 * because that resets the background of the window.
4678 */
4679 if (!caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (container)) {
4680 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->style_updated (widget);
4681 }
4682
4683 if (gtk_widget_get_realized (widget))
4684 {
4685 invalidate_labels (container);
4686 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
4687 }
4688}
4689
4690static gboolean
4691button_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
4692 GdkEventButton *event)
4693{
4694 CajaIconContainer *container;
4695 gboolean selection_changed;
4696 gboolean return_value;
4697 gboolean clicked_on_icon;
4698
4699 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
4700 container->details->button_down_time = event->time;
4701
4702 /* Forget about the old keyboard selection now that we've started mousing. */
4703 clear_keyboard_focus (container);
4704 clear_keyboard_rubberband_start (container);
4705
4706 if (event->type == GDK_2BUTTON_PRESS || event->type == GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS)
4707 {
4708 /* We use our own double-click detection. */
4709 return TRUE(!(0));
4710 }
4711
4712 /* Invoke the canvas event handler and see if an item picks up the event. */
4713 clicked_on_icon = GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->button_press_event (widget, event);
4714
4715 /* Move focus to icon container, unless we're still renaming (to avoid exiting
4716 * renaming mode)
4717 */
4718 if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (widget) && !(is_renaming (container) || is_renaming_pending (container)))
4719 {
4720 gtk_widget_grab_focus (widget);
4721 }
4722
4723 if (clicked_on_icon)
4724 {
4725 return TRUE(!(0));
4726 }
4727
4728 if (event->button == DRAG_BUTTON1 &&
4729 event->type == GDK_BUTTON_PRESS)
4730 {
4731 /* Clear the last click icon for double click */
4732 container->details->double_click_icon[1] = container->details->double_click_icon[0];
4733 container->details->double_click_icon[0] = NULL((void*)0);
4734 }
4735
4736 /* Button 1 does rubber banding. */
4737 if (event->button == RUBBERBAND_BUTTON1)
4738 {
