4739 if (! button_event_modifies_selection (event))
4740 {
4741 selection_changed = unselect_all (container);
4742 if (selection_changed)
4743 {
4744 g_signal_emit (container,
4745 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4746 }
4747 }
4748
4749 start_rubberbanding (container, event);
4750 return TRUE(!(0));
4751 }
4752
4753 /* Prevent multi-button weirdness such as bug 6181 */
4754 if (container->details->rubberband_info.active)
4755 {
4756 return TRUE(!(0));
4757 }
4758
4759 /* Button 2 may be passed to the window manager. */
4760 if (event->button == MIDDLE_BUTTON2)
4761 {
4762 selection_changed = unselect_all (container);
4763 if (selection_changed)
4764 {
4765 g_signal_emit (container, signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4766 }
4767 g_signal_emit (widget, signals[MIDDLE_CLICK], 0, event);
4768 return TRUE(!(0));
4769 }
4770
4771 /* Button 3 does a contextual menu. */
4772 if (event->button == CONTEXTUAL_MENU_BUTTON3)
4773 {
4774 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
4775 selection_changed = unselect_all (container);
4776 if (selection_changed)
4777 {
4778 g_signal_emit (container, signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4779 }
4780 g_signal_emit (widget, signals[CONTEXT_CLICK_BACKGROUND], 0, event);
4781 return TRUE(!(0));
4782 }
4783
4784 /* Otherwise, we emit a button_press message. */
4785 g_signal_emit (widget,
4786 signals[BUTTON_PRESS], 0, event,
4787 &return_value);
4788 return return_value;
4789}
4790
4791static void
4792caja_icon_container_did_not_drag (CajaIconContainer *container,
4793 GdkEventButton *event)
4794{
4795 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
4796 gboolean selection_changed;
4797 static gint64 last_click_time = 0;
4798 static gint click_count = 0;
4799 gint double_click_time;
4800 gint64 current_time;
4801
4802 details = container->details;
4803
4804 if (details->icon_selected_on_button_down &&
4805 ((event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0 ||
4806 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) == 0))
4807 {
4808 if (button_event_modifies_selection (event))
4809 {
4810 details->range_selection_base_icon = NULL((void*)0);
4811 icon_toggle_selected (container, details->drag_icon);
4812 g_signal_emit (container,
4813 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4814 }
4815 else
4816 {
4817 details->range_selection_base_icon = details->drag_icon;
4818 selection_changed = select_one_unselect_others
4819 (container, details->drag_icon);
4820
4821 if (selection_changed)
4822 {
4823 g_signal_emit (container,
4824 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
4825 }
4826 }
4827 }
4828
4829 if (details->drag_icon != NULL((void*)0) &&
4830 (details->single_click_mode ||
4831 event->button == MIDDLE_BUTTON2))
4832 {
4833 /* Determine click count */
4834 g_object_get (G_OBJECT (gtk_widget_get_settings (GTK_WIDGET (container)))((((GObject*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_get_settings (((((GtkWidget
*) (void *) ((container))))))))))),
4835 "gtk-double-click-time", &double_click_time,
4836 NULL((void*)0));
4837 current_time = g_get_monotonic_time ();
4838 if (current_time - last_click_time < double_click_time * 1000)
4839 {
4840 click_count++;
4841 }
4842 else
4843 {
4844 click_count = 0;
4845 }
4846
4847 /* Stash time for next compare */
4848 last_click_time = current_time;
4849
4850 /* If single-click mode, activate the selected icons, unless modifying
4851 * the selection or pressing for a very long time, or double clicking.
4852 */
4853
4854 if (click_count == 0 &&
4855 event->time - details->button_down_time < MAX_CLICK_TIME1500 &&
4856 ! button_event_modifies_selection (event))
4857 {
4858
4859 /* It's a tricky UI issue whether this should activate
4860 * just the clicked item (as if it were a link), or all
4861 * the selected items (as if you were issuing an "activate
4862 * selection" command). For now, we're trying the activate
4863 * entire selection version to see how it feels. Note that
4864 * CajaList goes the other way because its "links" seem
4865 * much more link-like.
4866 */
4867 if (event->button == MIDDLE_BUTTON2)
4868 {
4869 activate_selected_items_alternate (container, NULL((void*)0));
4870 }
4871 else
4872 {
4873 activate_selected_items (container);
4874 }
4875 }
4876 }
4877}
4878
4879static gboolean
4880clicked_within_double_click_interval (CajaIconContainer *container)
4881{
4882 static gint64 last_click_time = 0;
4883 static gint click_count = 0;
4884 gint double_click_time;
4885 gint64 current_time;
4886
4887 /* Determine click count */
4888 g_object_get (G_OBJECT (gtk_widget_get_settings (GTK_WIDGET (container)))((((GObject*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_get_settings (((((GtkWidget
*) (void *) ((container))))))))))),
4889 "gtk-double-click-time", &double_click_time,
4890 NULL((void*)0));
4891 current_time = g_get_monotonic_time ();
4892 if (current_time - last_click_time < double_click_time * 1000)
4893 {
4894 click_count++;
4895 }
4896 else
4897 {
4898 click_count = 0;
4899 }
4900
4901 /* Stash time for next compare */
4902 last_click_time = current_time;
4903
4904 /* Only allow double click */
4905 if (click_count == 1) {
4906 click_count = 0;
4907 return TRUE(!(0));
4908 } else {
4909 return FALSE(0);
4910 }
4911}
4912
4913static void
4914clear_drag_state (CajaIconContainer *container)
4915{
4916 container->details->drag_icon = NULL((void*)0);
4917 container->details->drag_state = DRAG_STATE_INITIAL;
4918}
4919
4920static gboolean
4921start_stretching (CajaIconContainer *container,
4922 GdkEvent *event)
4923{
4924 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
4925 CajaIcon *icon;
4926 EelDPoint world_point;
4927 GtkWidget *toplevel;
4928 GdkDisplay *display;
4929 GtkCornerType corner;
4930 GdkCursor *cursor;
4931
4932 details = container->details;
4933 icon = details->stretch_icon;
4934 display = gtk_widget_get_display (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
4935
4936 /* Check if we hit the stretch handles. */
4937 world_point.x = details->drag_x;
4938 world_point.y = details->drag_y;
4939 if (!caja_icon_canvas_item_hit_test_stretch_handles (icon->item, world_point, &corner))
4940 {
4941 return FALSE(0);
4942 }
4943
4944 switch (corner)
4945 {
4946 case GTK_CORNER_TOP_LEFT:
4947 cursor = gdk_cursor_new_for_display (display, GDK_TOP_LEFT_CORNER);
4948 break;
4949 case GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_LEFT:
4950 cursor = gdk_cursor_new_for_display (display, GDK_BOTTOM_LEFT_CORNER);
4951 break;
4952 case GTK_CORNER_TOP_RIGHT:
4953 cursor = gdk_cursor_new_for_display (display, GDK_TOP_RIGHT_CORNER);
4954 break;
4955 case GTK_CORNER_BOTTOM_RIGHT:
4956 cursor = gdk_cursor_new_for_display (display, GDK_BOTTOM_RIGHT_CORNER);
4957 break;
4958 default:
4959 cursor = NULL((void*)0);
4960 break;
4961 }
4962 /* Set up the dragging. */
4963 details->drag_state = DRAG_STATE_STRETCH;
4964 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
4965 details->drag_x,
4966 details->drag_y,
4967 &details->stretch_start.pointer_x,
4968 &details->stretch_start.pointer_y);
4969 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
4970 icon->x, icon->y,
4971 &details->stretch_start.icon_x,
4972 &details->stretch_start.icon_y);
4973 icon_get_size (container, icon,
4974 &details->stretch_start.icon_size);
4975
4976 eel_canvas_item_grab (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
4977 (GDK_POINTER_MOTION_MASK
4978 | GDK_BUTTON_RELEASE_MASK),
4979 cursor,
4980 event);
4981
4982 if (cursor)
4983 g_object_unref (cursor);
4984
4985 /* Ensure the window itself is focused.. */
4986 toplevel = gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
4987 if (toplevel != NULL((void*)0) && gtk_widget_get_realized (toplevel))
4988 {
4989 gdk_window_focus (gtk_widget_get_window (toplevel), GDK_CURRENT_TIME0L);
4990 }
4991
4992 return TRUE(!(0));
4993}
4994
4995static gboolean
4996update_stretch_at_idle (CajaIconContainer *container)
4997{
4998 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
4999 CajaIcon *icon;
5000 double world_x, world_y;
5001 StretchState stretch_state;
5002
5003 details = container->details;
5004 icon = details->stretch_icon;
5005
5006 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
5007 {
5008 container->details->stretch_idle_id = 0;
5009 return FALSE(0);
5010 }
5011
5012 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
5013 details->world_x, details->world_y,
5014 &stretch_state.pointer_x, &stretch_state.pointer_y);
5015
5016 compute_stretch (&details->stretch_start,
5017 &stretch_state);
5018
5019 eel_canvas_c2w (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
5020 stretch_state.icon_x, stretch_state.icon_y,
5021 &world_x, &world_y);
5022
5023 icon_set_position (icon, world_x, world_y);
5024 icon_set_size (container, icon, stretch_state.icon_size, FALSE(0), FALSE(0));
5025
5026 container->details->stretch_idle_id = 0;
5027
5028 return FALSE(0);
5029}
5030
5031static void
5032continue_stretching (CajaIconContainer *container,
5033 double world_x, double world_y)
5034{
5035
5036 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_150
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_150 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_150 =
0; _g_boolean_var_150; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
5037
5038 container->details->world_x = world_x;
5039 container->details->world_y = world_y;
5040
5041 if (container->details->stretch_idle_id == 0)
5042 {
5043 container->details->stretch_idle_id = g_idle_add ((GSourceFunc) update_stretch_at_idle, container);
5044 }
5045}
5046
5047static gboolean
5048keyboard_stretching (CajaIconContainer *container,
5049 GdkEventKey *event)
5050{
5051 CajaIcon *icon;
5052 guint size;
5053
5054 icon = container->details->stretch_icon;
5055
5056 if (icon == NULL((void*)0) || !icon->is_selected)
5057 {
5058 return FALSE(0);
5059 }
5060
5061 icon_get_size (container, icon, &size);
5062
5063 switch (event->keyval)
5064 {
5065 case GDK_KEY_equal0x03d:
5066 case GDK_KEY_plus0x02b:
5067 case GDK_KEY_KP_Add0xffab:
5068 icon_set_size (container, icon, size + 5, FALSE(0), FALSE(0));
5069 break;
5070 case GDK_KEY_minus0x02d:
5071 case GDK_KEY_KP_Subtract0xffad:
5072 icon_set_size (container, icon, size - 5, FALSE(0), FALSE(0));
5073 break;
5074 case GDK_KEY_00x030:
5075 case GDK_KEY_KP_00xffb0:
5076 caja_icon_container_move_icon (container, icon,
5077 icon->x, icon->y,
5078 1.0,
5079 FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)));
5080 break;
5081 }
5082
5083 return TRUE(!(0));
5084}
5085
5086static void
5087ungrab_stretch_icon (CajaIconContainer *container)
5088{
5089 eel_canvas_item_ungrab (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (container->details->stretch_icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((container->details->stretch_icon
->item))))));
5090}
5091
5092static void
5093end_stretching (CajaIconContainer *container,
5094 double world_x, double world_y)
5095{
5096 CajaIconPosition position;
5097 CajaIcon *icon;
5098
5099 continue_stretching (container, world_x, world_y);
5100 ungrab_stretch_icon (container);
5101
5102 /* now that we're done stretching, update the icon's position */
5103
5104 icon = container->details->drag_icon;
5105 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
5106 {
5107 position.x = icon->saved_ltr_x = get_mirror_x_position (container, icon, icon->x);
5108 }
5109 else
5110 {
5111 position.x = icon->x;
5112 }
5113 position.y = icon->y;
5114 position.scale = icon->scale;
5115 g_signal_emit (container,
5116 signals[ICON_POSITION_CHANGED], 0,
5117 icon->data, &position);
5118
5119 clear_drag_state (container);
5120 redo_layout (container);
5121}
5122
5123static gboolean
5124undo_stretching (CajaIconContainer *container)
5125{
5126 CajaIcon *stretched_icon;
5127
5128 stretched_icon = container->details->stretch_icon;
5129
5130 if (stretched_icon == NULL((void*)0))
5131 {
5132 return FALSE(0);
5133 }
5134
5135 if (container->details->drag_state == DRAG_STATE_STRETCH)
5136 {
5137 ungrab_stretch_icon (container);
5138 clear_drag_state (container);
5139 }
5140 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_show_stretch_handles
5141 (stretched_icon->item, FALSE(0));
5142
5143 icon_set_position (stretched_icon,
5144 container->details->stretch_initial_x,
5145 container->details->stretch_initial_y);
5146 icon_set_size (container,
5147 stretched_icon,
5148 container->details->stretch_initial_size,
5149 TRUE(!(0)),
5150 TRUE(!(0)));
5151
5152 container->details->stretch_icon = NULL((void*)0);
5153 emit_stretch_ended (container, stretched_icon);
5154 redo_layout (container);
5155
5156 return TRUE(!(0));
5157}
5158
5159static gboolean
5160button_release_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5161 GdkEventButton *event)
5162{
5163 CajaIconContainer *container;
5164 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
5165 double world_x, world_y;
5166
5167 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
5168 details = container->details;
5169
5170 if (event->button == RUBBERBAND_BUTTON1 && details->rubberband_info.active)
5171 {
5172 stop_rubberbanding (container);
5173 return TRUE(!(0));
5174 }
5175
5176 if (event->button == details->drag_button)
5177 {
5178 details->drag_button = 0;
5179
5180 switch (details->drag_state)
5181 {
5182 case DRAG_STATE_MOVE_OR_COPY:
5183 if (!details->drag_started)
5184 {
5185 caja_icon_container_did_not_drag (container, event);
5186 }
5187 else
5188 {
5189 caja_icon_dnd_end_drag (container);
5190 caja_debug_log (FALSE(0), CAJA_DEBUG_LOG_DOMAIN_USER"USER",
5191 "end drag from icon container");
5192 }
5193 break;
5194 case DRAG_STATE_STRETCH:
5195 eel_canvas_window_to_world
5196 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), event->x, event->y, &world_x, &world_y);
5197 end_stretching (container, world_x, world_y);
5198 break;
5199 default:
5200 break;
5201 }
5202
5203 clear_drag_state (container);
5204 return TRUE(!(0));
5205 }
5206
5207 return GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->button_release_event (widget, event);
5208}
5209
5210static int
5211motion_notify_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5212 GdkEventMotion *event)
5213{
5214 CajaIconContainer *container;
5215 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
5216 double world_x, world_y;
5217 int canvas_x, canvas_y;
5218 GdkDragAction actions;
5219
5220 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
5221 details = container->details;
5222
5223 if (details->drag_button != 0)
5224 {
5225 switch (details->drag_state)
5226 {
5227 case DRAG_STATE_MOVE_OR_COPY:
5228 if (details->drag_started)
5229 {
5230 break;
5231 }
5232
5233 eel_canvas_window_to_world
5234 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), event->x, event->y, &world_x, &world_y);
5235
5236 if (gtk_drag_check_threshold (widget,
5237 details->drag_x,
5238 details->drag_y,
5239 world_x,
5240 world_y))
5241 {
5242 details->drag_started = TRUE(!(0));
5243 details->drag_state = DRAG_STATE_MOVE_OR_COPY;
5244
5245 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
5246
5247 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
5248 details->drag_x,
5249 details->drag_y,
5250 &canvas_x,
5251 &canvas_y);
5252
5253 actions = GDK_ACTION_COPY
5254 | GDK_ACTION_LINK
5255 | GDK_ACTION_ASK;
5256
5257 if (container->details->drag_allow_moves)
5258 {
5259 actions |= GDK_ACTION_MOVE;
5260 }
5261
5262 caja_icon_dnd_begin_drag (container,
5263 actions,
5264 details->drag_button,
5265 event,
5266 canvas_x,
5267 canvas_y);
5268 caja_debug_log (FALSE(0), CAJA_DEBUG_LOG_DOMAIN_USER"USER",
5269 "begin drag from icon container");
5270 }
5271 break;
5272 case DRAG_STATE_STRETCH:
5273 eel_canvas_window_to_world
5274 (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), event->x, event->y, &world_x, &world_y);
5275 continue_stretching (container, world_x, world_y);
5276 break;
5277 default:
5278 break;
5279 }
5280 }
5281
5282 return GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->motion_notify_event (widget, event);
5283}
5284
5285static void
5286caja_icon_container_search_position_func (CajaIconContainer *container,
5287 GtkWidget *search_dialog)
5288{
5289 gint x, y;
5290 gint cont_x, cont_y;
5291 gint cont_width, cont_height;
5292 GdkWindow *cont_window;
5293 GdkScreen *screen;
5294 GtkRequisition requisition;
5295 GdkMonitor *monitor_num;
5296 GdkRectangle monitor;
5297 GdkRectangle workarea = {0};
5298
5299 cont_window = gtk_widget_get_window (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
5300 screen = gdk_window_get_screen (cont_window);
5301
5302 monitor_num = gdk_display_get_monitor_at_window (gdk_display_get_default(), cont_window);
5303 gdk_monitor_get_workarea(monitor_num, &workarea);
5304
5305 monitor_num = gdk_display_get_monitor_at_window (gdk_screen_get_display (screen),
5306 cont_window);
5307 gdk_monitor_get_geometry (monitor_num, &monitor);
5308
5309 gtk_widget_realize (search_dialog);
5310
5311 gdk_window_get_origin (cont_window, &cont_x, &cont_y);
5312
5313 cont_width = gdk_window_get_width (cont_window);
5314 cont_height = gdk_window_get_height (cont_window);
5315
5316 gtk_widget_get_preferred_size (search_dialog, &requisition, NULL((void*)0));
5317
5318 if (cont_x + cont_width - requisition.width > workarea.width)
5319 {
5320 x = workarea.width - requisition.width;
5321 }
5322 else if (cont_x + cont_width - requisition.width < 0)
5323 {
5324 x = 0;
5325 }
5326 else
5327 {
5328 x = cont_x + cont_width - requisition.width;
5329 }
5330
5331 if (cont_y + cont_height > workarea.height)
5332 {
5333 y = workarea.height - requisition.height;
5334 }
5335 else if (cont_y + cont_height < 0) /* isn't really possible ... */
5336 {
5337 y = 0;
5338 }
5339 else
5340 {
5341 y = cont_y + cont_height;
5342 }
5343
5344 gtk_window_move (GTK_WINDOW (search_dialog)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((search_dialog))))), x, y);
5345}
5346
5347static gboolean
5348caja_icon_container_real_search_enable_popdown (gpointer data)
5349{
5350 CajaIconContainer *container = (CajaIconContainer *)data;
5351
5352 container->details->disable_popdown = FALSE(0);
5353
5354 g_object_unref (container);
5355
5356 return FALSE(0);
5357}
5358
5359static void
5360caja_icon_container_search_enable_popdown (GtkWidget *widget,
5361 gpointer data)
5362{
5363 CajaIconContainer *container = (CajaIconContainer *) data;
5364
5365 g_object_ref (container)((__typeof__ (container)) (g_object_ref) (container));
5366 g_timeout_add (200, caja_icon_container_real_search_enable_popdown, data);
5367}
5368
5369static void
5370caja_icon_container_search_disable_popdown (GtkEntry *entry,
5371 GtkMenu *menu,
5372 gpointer data)
5373{
5374 CajaIconContainer *container = (CajaIconContainer *) data;
5375
5376 container->details->disable_popdown = TRUE(!(0));
5377 g_signal_connect (menu, "hide",g_signal_connect_data ((menu), ("hide"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_enable_popdown
))), (data), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5378 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_enable_popdown),g_signal_connect_data ((menu), ("hide"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_enable_popdown
))), (data), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5379 data)g_signal_connect_data ((menu), ("hide"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_enable_popdown
))), (data), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5380}
5381
5382/* Cut and paste from gtkwindow.c */
5383static void
5384send_focus_change (GtkWidget *widget, gboolean in)
5385{
5386 GdkEvent *fevent;
5387
5388 fevent = gdk_event_new (GDK_FOCUS_CHANGE);
5389
5390 g_object_ref (widget)((__typeof__ (widget)) (g_object_ref) (widget));
5391 ((GdkEventFocus *) fevent)->in = in;
5392
5393 gtk_widget_send_focus_change (widget, fevent);
5394
5395 fevent->focus_change.type = GDK_FOCUS_CHANGE;
5396 fevent->focus_change.window = g_object_ref (gtk_widget_get_window (widget))((__typeof__ (gtk_widget_get_window (widget))) (g_object_ref)
(gtk_widget_get_window (widget)));
5397 fevent->focus_change.in = in;
5398
5399 gtk_widget_event (widget, fevent);
5400
5401 g_object_notify (G_OBJECT (widget)((((GObject*) (void *) ((widget))))), "has-focus");
5402
5403 g_object_unref (widget);
5404 gdk_event_free (fevent);
5405}
5406
5407static void
5408caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (GtkWidget *search_dialog,
5409 CajaIconContainer *container)
5410{
5411 if (container->details->disable_popdown)
5412 {
5413 return;
5414 }
5415
5416 if (container->details->search_entry_changed_id)
5417 {
5418 g_signal_handler_disconnect (container->details->search_entry,
5419 container->details->search_entry_changed_id);
5420 container->details->search_entry_changed_id = 0;
5421 }
5422 if (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
5423 {
5424 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
5425 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout = 0;
5426 }
5427
5428 /* send focus-in event */
5429 send_focus_change (GTK_WIDGET (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))), FALSE(0));
5430 gtk_widget_hide (search_dialog);
5431 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))), "");
5432}
5433
5434static gboolean
5435caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout (CajaIconContainer *container)
5436{
5437 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (container->details->search_window, container);
5438
5439 return TRUE(!(0));
5440}
5441
5442/* Because we're visible but offscreen, we just set a flag in the preedit
5443 * callback.
5444 */
5445static void
5446caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed (GtkEntry *entry,
5447 gchar *preedit,
5448 CajaIconContainer *container)
5449{
5450 container->details->imcontext_changed = 1;
5451 if (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
5452 {
5453 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
5454 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout =
5455 g_timeout_add_seconds (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_SEARCH_DIALOG_TIMEOUT5,
5456 (GSourceFunc) caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout,
5457 container);
5458 }
5459}
5460
5461static void
5462caja_icon_container_search_activate (GtkEntry *entry,
5463 CajaIconContainer *container)
5464{
5465 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (container->details->search_window,
5466 container);
5467
5468 activate_selected_items (container);
5469}
5470
5471static gboolean
5472caja_icon_container_search_delete_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5473 GdkEventAny *event,
5474 CajaIconContainer *container)
5475{
5476 g_assert (GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_151
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_widget_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_151
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_151 = 0; _g_boolean_var_151; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 5476, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget)")
; } while (0);
5477
5478 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (widget, container);
5479
5480 return TRUE(!(0));
5481}
5482
5483static gboolean
5484caja_icon_container_search_button_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5485 GdkEventButton *event,
5486 CajaIconContainer *container)
5487{
5488 g_assert (GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_152
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_widget_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_152
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_152 = 0; _g_boolean_var_152; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 5488, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget)")
; } while (0);
5489
5490 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (widget, container);
5491
5492 if (event->window == gtk_layout_get_bin_window (GTK_LAYOUT (container)((((GtkLayout*) (void *) ((container)))))))
5493 {
5494 button_press_event (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), event);
5495 }
5496
5497 return TRUE(!(0));
5498}
5499
5500static void
5501caja_icon_container_get_icon_text (CajaIconContainer *container,
5502 CajaIconData *data,
5503 char **editable_text,
5504 char **additional_text,
5505 gboolean include_invisible)
5506{
5507 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
5508
5509 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
5510 g_assert (klass->get_icon_text != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_153
; if (klass->get_icon_text != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_153
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_153 = 0; _g_boolean_var_153; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 5510, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->get_icon_text != NULL"
); } while (0);
5511
5512 klass->get_icon_text (container, data, editable_text, additional_text, include_invisible);
5513}
5514
5515static gboolean
5516caja_icon_container_search_iter (CajaIconContainer *container,
5517 const char *key, gint n)
5518{
5519 GList *p;
5520 CajaIcon *icon;
5521 char *name;
5522 int count;
5523 char *normalized_key, *case_normalized_key;
5524 char *normalized_name, *case_normalized_name;
5525
5526 g_assert (key != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_154
; if (key != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_154 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_154
= 0; _g_boolean_var_154; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 5526, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "key != NULL"); } while (0);
5527 g_assert (n >= 1)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_155
; if (n >= 1) _g_boolean_var_155 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_155
= 0; _g_boolean_var_155; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 5527, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "n >= 1"); } while (0);
5528
5529 normalized_key = g_utf8_normalize (key, -1, G_NORMALIZE_ALL);
5530 if (!normalized_key)
5531 {
5532 return FALSE(0);
5533 }
5534 case_normalized_key = g_utf8_casefold (normalized_key, -1);
5535 g_free (normalized_key);
5536 if (!case_normalized_key)
5537 {
5538 return FALSE(0);
5539 }
5540
5541 icon = NULL((void*)0);
5542 name = NULL((void*)0);
5543 count = 0;
5544 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0) && count != n; p = p->next)
5545 {
5546 icon = p->data;
5547 caja_icon_container_get_icon_text (container, icon->data, &name,
5548 NULL((void*)0), TRUE(!(0)));
5549
5550 /* This can happen if a key event is handled really early while
5551 * loading the icon container, before the items have all been
5552 * updated once.
5553 */
5554 if (!name)
5555 {
5556 continue;
5557 }
5558
5559 normalized_name = g_utf8_normalize (name, -1, G_NORMALIZE_ALL);
5560 if (!normalized_name)
5561 {
5562 continue;
5563 }
5564 case_normalized_name = g_utf8_casefold (normalized_name, -1);
5565 g_free (normalized_name);
5566 if (!case_normalized_name)
5567 {
5568 continue;
5569 }
5570
5571 if (strncmp (case_normalized_key, case_normalized_name,
5572 strlen (case_normalized_key)) == 0)
5573 {
5574 count++;
5575 }
5576
5577 g_free (case_normalized_name);
5578 g_free (name);
5579 name = NULL((void*)0);
5580 }
5581
5582 g_free (case_normalized_key);
5583
5584 if (count == n)
5585 {
5586 if (select_one_unselect_others (container, icon))
5587 {
5588 g_signal_emit (container, signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
5589 }
5590 schedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (container, icon);
5591
5592 return TRUE(!(0));
5593 }
5594
5595 return FALSE(0);
5596}
5597
5598static void
5599caja_icon_container_search_move (GtkWidget *window,
5600 CajaIconContainer *container,
5601 gboolean up)
5602{
5603 gboolean ret;
5604 gint len;
5605 const gchar *text;
5606
5607 text = gtk_entry_get_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))));
5608
5609 g_assert (text != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_156
; if (text != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_156 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_156
= 0; _g_boolean_var_156; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 5609, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "text != NULL"); } while (0);
5610
5611 if (container->details->selected_iter == 0)
5612 {
5613 return;
5614 }
5615
5616 if (up && container->details->selected_iter == 1)
5617 {
5618 return;
5619 }
5620
5621 len = strlen (text);
5622
5623 if (len < 1)
5624 {
5625 return;
5626 }
5627
5628 /* search */
5629 unselect_all (container);
5630
5631 ret = caja_icon_container_search_iter (container, text,
5632 up?((container->details->selected_iter) - 1):((container->details->selected_iter + 1)));
5633
5634 if (ret)
5635 {
5636 /* found */
5637 container->details->selected_iter += up?(-1):(1);
5638 }
5639 else
5640 {
5641 /* return to old iter */
5642 caja_icon_container_search_iter (container, text,
5643 container->details->selected_iter);
5644 }
5645}
5646
5647static gboolean
5648caja_icon_container_search_scroll_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5649 GdkEventScroll *event,
5650 CajaIconContainer *container)
5651{
5652 gboolean retval = FALSE(0);
5653
5654 if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_UP)
5655 {
5656 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, TRUE(!(0)));
5657 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5658 }
5659 else if (event->direction == GDK_SCROLL_DOWN)
5660 {
5661 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, FALSE(0));
5662 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5663 }
5664
5665 /* renew the flush timeout */
5666 if (retval && container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
5667 {
5668 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
5669 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout =
5670 g_timeout_add_seconds (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_SEARCH_DIALOG_TIMEOUT5,
5671 (GSourceFunc) caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout,
5672 container);
5673 }
5674
5675 return retval;
5676}
5677
5678static gboolean
5679caja_icon_container_search_key_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5680 GdkEventKey *event,
5681 CajaIconContainer *container)
5682{
5683 gboolean retval = FALSE(0);
5684
5685 g_assert (GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_157
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((widget)); GType __t = ((gtk_widget_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_157
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_157 = 0; _g_boolean_var_157; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 5685, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_WIDGET (widget)")
; } while (0);
5686 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_158
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_158 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_158 =
0; _g_boolean_var_158; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 5686, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
5687
5688 /* close window and cancel the search */
5689 if (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_Escape0xff1b || event->keyval == GDK_KEY_Tab0xff09)
5690 {
5691 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (widget, container);
5692 return TRUE(!(0));
5693 }
5694
5695 /* close window and activate alternate */
5696 if (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_Return0xff0d && event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK)
5697 {
5698 caja_icon_container_search_dialog_hide (widget,
5699 container);
5700
5701 activate_selected_items_alternate (container, NULL((void*)0));
5702 return TRUE(!(0));
5703 }
5704
5705 /* select previous matching iter */
5706 if (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_Up0xff52 || event->keyval == GDK_KEY_KP_Up0xff97)
5707 {
5708 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, TRUE(!(0)));
5709 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5710 }
5711
5712 if (((event->state & (GDK_CONTROL_MASK | GDK_SHIFT_MASK)) == (GDK_CONTROL_MASK | GDK_SHIFT_MASK))
5713 && (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_g0x067 || event->keyval == GDK_KEY_G0x047))
5714 {
5715 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, TRUE(!(0)));
5716 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5717 }
5718
5719 /* select next matching iter */
5720 if (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_Down0xff54 || event->keyval == GDK_KEY_KP_Down0xff99)
5721 {
5722 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, FALSE(0));
5723 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5724 }
5725
5726 if (((event->state & (GDK_CONTROL_MASK | GDK_SHIFT_MASK)) == GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
5727 && (event->keyval == GDK_KEY_g0x067 || event->keyval == GDK_KEY_G0x047))
5728 {
5729 caja_icon_container_search_move (widget, container, FALSE(0));
5730 retval = TRUE(!(0));
5731 }
5732
5733 /* renew the flush timeout */
5734 if (retval && container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
5735 {
5736 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
5737 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout =
5738 g_timeout_add_seconds (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_SEARCH_DIALOG_TIMEOUT5,
5739 (GSourceFunc) caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout,
5740 container);
5741 }
5742
5743 return retval;
5744}
5745
5746static void
5747caja_icon_container_search_init (GtkWidget *entry,
5748 CajaIconContainer *container)
5749{
5750 gint ret;
5751 gint len;
5752 const gchar *text;
5753
5754 g_assert (GTK_IS_ENTRY (entry))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_159
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((entry)); GType __t = ((gtk_entry_get_type ())); gboolean
__r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->g_class &&
__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_159
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_159 = 0; _g_boolean_var_159; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 5754, ((const char*) (__func__)), "GTK_IS_ENTRY (entry)"); }
while (0);
5755 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_160
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_160 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_160 =
0; _g_boolean_var_160; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 5755, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
5756
5757 text = gtk_entry_get_text (GTK_ENTRY (entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((entry))))));
5758 len = strlen (text);
5759
5760 /* search */
5761 unselect_all (container);
5762 if (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout)
5763 {
5764 g_source_remove (container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout);
5765 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout =
5766 g_timeout_add_seconds (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_SEARCH_DIALOG_TIMEOUT5,
5767 (GSourceFunc) caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout,
5768 container);
5769 }
5770
5771 if (len < 1)
5772 {
5773 return;
5774 }
5775
5776 ret = caja_icon_container_search_iter (container, text, 1);
5777
5778 if (ret)
5779 {
5780 container->details->selected_iter = 1;
5781 }
5782}
5783
5784static void
5785caja_icon_container_ensure_interactive_directory (CajaIconContainer *container)
5786{
5787 GtkWidget *frame, *vbox, *toplevel;
5788
5789 if (container->details->search_window != NULL((void*)0))
5790 {
5791 return;
5792 }
5793
5794 container->details->search_window = gtk_window_new (GTK_WINDOW_POPUP);
5795 toplevel = gtk_widget_get_toplevel (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
5796
5797 gtk_window_set_modal (GTK_WINDOW (container->details->search_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))), TRUE(!(0)));
5798 gtk_window_set_decorated (GTK_WINDOW (container->details->search_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))), FALSE(0));
5799 gtk_window_set_transient_for (GTK_WINDOW (container->details->search_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))),
5800 GTK_WINDOW (toplevel)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((toplevel))))));
5801
5802 gtk_window_set_destroy_with_parent (GTK_WINDOW (container->details->search_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))), TRUE(!(0)));
5803 gtk_window_set_type_hint (GTK_WINDOW (container->details->search_window)((((GtkWindow*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))),
5804 GDK_WINDOW_TYPE_HINT_COMBO);
5805
5806 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_window, "delete_event",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("delete_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_delete_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5807 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_delete_event),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("delete_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_delete_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5808 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("delete_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_delete_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5809 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_window, "key_press_event",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("key_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_key_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5810 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_key_press_event),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("key_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_key_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5811 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("key_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_key_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5812 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_window, "button_press_event",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("button_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_button_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5813 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_button_press_event),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("button_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_button_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5814 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("button_press_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_button_press_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5815 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_window, "scroll_event",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("scroll_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_scroll_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5816 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_scroll_event),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("scroll_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_scroll_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5817 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_window
), ("scroll_event"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_scroll_event
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5818
5819 frame = gtk_frame_new (NULL((void*)0));
5820 gtk_frame_set_shadow_type (GTK_FRAME (frame)((((GtkFrame*) (void *) ((frame))))), GTK_SHADOW_ETCHED_IN);
5821 gtk_widget_show (frame);
5822 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (container->details->search_window)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((container->details->search_window
))))), frame);
5823
5824 vbox = gtk_box_new (GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL, 0);
5825 gtk_widget_show (vbox);
5826 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (frame)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((frame))))), vbox);
5827 gtk_container_set_border_width (GTK_CONTAINER (vbox)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((vbox))))), 3);
5828
5829 /* add entry */
5830 container->details->search_entry = gtk_entry_new ();
5831 gtk_widget_show (container->details->search_entry);
5832 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_entry, "populate_popup",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("populate_popup"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_disable_popdown
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5833 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_disable_popdown),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("populate_popup"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_disable_popdown
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5834 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("populate_popup"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_disable_popdown
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5835 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_entry, "activate",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("activate"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_activate
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5836 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_activate),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("activate"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_activate
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5837 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("activate"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_activate
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5838 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_entry,g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("preedit-changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5839 "preedit-changed",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("preedit-changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5840 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("preedit-changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5841 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("preedit-changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_preedit_changed
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5842 gtk_container_add (GTK_CONTAINER (vbox)((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((vbox))))), container->details->search_entry);
5843
5844 gtk_widget_realize (container->details->search_entry);
5845}
5846
5847/* Pops up the interactive search entry. If keybinding is TRUE then the user
5848 * started this by typing the start_interactive_search keybinding. Otherwise, it came from
5849 */
5850static gboolean
5851caja_icon_container_real_start_interactive_search (CajaIconContainer *container,
5852 gboolean keybinding)
5853{
5854 /* We only start interactive search if we have focus. If one of our
5855 * children have focus, we don't want to start the search.
5856 */
5857 GtkWidgetClass *entry_parent_class;
5858
5859 if (container->details->search_window != NULL((void*)0) &&
5860 gtk_widget_get_visible (container->details->search_window))
5861 {
5862 return TRUE(!(0));
5863 }
5864
5865 if (!gtk_widget_has_focus (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container)))))))
5866 {
5867 return FALSE(0);
5868 }
5869
5870 caja_icon_container_ensure_interactive_directory (container);
5871
5872 if (keybinding)
5873 {
5874 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))), "");
5875 }
5876
5877 /* done, show it */
5878 caja_icon_container_search_position_func (container, container->details->search_window);
5879 gtk_widget_show (container->details->search_window);
5880 if (container->details->search_entry_changed_id == 0)
5881 {
5882 container->details->search_entry_changed_id =
5883 g_signal_connect (container->details->search_entry, "changed",g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_init
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5884 G_CALLBACK (caja_icon_container_search_init),g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_init
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
5885 container)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("changed"), (((GCallback) (caja_icon_container_search_init
))), (container), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
5886 }
5887
5888 container->details->typeselect_flush_timeout =
5889 g_timeout_add_seconds (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_SEARCH_DIALOG_TIMEOUT5,
5890 (GSourceFunc) caja_icon_container_search_entry_flush_timeout,
5891 container);
5892
5893 /* Grab focus will select all the text. We don't want that to happen, so we
5894 * call the parent instance and bypass the selection change. This is probably
5895 * really non-kosher. */
5896 entry_parent_class = g_type_class_peek_parent (GTK_ENTRY_GET_CLASS (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntryClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container->details
->search_entry)))->g_class)))));
5897 (entry_parent_class->grab_focus) (container->details->search_entry);
5898
5899 /* send focus-in event */
5900 send_focus_change (container->details->search_entry, TRUE(!(0)));
5901
5902 /* search first matching iter */
5903 caja_icon_container_search_init (container->details->search_entry, container);
5904
5905 return TRUE(!(0));
5906}
5907
5908static gboolean
5909caja_icon_container_start_interactive_search (CajaIconContainer *container)
5910{
5911 return caja_icon_container_real_start_interactive_search (container, TRUE(!(0)));
5912}
5913
5914static gboolean
5915handle_popups (CajaIconContainer *container,
5916 GdkEventKey *event,
5917 const char *signal)
5918{
5919 GdkEventButton button_event = { 0 };
5920
5921 g_signal_emit_by_name (container, signal, &button_event);
5922
5923 return TRUE(!(0));
5924}
5925
5926static int
5927key_press_event (GtkWidget *widget,
5928 GdkEventKey *event)
5929{
5930 CajaIconContainer *container;
5931 gboolean handled;
5932
5933 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
5934 handled = FALSE(0);
5935
5936 if (is_renaming (container) || is_renaming_pending (container))
5937 {
5938 switch (event->keyval)
5939 {
5940 case GDK_KEY_Return0xff0d:
5941 case GDK_KEY_KP_Enter0xff8d:
5942 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
5943 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5944 break;
5945 case GDK_KEY_Escape0xff1b:
5946 end_renaming_mode (container, FALSE(0));
5947 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5948 break;
5949 default:
5950 break;
5951 }
5952 }
5953 else
5954 {
5955 switch (event->keyval)
5956 {
5957 case GDK_KEY_Home0xff50:
5958 case GDK_KEY_KP_Home0xff95:
5959 keyboard_home (container, event);
5960 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5961 break;
5962 case GDK_KEY_End0xff57:
5963 case GDK_KEY_KP_End0xff9c:
5964 keyboard_end (container, event);
5965 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5966 break;
5967 case GDK_KEY_Left0xff51:
5968 case GDK_KEY_KP_Left0xff96:
5969 /* Don't eat Alt-Left, as that is used for history browsing */
5970 if ((event->state & GDK_MOD1_MASK) == 0)
5971 {
5972 keyboard_left (container, event);
5973 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5974 }
5975 break;
5976 case GDK_KEY_Up0xff52:
5977 case GDK_KEY_KP_Up0xff97:
5978 /* Don't eat Alt-Up, as that is used for alt-shift-Up */
5979 if ((event->state & GDK_MOD1_MASK) == 0)
5980 {
5981 keyboard_up (container, event);
5982 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5983 }
5984 break;
5985 case GDK_KEY_Right0xff53:
5986 case GDK_KEY_KP_Right0xff98:
5987 /* Don't eat Alt-Right, as that is used for history browsing */
5988 if ((event->state & GDK_MOD1_MASK) == 0)
5989 {
5990 keyboard_right (container, event);
5991 handled = TRUE(!(0));
5992 }
5993 break;
5994 case GDK_KEY_Down0xff54:
5995 case GDK_KEY_KP_Down0xff99:
5996 /* Don't eat Alt-Down, as that is used for Open */
5997 if ((event->state & GDK_MOD1_MASK) == 0)
5998 {
5999 keyboard_down (container, event);
6000 handled = TRUE(!(0));
6001 }
6002 break;
6003 case GDK_KEY_space0x020:
6004 keyboard_space (container, event);
6005 handled = TRUE(!(0));
6006 break;
6007#ifndef TAB_NAVIGATION_DISABLED
6008 case GDK_KEY_Tab0xff09:
6009 case GDK_KEY_ISO_Left_Tab0xfe20:
6010 select_previous_or_next_icon (container,
6011 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) == 0, event);
6012 handled = TRUE(!(0));
6013 break;
6014#endif
6015 case GDK_KEY_Return0xff0d:
6016 case GDK_KEY_KP_Enter0xff8d:
6017 if ((event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
6018 {
6019 activate_selected_items_alternate (container, NULL((void*)0));
6020 }
6021 else
6022 {
6023 activate_selected_items (container);
6024 }
6025
6026 handled = TRUE(!(0));
6027 break;
6028 case GDK_KEY_Escape0xff1b:
6029 handled = undo_stretching (container);
6030 break;
6031 case GDK_KEY_plus0x02b:
6032 case GDK_KEY_minus0x02d:
6033 case GDK_KEY_equal0x03d:
6034 case GDK_KEY_KP_Add0xffab:
6035 case GDK_KEY_KP_Subtract0xffad:
6036 case GDK_KEY_00x030:
6037 case GDK_KEY_KP_00xffb0:
6038 if (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
6039 {
6040 handled = keyboard_stretching (container, event);
6041 }
6042 break;
6043 case GDK_KEY_F100xffc7:
6044 /* handle Ctrl+F10 because we want to display the
6045 * background popup even if something is selected.
6046 * The other cases are handled by popup_menu().
6047 */
6048 if (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK)
6049 {
6050 handled = handle_popups (container, event,
6051 "context_click_background");
6052 }
6053 break;
6054 case GDK_KEY_v0x076:
6055 /* Eat Control + v to not enable type ahead */
6056 if ((event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) != 0)
6057 {
6058 handled = TRUE(!(0));
6059 }
6060 break;
6061 default:
6062 break;
6063 }
6064 }
6065
6066 if (!handled)
6067 {
6068 handled = GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->key_press_event (widget, event);
6069 }
6070
6071 /* We pass the event to the search_entry. If its text changes, then we
6072 * start the typeahead find capabilities.
6073 * Copied from CajaIconContainer */
6074 if (!handled &&
6075 event->keyval != GDK_KEY_slash0x02f /* don't steal slash key event, used for "go to" */ &&
6076 event->keyval != GDK_KEY_BackSpace0xff08 &&
6077 event->keyval != GDK_KEY_Delete0xffff)
6078 {
6079 GdkEvent *new_event;
6080 GdkWindow *window;
6081 char *old_text;
6082 const char *new_text;
6083 gboolean retval;
6084 gboolean text_modified;
6085 gulong popup_menu_id;
6086
6087 caja_icon_container_ensure_interactive_directory (container);
6088
6089 /* Make a copy of the current text */
6090 old_text = g_strdup (gtk_entry_get_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)))g_strdup_inline (gtk_entry_get_text (((((GtkEntry*) (void *) (
(container->details->search_entry)))))));
6091 new_event = gdk_event_copy ((GdkEvent *) event);
6092 window = ((GdkEventKey *) new_event)->window;
6093 ((GdkEventKey *) new_event)->window = gtk_widget_get_window (container->details->search_entry);
6094 gtk_widget_realize (container->details->search_window);
6095
6096 popup_menu_id = g_signal_connect (container->details->search_entry,g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("popup_menu"), (((GCallback) (gtk_true))), (((void*)0)), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
6097 "popup_menu", G_CALLBACK (gtk_true), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((container->details->search_entry
), ("popup_menu"), (((GCallback) (gtk_true))), (((void*)0)), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
6098
6099 gtk_widget_show (container->details->search_window);
6100
6101 /* Send the event to the window. If the preedit_changed signal is emitted
6102 * during this event, we will set priv->imcontext_changed */
6103 container->details->imcontext_changed = FALSE(0);
6104 retval = gtk_widget_event (container->details->search_entry, new_event);
6105 gtk_widget_hide (container->details->search_window);
6106
6107 g_signal_handler_disconnect (container->details->search_entry,
6108 popup_menu_id);
6109
6110 /* We check to make sure that the entry tried to handle the text, and that
6111 * the text has changed. */
6112 new_text = gtk_entry_get_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))));
6113 text_modified = strcmp (old_text, new_text) != 0;
6114 g_free (old_text);
6115 if (container->details->imcontext_changed || /* we're in a preedit */
6116 (retval && text_modified)) /* ...or the text was modified */
6117 {
6118 if (caja_icon_container_real_start_interactive_search (container, FALSE(0)))
6119 {
6120 gtk_widget_grab_focus (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
6121 return TRUE(!(0));
6122 }
6123 else
6124 {
6125 gtk_entry_set_text (GTK_ENTRY (container->details->search_entry)((((GtkEntry*) (void *) ((container->details->search_entry
))))), "");
6126 return FALSE(0);
6127 }
6128 }
6129
6130 ((GdkEventKey *) new_event)->window = window;
6131 gdk_event_free (new_event);
6132 }
6133
6134 return handled;
6135}
6136
6137static gboolean
6138popup_menu (GtkWidget *widget)
6139{
6140 CajaIconContainer *container;
6141
6142 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
6143
6144 if (has_selection (container))
6145 {
6146 handle_popups (container, NULL((void*)0),
6147 "context_click_selection");
6148 }
6149 else
6150 {
6151 handle_popups (container, NULL((void*)0),
6152 "context_click_background");
6153 }
6154
6155 return TRUE(!(0));
6156}
6157
6158static void
6159draw_canvas_background (EelCanvas *canvas,
6160 cairo_t *cr)
6161{
6162 /* Don't chain up to the parent to avoid clearing and redrawing */
6163}
6164
6165static void
6166grab_notify_cb (GtkWidget *widget,
6167 gboolean was_grabbed)
6168{
6169 CajaIconContainer *container;
6170
6171 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
6172
6173 if (container->details->rubberband_info.active &&
6174 !was_grabbed)
6175 {
6176 /* we got a (un)grab-notify during rubberband.
6177 * This happens when a new modal dialog shows
6178 * up (e.g. authentication or an error). Stop
6179 * the rubberbanding so that we can handle the
6180 * dialog. */
6181 stop_rubberbanding (container);
6182 }
6183}
6184
6185static void
6186text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback (gpointer callback_data)
6187{
6188 CajaIconContainer *container;
6189
6190 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (callback_data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((callback_data)))));
6191 invalidate_label_sizes (container);
6192 schedule_redo_layout (container);
6193}
6194
6195static GObject*
6196caja_icon_container_constructor (GType type,
6197 guint n_construct_params,
6198 GObjectConstructParam *construct_params)
6199{
6200 CajaIconContainer *container;
6201 GObject *object;
6202
6203 object = G_OBJECT_CLASS (caja_icon_container_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((caja_icon_container_parent_class
)))))->constructor
6204 (type,
6205 n_construct_params,
6206 construct_params);
6207
6208 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (object)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((object)))));
6209 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (container))
6210 {
6211 g_signal_connect_swapped (caja_desktop_preferences,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_desktop_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6212 "changed::" CAJA_PREFERENCES_DESKTOP_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_desktop_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6213 G_CALLBACK (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback),g_signal_connect_data ((caja_desktop_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6214 container)g_signal_connect_data ((caja_desktop_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED);
6215 }
6216 else
6217 {
6218 g_signal_connect_swapped (caja_icon_view_preferences,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6219 "changed::" CAJA_PREFERENCES_ICON_VIEW_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6220 G_CALLBACK (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback),g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6221 container)g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_container_callback
))), (container), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED);
6222 }
6223
6224 return object;
6225}
6226
6227/* Initialization. */
6228
6229static void
6230caja_icon_container_class_init (CajaIconContainerClass *class)
6231{
6232 GtkWidgetClass *widget_class;
6233 EelCanvasClass *canvas_class;
6234 GtkBindingSet *binding_set;
6235
6236 G_OBJECT_CLASS (class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->constructor = caja_icon_container_constructor;
6237 G_OBJECT_CLASS (class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->finalize = finalize;
6238
6239 GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((class)))))->destroy = destroy;
6240
6241 /* Signals. */
6242
6243 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED]
6244 = g_signal_new ("selection_changed",
6245 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6246 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6247 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, selection_changed
))
6248 selection_changed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, selection_changed
)),
6249 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),

6251 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0);
6252 signals[BUTTON_PRESS]

))
6257 button_press)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, button_press
)),
6258 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),

6260 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), 1,
6261 GDK_TYPE_EVENT(gdk_event_get_type ()));
6262 signals[ACTIVATE]
6263 = g_signal_new ("activate",
6264 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
