6488 signals[GET_STORED_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP]
6489 = g_signal_new ("get_stored_layout_timestamp",
6490 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6491 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6492 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, get_stored_layout_timestamp
))
6493 get_stored_layout_timestamp)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, get_stored_layout_timestamp
)),
6494 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6495 caja_marshal_BOOLEAN__POINTER_POINTER,
6496 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), 2,
6497 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))),
6498 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6499 signals[STORE_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP]
6500 = g_signal_new ("store_layout_timestamp",
6501 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6502 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6503 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, store_layout_timestamp
))
6504 store_layout_timestamp)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, store_layout_timestamp
)),
6505 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6506 caja_marshal_BOOLEAN__POINTER_POINTER,
6507 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), 2,
6508 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))),
6509 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6510 signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED]
6511 = g_signal_new ("layout_changed",
6512 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6513 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6514 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, layout_changed
))
6515 layout_changed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, layout_changed
)),
6516 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6517 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6518 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0);
6519 signals[PREVIEW]
6520 = g_signal_new ("preview",
6521 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6522 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6523 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, preview))
6524 preview)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, preview)),
6525 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6526 caja_marshal_INT__POINTER_BOOLEAN,
6527 G_TYPE_INT((GType) ((6) << (2))), 2,
6528 G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))),
6529 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))));
6530 signals[BAND_SELECT_STARTED]
6531 = g_signal_new ("band_select_started",
6532 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6533 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6534 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, band_select_started
))
6535 band_select_started)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, band_select_started
)),
6536 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6537 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6538 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0);
6539 signals[BAND_SELECT_ENDED]
6540 = g_signal_new ("band_select_ended",
6541 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6542 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6543 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, band_select_ended
))
6544 band_select_ended)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, band_select_ended
)),
6545 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6546 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6547 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0);
6548 signals[ICON_ADDED]
6549 = g_signal_new ("icon_added",
6550 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6551 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6552 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, icon_added
))
6553 icon_added)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, icon_added
)),
6554 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6555 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__POINTER,
6556 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1, G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6557 signals[ICON_REMOVED]
6558 = g_signal_new ("icon_removed",
6559 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6560 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6561 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, icon_removed
))
6562 icon_removed)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, icon_removed
)),
6563 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6564 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__POINTER,
6565 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 1, G_TYPE_POINTER((GType) ((17) << (2))));
6566
6567 signals[CLEARED]
6568 = g_signal_new ("cleared",
6569 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6570 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST,
6571 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, cleared))
6572 cleared)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, cleared)),
6573 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6574 g_cclosure_marshal_VOID__VOID,
6575 G_TYPE_NONE((GType) ((1) << (2))), 0);
6576
6577 signals[START_INTERACTIVE_SEARCH]
6578 = g_signal_new ("start_interactive_search",
6579 G_TYPE_FROM_CLASS (class)(((GTypeClass*) (class))->g_type),
6580 G_SIGNAL_RUN_LAST | G_SIGNAL_ACTION,
6581 G_STRUCT_OFFSET (CajaIconContainerClass,((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, start_interactive_search
))
6582 start_interactive_search)((glong) __builtin_offsetof(CajaIconContainerClass, start_interactive_search
)),
6583 NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0),
6584 caja_marshal_BOOLEAN__VOID,
6585 G_TYPE_BOOLEAN((GType) ((5) << (2))), 0);
6586
6587 /* GtkWidget class. */
6588
6589 widget_class = GTK_WIDGET_CLASS (class)((((GtkWidgetClass*) (void *) ((class)))));
6590 widget_class->size_allocate = size_allocate;
6591 widget_class->get_request_mode = get_request_mode;
6592 widget_class->get_preferred_width = get_prefered_width;
6593 widget_class->get_preferred_height = get_prefered_height;
6594 widget_class->draw = draw;
6595 widget_class->realize = realize;
6596 widget_class->unrealize = unrealize;
6597 widget_class->button_press_event = button_press_event;
6598 widget_class->button_release_event = button_release_event;
6599 widget_class->motion_notify_event = motion_notify_event;
6600 widget_class->key_press_event = key_press_event;
6601 widget_class->popup_menu = popup_menu;
6602 widget_class->style_updated = style_updated;
6603 widget_class->grab_notify = grab_notify_cb;
6604
6605 gtk_widget_class_set_accessible_type (widget_class, caja_icon_container_accessible_get_type ());
6606
6607 canvas_class = EEL_CANVAS_CLASS (class)((((EelCanvasClass*) (void *) ((class)))));
6608 canvas_class->draw_background = draw_canvas_background;
6609 class->start_interactive_search = caja_icon_container_start_interactive_search;
6610
6611 gtk_widget_class_install_style_property (widget_class,
6612 g_param_spec_boxed ("selection_box_rgba",
6613 "Selection Box RGBA",
6614 "Color of the selection box",
6615 GDK_TYPE_RGBA(gdk_rgba_get_type ()),
6616 G_PARAM_READABLE));
6617 gtk_widget_class_install_style_property (widget_class,
6618 g_param_spec_boxed ("light_info_rgba",
6619 "Light Info RGBA",
6620 "Color used for information text against a dark background",
6621 GDK_TYPE_RGBA(gdk_rgba_get_type ()),
6622 G_PARAM_READABLE));
6623 gtk_widget_class_install_style_property (widget_class,
6624 g_param_spec_boxed ("dark_info_rgba",
6625 "Dark Info RGBA",
6626 "Color used for information text against a light background",
6627 GDK_TYPE_RGBA(gdk_rgba_get_type ()),
6628 G_PARAM_READABLE));
6629 gtk_widget_class_install_style_property (widget_class,
6630 g_param_spec_boolean ("activate_prelight_icon_label",
6631 "Activate Prelight Icon Label",
6632 "Whether icon labels should make use of its prelight color in prelight state",
6633 FALSE(0),
6634 G_PARAM_READABLE));
6635
6636 binding_set = gtk_binding_set_by_class (class);
6637
6638 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, GDK_KEY_f0x066, GDK_CONTROL_MASK, "start_interactive_search", 0);
6639 gtk_binding_entry_add_signal (binding_set, GDK_KEY_F0x046, GDK_CONTROL_MASK, "start_interactive_search", 0);
6640}
6641
6642static void
6643update_selected (CajaIconContainer *container)
6644{
6645 GList *node;
6646 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
6647
6648 for (node = container->details->icons; node != NULL((void*)0); node = node->next)
6649 {
6650 icon = node->data;
6651 if (icon->is_selected)
6652 {
6653 eel_canvas_item_request_update (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
6654 }
6655 }
6656}
6657
6658static gboolean
6659handle_focus_in_event (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventFocus *event, gpointer user_data)
6660{
6661 update_selected (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget))))));
6662
6663 return FALSE(0);
6664}
6665
6666static gboolean
6667handle_focus_out_event (GtkWidget *widget, GdkEventFocus *event, gpointer user_data)
6668{
6669 /* End renaming and commit change. */
6670 end_renaming_mode (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget))))), TRUE(!(0)));
6671 update_selected (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget))))));
6672
6673 return FALSE(0);
6674}
6675
6676static void
6677handle_scale_factor_changed (GObject *object,
6678 GParamSpec *pspec,
6679 gpointer user_data)
6680{
6681 invalidate_labels (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (object)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((object))))));
6682 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (object)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((object))))));
6683}
6684
6685static int text_ellipsis_limits[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_N_ENTRIES(CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST + 1)];
6686static int desktop_text_ellipsis_limit;
6687
6688static gboolean
6689get_text_ellipsis_limit_for_zoom (char **strs,
6690 const char *zoom_level,
6691 int *limit)
6692{
6693 char *str;
6694 gboolean success;
6695
6696 success = FALSE(0);
6697
6698 /* default */
6699 *limit = 3;
6700
6701 if (zoom_level != NULL((void*)0))
6702 {
6703 str = g_strdup_printf ("%s:%%d", zoom_level);
6704 }
6705 else
6706 {
6707 str = g_strdup ("%d")g_strdup_inline ("%d");
6708 }
6709
6710 if (strs != NULL((void*)0))
6711 {
6712 char **p;
6713
6714 for (p = strs; *p != NULL((void*)0); p++)
6715 {
6716 if (sscanf (*p, str, limit))
6717 {
6718 success = TRUE(!(0));
6719 }
6720 }
6721 }
6722
6723 g_free (str);
6724
6725 return success;
6726}
6727
6728static const char * zoom_level_names[] = {
6729 "smallest",
6730 "smaller",
6731 "small",
6732 "standard",
6733 "large",
6734 "larger",
6735 "largest"
6736};
6737
6738static void
6739text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback (gpointer callback_data)
6740{
6741 char **pref;
6742 unsigned int i;
6743 int one_limit;
6744
6745 pref = g_settings_get_strv (caja_icon_view_preferences, CAJA_PREFERENCES_ICON_VIEW_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT"text-ellipsis-limit");
6746
6747 /* set default */
6748 get_text_ellipsis_limit_for_zoom (pref, NULL((void*)0), &one_limit);
6749 for (i = 0; i < CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_N_ENTRIES(CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST + 1); i++)
6750 {
6751 text_ellipsis_limits[i] = one_limit;
6752 }
6753
6754 /* override for each zoom level */
6755 for (i = 0; i < G_N_ELEMENTS(zoom_level_names)(sizeof (zoom_level_names) / sizeof ((zoom_level_names)[0])); i++) {
6756 if (get_text_ellipsis_limit_for_zoom (pref,
6757 zoom_level_names[i],
6758 &one_limit)) {
6759 text_ellipsis_limits[i] = one_limit;
6760 }
6761 }
6762
6763 g_strfreev (pref);
6764}
6765
6766static void
6767desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback (gpointer callback_data)
6768{
6769 int pref;
6770
6771 pref = g_settings_get_int (caja_desktop_preferences, CAJA_PREFERENCES_DESKTOP_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT"text-ellipsis-limit");
6772 desktop_text_ellipsis_limit = pref;
6773}
6774
6775static void
6776caja_icon_container_init (CajaIconContainer *container)
6777{
6778 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
6779 EelBackground *background;
6780 static gboolean setup_prefs = FALSE(0);
6781
6782 details = g_new0 (CajaIconContainerDetails, 1)(CajaIconContainerDetails *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize
) (1); gsize __s = sizeof (CajaIconContainerDetails); gpointer
__p; if (__s == 1) __p = g_malloc0 (__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p
(__n) && (__s == 0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L
*2UL+1UL) / __s)) __p = g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n
(__n, __s); __p; }));
6783
6784 details->icon_set = g_hash_table_new (g_direct_hash, g_direct_equal);
6785 details->layout_timestamp = UNDEFINED_TIME((time_t) (-1));
6786
6787 details->zoom_level = CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_STANDARD;
6788
6789 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_SMALLEST] = -2 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6790 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_SMALLER] = -2 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6791 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_SMALL] = -0 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6792 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_STANDARD] = 0 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6793 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGE] = 0 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6794 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGER] = 0 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6795 details->font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST] = 0 * PANGO_SCALE1024;
6796
6797 container->details = details;
6798
6799 /* when the background changes, we must set up the label text color */
6800 background = eel_get_widget_background (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
6801
6802 g_signal_connect (container, "focus-in-event",g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("focus-in-event"), (((GCallback
) (handle_focus_in_event))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6803 G_CALLBACK (handle_focus_in_event), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("focus-in-event"), (((GCallback
) (handle_focus_in_event))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6804 g_signal_connect (container, "focus-out-event",g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("focus-out-event"), (((GCallback
) (handle_focus_out_event))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0)
6805 G_CALLBACK (handle_focus_out_event), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("focus-out-event"), (((GCallback
) (handle_focus_out_event))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), (GConnectFlags
) 0);
6806
6807 g_signal_connect (container, "notify::scale-factor",g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("notify::scale-factor"),
(((GCallback) (handle_scale_factor_changed))), (((void*)0)),
((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
6808 G_CALLBACK (handle_scale_factor_changed), NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((container), ("notify::scale-factor"),
(((GCallback) (handle_scale_factor_changed))), (((void*)0)),
((void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
6809
6810 eel_background_set_use_base (background, TRUE(!(0)));
6811
6812 if (!setup_prefs)
6813 {
6814 g_signal_connect_swapped (caja_icon_view_preferences,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6815 "changed::" CAJA_PREFERENCES_ICON_VIEW_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6816 G_CALLBACK (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback),g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6817 NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED);
6818 text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback (NULL((void*)0));
6819
6820 g_signal_connect_swapped (caja_icon_view_preferences,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6821 "changed::" CAJA_PREFERENCES_DESKTOP_TEXT_ELLIPSIS_LIMIT,g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6822 G_CALLBACK (desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback),g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED)
6823 NULL)g_signal_connect_data ((caja_icon_view_preferences), ("changed::"
"text-ellipsis-limit"), (((GCallback) (desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback
))), (((void*)0)), ((void*)0), G_CONNECT_SWAPPED);
6824 desktop_text_ellipsis_limit_changed_callback (NULL((void*)0));
6825
6826 setup_prefs = TRUE(!(0));
6827 }
6828}
6829
6830typedef struct
6831{
6832 CajaIconContainer *container;
6833 GdkEventButton *event;
6834} ContextMenuParameters;
6835
6836static gboolean
6837handle_icon_double_click (CajaIconContainer *container,
6838 CajaIcon *icon,
6839 GdkEventButton *event)
6840{
6841 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
6842
6843 if (event->button != DRAG_BUTTON1)
6844 {
6845 return FALSE(0);
6846 }
6847
6848 details = container->details;
6849
6850 if (!details->single_click_mode &&
6851 clicked_within_double_click_interval (container) &&
6852 details->double_click_icon[0] == details->double_click_icon[1] &&
6853 details->double_click_button[0] == details->double_click_button[1])
6854 {
6855 if (!button_event_modifies_selection (event))
6856 {
6857 activate_selected_items (container);
6858 return TRUE(!(0));
6859 }
6860 else if ((event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) == 0 &&
6861 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
6862 {
6863 activate_selected_items_alternate (container, icon);
6864 return TRUE(!(0));
6865 }
6866 }
6867
6868 return FALSE(0);
6869}
6870
6871/* CajaIcon event handling. */
6872
6873/* Conceptually, pressing button 1 together with CTRL or SHIFT toggles
6874 * selection of a single icon without affecting the other icons;
6875 * without CTRL or SHIFT, it selects a single icon and un-selects all
6876 * the other icons. But in this latter case, the de-selection should
6877 * only happen when the button is released if the icon is already
6878 * selected, because the user might select multiple icons and drag all
6879 * of them by doing a simple click-drag.
6880*/
6881
6882static gboolean
6883handle_icon_button_press (CajaIconContainer *container,
6884 CajaIcon *icon,
6885 GdkEventButton *event)
6886{
6887 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
6888
6889 details = container->details;
6890
6891 if (event->type == GDK_2BUTTON_PRESS || event->type == GDK_3BUTTON_PRESS)
6892 {
6893 return TRUE(!(0));
6894 }
6895
6896 if (event->button != DRAG_BUTTON1
6897 && event->button != CONTEXTUAL_MENU_BUTTON3
6898 && event->button != DRAG_MENU_BUTTON2)
6899 {
6900 return TRUE(!(0));
6901 }
6902
6903 if ((event->button == DRAG_BUTTON1) &&
6904 event->type == GDK_BUTTON_PRESS)
6905 {
6906 /* The next double click has to be on this icon */
6907 details->double_click_icon[1] = details->double_click_icon[0];
6908 details->double_click_icon[0] = icon;
6909
6910 details->double_click_button[1] = details->double_click_button[0];
6911 details->double_click_button[0] = event->button;
6912 }
6913
6914 if (handle_icon_double_click (container, icon, event))
6915 {
6916 /* Double clicking does not trigger a D&D action. */
6917 details->drag_button = 0;
6918 details->drag_icon = NULL((void*)0);
6919 return TRUE(!(0));
6920 }
6921
6922 if (event->button == DRAG_BUTTON1
6923 || event->button == DRAG_MENU_BUTTON2)
6924 {
6925 details->drag_button = event->button;
6926 details->drag_icon = icon;
6927 details->drag_x = event->x;
6928 details->drag_y = event->y;
6929 details->drag_state = DRAG_STATE_MOVE_OR_COPY;
6930 details->drag_started = FALSE(0);
6931
6932 /* Check to see if this is a click on the stretch handles.
6933 * If so, it won't modify the selection.
6934 */
6935 if (icon == container->details->stretch_icon)
6936 {
6937 if (start_stretching (container, (GdkEvent *)event))
6938 {
6939 return TRUE(!(0));
6940 }
6941 }
6942 }
6943
6944 /* Modify the selection as appropriate. Selection is modified
6945 * the same way for contextual menu as it would be without.
6946 */
6947 details->icon_selected_on_button_down = icon->is_selected;
6948
6949 if ((event->button == DRAG_BUTTON1 || event->button == MIDDLE_BUTTON2) &&
6950 (event->state & GDK_SHIFT_MASK) != 0)
6951 {
6952 CajaIcon *start_icon;
6953
6954 start_icon = details->range_selection_base_icon;
6955 if (start_icon == NULL((void*)0) || !start_icon->is_selected)
6956 {
6957 start_icon = icon;
6958 details->range_selection_base_icon = icon;
6959 }
6960 if (select_range (container, start_icon, icon,
6961 (event->state & GDK_CONTROL_MASK) == 0))
6962 {
6963 g_signal_emit (container,
6964 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
6965 }
6966 }
6967 else if (!details->icon_selected_on_button_down)
6968 {
6969 details->range_selection_base_icon = icon;
6970 if (button_event_modifies_selection (event))
6971 {
6972 icon_toggle_selected (container, icon);
6973 g_signal_emit (container,
6974 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
6975 }
6976 else
6977 {
6978 select_one_unselect_others (container, icon);
6979 g_signal_emit (container,
6980 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
6981 }
6982 }
6983
6984 if (event->button == CONTEXTUAL_MENU_BUTTON3)
6985 {
6986 g_signal_emit (container,
6987 signals[CONTEXT_CLICK_SELECTION], 0,
6988 event);
6989 }
6990
6991 return TRUE(!(0));
6992}
6993
6994static int
6995item_event_callback (EelCanvasItem *item,
6996 GdkEvent *event,
6997 gpointer data)
6998{
6999 CajaIconContainer *container;
7000 CajaIcon *icon;
7001
7002 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((data)))));
7003
7004 icon = CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM (item)((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((item)))))->user_data;
7005 g_assert (icon != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_161
; if (icon != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_161 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_161
= 0; _g_boolean_var_161; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 7005, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "icon != NULL"); } while (0);
7006
7007 switch (event->type)
7008 {
7009 case GDK_BUTTON_PRESS:
7010 if (handle_icon_button_press (container, icon, &event->button))
7011 {
7012 /* Stop the event from being passed along further. Returning
7013 * TRUE ain't enough.
7014 */
7015 return TRUE(!(0));
7016 }
7017 return FALSE(0);
7018 default:
7019 return FALSE(0);
7020 }
7021}
7022
7023GtkWidget *
7024caja_icon_container_new (void)
7025{
7026 return gtk_widget_new (CAJA_TYPE_ICON_CONTAINERcaja_icon_container_get_type(), NULL((void*)0));
7027}
7028
7029/* Clear all of the icons in the container. */
7030void
7031caja_icon_container_clear (CajaIconContainer *container)
7032{
7033 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
7034 GList *p;
7035 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
7036
7037 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_162
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_162 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_162 =
0; _g_boolean_var_162; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
7038
7039 details = container->details;
7040 details->layout_timestamp = UNDEFINED_TIME((time_t) (-1));
7041 details->store_layout_timestamps_when_finishing_new_icons = FALSE(0);
7042
7043 if (details->icons == NULL((void*)0))
7044 {
7045 return;
7046 }
7047
7048 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
7049
7050 clear_keyboard_focus (container);
7051 clear_keyboard_rubberband_start (container);
7052 unschedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (container);
7053 set_pending_icon_to_reveal (container, NULL((void*)0));
7054 details->stretch_icon = NULL((void*)0);
7055 details->drop_target = NULL((void*)0);
7056
7057 for (p = details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
7058 {
7059 icon = p->data;
7060 if (icon->is_monitored)
7061 {
7062 caja_icon_container_stop_monitor_top_left (container,
7063 icon->data,
7064 icon);
7065 }
7066 icon_free (p->data);
7067 }
7068 g_list_free (details->icons);
7069 details->icons = NULL((void*)0);
7070 g_list_free (details->new_icons);
7071 details->new_icons = NULL((void*)0);
7072
7073 g_hash_table_destroy (details->icon_set);
7074 details->icon_set = g_hash_table_new (g_direct_hash, g_direct_equal);
7075
7076 caja_icon_container_update_scroll_region (container);
7077}
7078
7079gboolean
7080caja_icon_container_is_empty (CajaIconContainer *container)
7081{
7082 return container->details->icons == NULL((void*)0);
7083}
7084
7085CajaIconData *
7086caja_icon_container_get_first_visible_icon (CajaIconContainer *container)
7087{
7088 GList *l;
7089 CajaIcon *icon, *best_icon;
7090 double x, y;
7091 double x1, y1, x2, y2;
7092 double *pos, best_pos;
7093 double hadj_v, vadj_v, h_page_size;
7094 gboolean better_icon;
7095 gboolean compare_lt;
7096
7097 hadj_v = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
7098 vadj_v = gtk_adjustment_get_value (gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
7099 h_page_size = gtk_adjustment_get_page_size (gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container)))))));
7100
7101 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
7102 {
7103 x = hadj_v + h_page_size - ICON_PAD_LEFT4 - 1;
7104 y = vadj_v;
7105 }
7106 else
7107 {
7108 x = hadj_v;
7109 y = vadj_v;
7110 }
7111
7112 eel_canvas_c2w (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
7113 x, y,
7114 &x, &y);
7115
7116 l = container->details->icons;
7117 best_icon = NULL((void*)0);
7118 best_pos = 0;
7119 while (l != NULL((void*)0))
7120 {
7121 icon = l->data;
7122
7123 if (icon_is_positioned (icon))
7124 {
7125 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
7126 &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
7127
7128 compare_lt = FALSE(0);
7129 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
7130 {
7131 pos = &x1;
7132 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container))
7133 {
7134 compare_lt = TRUE(!(0));
7135 better_icon = x1 < x + ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
7136 }
7137 else
7138 {
7139 better_icon = x2 > x + ICON_PAD_LEFT4;
7140 }
7141 }
7142 else
7143 {
7144 pos = &y1;
7145 better_icon = y2 > y + ICON_PAD_TOP4;
7146 }
7147 if (better_icon)
7148 {
7149 if (best_icon == NULL((void*)0))
7150 {
7151 better_icon = TRUE(!(0));
7152 }
7153 else if (compare_lt)
7154 {
7155 better_icon = best_pos < *pos;
7156 }
7157 else
7158 {
7159 better_icon = best_pos > *pos;
7160 }
7161
7162 if (better_icon)
7163 {
7164 best_icon = icon;
7165 best_pos = *pos;
7166 }
7167 }
7168 }
7169
7170 l = l->next;
7171 }
7172
7173 return best_icon ? best_icon->data : NULL((void*)0);
7174}
7175
7176/* puts the icon at the top of the screen */
7177void
7178caja_icon_container_scroll_to_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
7179 CajaIconData *data)
7180{
7181 GList *l;
7182 GtkAdjustment *hadj, *vadj;
7183 EelIRect bounds;
7184 GtkAllocation allocation;
7185 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
7186
7187 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
7188 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
7189 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
7190
7191 /* We need to force a relayout now if there are updates queued
7192 * since we need the final positions */
7193 caja_icon_container_layout_now (container);
7194
7195 l = container->details->icons;
7196 while (l != NULL((void*)0)) {
7197 icon = l->data;
7198
7199 if (icon->data == data &&
7200 icon_is_positioned (icon)) {
7201
7202 if (caja_icon_container_is_auto_layout (container)) {
7203 /* ensure that we reveal the entire row/column */
7204 icon_get_row_and_column_bounds (container, icon, &bounds, TRUE(!(0)));
7205 } else {
7206 item_get_canvas_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))), &bounds, TRUE(!(0)));
7207 }
7208
7209 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container)) {
7210 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (container)) {
7211 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, bounds.x1 - allocation.width);
7212 } else {
7213 gtk_adjustment_set_value (hadj, bounds.x0);
7214 }
7215 } else {
7216 gtk_adjustment_set_value (vadj, bounds.y0);
7217 }
7218 }
7219
7220 l = l->next;
7221 }
7222}
7223
7224/* Call a function for all the icons. */
7225typedef struct
7226{
7227 CajaIconCallback callback;
7228 gpointer callback_data;
7229} CallbackAndData;
7230
7231static void
7232call_icon_callback (gpointer data, gpointer callback_data)
7233{
7234 CajaIcon *icon;
7235 CallbackAndData *callback_and_data;
7236
7237 icon = data;
7238 callback_and_data = callback_data;
7239 (* callback_and_data->callback) (icon->data, callback_and_data->callback_data);
7240}
7241
7242void
7243caja_icon_container_for_each (CajaIconContainer *container,
7244 CajaIconCallback callback,
7245 gpointer callback_data)
7246{
7247 CallbackAndData callback_and_data;
7248
7249 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_163
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_163 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_163 =
0; _g_boolean_var_163; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
7250
7251 callback_and_data.callback = callback;
7252 callback_and_data.callback_data = callback_data;
7253
7254 g_list_foreach (container->details->icons,
7255 call_icon_callback, &callback_and_data);
7256}
7257
7258static int
7259selection_changed_at_idle_callback (gpointer data)
7260{
7261 CajaIconContainer *container;
7262
7263 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((data)))));
7264
7265 g_signal_emit (container,
7266 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
7267
7268 container->details->selection_changed_id = 0;
7269 return FALSE(0);
7270}
7271
7272/* utility routine to remove a single icon from the container */
7273
7274static void
7275icon_destroy (CajaIconContainer *container,
7276 CajaIcon *icon)
7277{
7278 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
7279 gboolean was_selected;
7280 CajaIcon *icon_to_focus;
7281 GList *item;
7282
7283 details = container->details;
7284
7285 item = g_list_find (details->icons, icon);
7286 item = item->next ? item->next : item->prev;
7287 icon_to_focus = (item != NULL((void*)0)) ? item->data : NULL((void*)0);
7288
7289 details->icons = g_list_remove (details->icons, icon);
7290 details->new_icons = g_list_remove (details->new_icons, icon);
7291 g_hash_table_remove (details->icon_set, icon->data);
7292
7293 was_selected = icon->is_selected;
7294
7295 if (details->keyboard_focus == icon ||
7296 details->keyboard_focus == NULL((void*)0))
7297 {
7298 if (icon_to_focus != NULL((void*)0))
7299 {
7300 set_keyboard_focus (container, icon_to_focus);
7301 }
7302 else
7303 {
7304 clear_keyboard_focus (container);
7305 }
7306 }
7307
7308 if (details->keyboard_rubberband_start == icon)
7309 {
7310 clear_keyboard_rubberband_start (container);
7311 }
7312
7313 if (details->keyboard_icon_to_reveal == icon)
7314 {
7315 unschedule_keyboard_icon_reveal (container);
7316 }
7317 if (details->drag_icon == icon)
7318 {
7319 clear_drag_state (container);
7320 }
7321 if (details->drop_target == icon)
7322 {
7323 details->drop_target = NULL((void*)0);
7324 }
7325 if (details->range_selection_base_icon == icon)
7326 {
7327 details->range_selection_base_icon = NULL((void*)0);
7328 }
7329 if (details->pending_icon_to_reveal == icon)
7330 {
7331 set_pending_icon_to_reveal (container, NULL((void*)0));
7332 }
7333 if (details->stretch_icon == icon)
7334 {
7335 details->stretch_icon = NULL((void*)0);
7336 }
7337
7338 if (icon->is_monitored)
7339 {
7340 caja_icon_container_stop_monitor_top_left (container,
7341 icon->data,
7342 icon);
7343 }
7344 icon_free (icon);
7345
7346 if (was_selected)
7347 {
7348 /* Coalesce multiple removals causing multiple selection_changed events */
7349 details->selection_changed_id = g_idle_add (selection_changed_at_idle_callback, container);
7350 }
7351}
7352
7353/* activate any selected items in the container */
7354static void
7355activate_selected_items (CajaIconContainer *container)
7356{
7357 GList *selection;
7358
7359 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_164
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_164 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_164 =
0; _g_boolean_var_164; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
7360
7361 selection = caja_icon_container_get_selection (container);
7362 if (selection != NULL((void*)0))
7363 {
7364 g_signal_emit (container,
7365 signals[ACTIVATE], 0,
7366 selection);
7367 }
7368 g_list_free (selection);
7369}
7370
7371static void
7372activate_selected_items_alternate (CajaIconContainer *container,
7373 CajaIcon *icon)
7374{
7375 GList *selection;
7376
7377 g_assert (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_165
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_165 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_165 =
0; _g_boolean_var_165; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 7377, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"); } while (
0);
7378
7379 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
7380 {
7381 selection = g_list_prepend (NULL((void*)0), icon->data);
7382 }
7383 else
7384 {
7385 selection = caja_icon_container_get_selection (container);
7386 }
7387 if (selection != NULL((void*)0))
7388 {
7389 g_signal_emit (container,
7390 signals[ACTIVATE_ALTERNATE], 0,
7391 selection);
7392 }
7393 g_list_free (selection);
7394}
7395
7396static CajaIcon *
7397get_icon_being_renamed (CajaIconContainer *container)
7398{
7399 CajaIcon *rename_icon;
7400
7401 if (!is_renaming (container))
7402 {
7403 return NULL((void*)0);
7404 }
7405
7406 g_assert (!has_multiple_selection (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_166
; if (!has_multiple_selection (container)) _g_boolean_var_166
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_166 = 0; _g_boolean_var_166; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7406, ((const char*) (__func__)), "!has_multiple_selection (container)"
); } while (0);
7407
7408 rename_icon = get_first_selected_icon (container);
7409 g_assert (rename_icon != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_167
; if (rename_icon != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_167 = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_167 = 0; _g_boolean_var_167; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 7409, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "rename_icon != NULL"); } while (0);
7410
7411 return rename_icon;
7412}
7413
7414static CajaIconInfo *
7415caja_icon_container_get_icon_images (CajaIconContainer *container,
7416 CajaIconData *data,
7417 int size,
7418 GList **emblem_pixbufs,
7419 char **embedded_text,
7420 gboolean for_drag_accept,
7421 gboolean need_large_embeddded_text,
7422 gboolean *embedded_text_needs_loading,
7423 gboolean *has_open_window)
7424{
7425 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
7426
7427 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
7428 g_assert (klass->get_icon_images != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_168
; if (klass->get_icon_images != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_168
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_168 = 0; _g_boolean_var_168; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7428, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->get_icon_images != NULL"
); } while (0);
7429
7430 return klass->get_icon_images (container, data, size, emblem_pixbufs, embedded_text, for_drag_accept, need_large_embeddded_text, embedded_text_needs_loading, has_open_window);
7431}

7435{

)->g_class))));

; if (klass->freeze_updates != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_169
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_169 = 0; _g_boolean_var_169; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7439, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->freeze_updates != NULL"
); } while (0);
7440
7441 klass->freeze_updates (container);
7442}
7443
7444static void
7445caja_icon_container_unfreeze_updates (CajaIconContainer *container)
7446{

)->g_class))));
7450 g_assert (klass->unfreeze_updates != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_170
; if (klass->unfreeze_updates != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_170
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_170 = 0; _g_boolean_var_170; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7450, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->unfreeze_updates != NULL"
); } while (0);

7453}
7454
7455static void
7456caja_icon_container_start_monitor_top_left (CajaIconContainer *container,
7457 CajaIconData *data,
7458 gconstpointer client,
7459 gboolean large_text)
7460{
7461 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
7462
7463 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
7464 g_assert (klass->start_monitor_top_left != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_171
; if (klass->start_monitor_top_left != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_171
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_171 = 0; _g_boolean_var_171; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7464, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->start_monitor_top_left != NULL"
); } while (0);
7465
7466 klass->start_monitor_top_left (container, data, client, large_text);
7467}
7468
7469static void
7470caja_icon_container_stop_monitor_top_left (CajaIconContainer *container,
7471 CajaIconData *data,
7472 gconstpointer client)
7473{
7474 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
7475
7476 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
7477 g_return_if_fail (klass->stop_monitor_top_left != NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_172
; if (klass->stop_monitor_top_left != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_172
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_172 = 0; _g_boolean_var_172; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "klass->stop_monitor_top_left != NULL"
); return; } } while (0);
7478
7479 klass->stop_monitor_top_left (container, data, client);
7480}
7481
7482static void
7483caja_icon_container_prioritize_thumbnailing (CajaIconContainer *container,
7484 CajaIcon *icon)
7485{
7486 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
7487
7488 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
7489 g_assert (klass->prioritize_thumbnailing != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_173
; if (klass->prioritize_thumbnailing != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_173
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_173 = 0; _g_boolean_var_173; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 7489, ((const char*) (__func__)), "klass->prioritize_thumbnailing != NULL"
); } while (0);
7490
7491 klass->prioritize_thumbnailing (container, icon->data);
7492}
7493
7494static void
7495caja_icon_container_update_visible_icons (CajaIconContainer *container)
7496{
7497 GtkAdjustment *vadj, *hadj;
7498 double min_y, max_y;
7499 double min_x, max_x;
7500 double x0, y0, x1, y1;
7501 GList *node;
7502 gboolean visible;
7503 GtkAllocation allocation;
7504 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
7505
7506 hadj = gtk_scrollable_get_hadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
7507 vadj = gtk_scrollable_get_vadjustment (GTK_SCROLLABLE (container)((((GtkScrollable*) (void *) ((container))))));
7508 gtk_widget_get_allocation (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))), &allocation);
7509
7510 min_x = gtk_adjustment_get_value (hadj);
7511 max_x = min_x + allocation.width;
7512
7513 min_y = gtk_adjustment_get_value (vadj);
7514 max_y = min_y + allocation.height;
7515
7516 eel_canvas_c2w (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
7517 min_x, min_y, &min_x, &min_y);
7518 eel_canvas_c2w (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))),
7519 max_x, max_y, &max_x, &max_y);
7520
7521 /* Do the iteration in reverse to get the render-order from top to
7522 * bottom for the prioritized thumbnails.
7523 */
7524 for (node = g_list_last (container->details->icons); node != NULL((void*)0); node = node->prev)
7525 {
7526 icon = node->data;
7527
7528 if (icon_is_positioned (icon))
7529 {
7530 eel_canvas_item_get_bounds (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
7531 &x0,
7532 &y0,
7533 &x1,
7534 &y1);
7535 eel_canvas_item_i2w (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))))->parent,
7536 &x0,
7537 &y0);
7538 eel_canvas_item_i2w (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))))->parent,
7539 &x1,
7540 &y1);
7541
7542 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
7543 {
7544 visible = x1 >= min_x && x0 <= max_x;
7545 }
7546 else
7547 {
7548 visible = y1 >= min_y && y0 <= max_y;
7549 }
7550
7551 if (visible)
7552 {
7553 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_is_visible (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
7554 caja_icon_container_prioritize_thumbnailing (container,
7555 icon);
7556 }
7557 else
7558 {
7559 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_is_visible (icon->item, FALSE(0));
7560 }
7561 }
7562 }
7563}
7564
7565static void
7566handle_vadjustment_changed (GtkAdjustment *adjustment,
7567 CajaIconContainer *container)
7568{
7569 if (!caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
7570 {
7571 caja_icon_container_update_visible_icons (container);
7572 }
7573}
7574
7575static void
7576handle_hadjustment_changed (GtkAdjustment *adjustment,
7577 CajaIconContainer *container)
7578{
7579 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container))
7580 {
7581 caja_icon_container_update_visible_icons (container);
7582 }
7583}
7584
7585void
7586caja_icon_container_update_icon (CajaIconContainer *container,
7587 CajaIcon *icon)
7588{
7589 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
7590 guint icon_size;
7591 guint min_image_size, max_image_size;
7592 CajaIconInfo *icon_info;
7593 GdkPoint *attach_points;
7594 int n_attach_points;
7595 gboolean has_embedded_text_rect;
7596 GdkPixbuf *pixbuf;
7597 GList *emblem_pixbufs;
7598 char *editable_text, *additional_text;
7599 char *embedded_text;
7600 GdkRectangle embedded_text_rect;
7601 gboolean large_embedded_text;
7602 gboolean embedded_text_needs_loading;
7603 gboolean has_open_window;
7604
7605 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
7606 {
7607 return;
7608 }
7609
7610 details = container->details;
7611
7612 /* compute the maximum size based on the scale factor */
7613 min_image_size = MINIMUM_IMAGE_SIZE24 * EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))))->pixels_per_unit;
7614 max_image_size = MAX (MAXIMUM_IMAGE_SIZE * EEL_CANVAS (container)->pixels_per_unit, CAJA_ICON_MAXIMUM_SIZE)(((96 * ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))))->pixels_per_unit
) > (320)) ? (96 * ((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container)))
))->pixels_per_unit) : (320));
7615
7616 /* Get the appropriate images for the file. */
7617 if (container->details->forced_icon_size > 0)
7618 {
7619 icon_size = container->details->forced_icon_size;
7620 }
7621 else
7622 {
7623 icon_get_size (container, icon, &icon_size);
7624 }
7625
7626 icon_size = MAX (icon_size, min_image_size)(((icon_size) > (min_image_size)) ? (icon_size) : (min_image_size
));
7627 icon_size = MIN (icon_size, max_image_size)(((icon_size) < (max_image_size)) ? (icon_size) : (max_image_size
));
7628
7629 /* Get the icons. */
7630 emblem_pixbufs = NULL((void*)0);
7631 embedded_text = NULL((void*)0);
7632 large_embedded_text = icon_size > ICON_SIZE_FOR_LARGE_EMBEDDED_TEXT55;
7633 icon_info = caja_icon_container_get_icon_images (container, icon->data, icon_size,
7634 &emblem_pixbufs,
7635 &embedded_text,
7636 icon == details->drop_target,
7637 large_embedded_text, &embedded_text_needs_loading,
7638 &has_open_window);
7639
7640 if (container->details->forced_icon_size > 0)
7641 pixbuf = caja_icon_info_get_pixbuf_at_size (icon_info, icon_size);
7642 else
7643 pixbuf = caja_icon_info_get_pixbuf (icon_info);
7644 caja_icon_info_get_attach_points (icon_info, &attach_points, &n_attach_points);
7645 has_embedded_text_rect = caja_icon_info_get_embedded_rect (icon_info,
7646 &embedded_text_rect);
7647
7648 if (has_embedded_text_rect && embedded_text_needs_loading)
7649 {
7650 icon->is_monitored = TRUE(!(0));
7651 caja_icon_container_start_monitor_top_left (container, icon->data, icon, large_embedded_text);
7652 }
7653
7654 caja_icon_container_get_icon_text (container,
7655 icon->data,
7656 &editable_text,
7657 &additional_text,
7658 FALSE(0));
7659
7660 /* If name of icon being renamed was changed from elsewhere, end renaming mode.
7661 * Alternatively, we could replace the characters in the editable text widget
7662 * with the new name, but that could cause timing problems if the user just
7663 * happened to be typing at that moment.
7664 */
7665 if (icon == get_icon_being_renamed (container) &&
7666 g_strcmp0 (editable_text,
7667 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_editable_text (icon->item)) != 0)
7668 {
7669 end_renaming_mode (container, FALSE(0));
7670 }
7671
7672 eel_canvas_item_set (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
7673 "editable_text", editable_text,
7674 "additional_text", additional_text,
7675 "highlighted_for_drop", icon == details->drop_target,
7676 NULL((void*)0));
7677
7678 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_image (icon->item, pixbuf);
7679 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_attach_points (icon->item, attach_points, n_attach_points);
7680 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_emblems (icon->item, emblem_pixbufs);
7681 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_embedded_text_rect (icon->item, &embedded_text_rect);
7682 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_embedded_text (icon->item, embedded_text);
7683
7684 /* Let the pixbufs go. */
7685 g_object_unref (pixbuf);
7686 g_list_free_full (emblem_pixbufs, g_object_unref);
7687
7688 g_free (editable_text);
7689 g_free (additional_text);
7690
7691 g_object_unref (icon_info);
7692}
7693
7694static gboolean
7695assign_icon_position (CajaIconContainer *container,
7696 CajaIcon *icon)
7697{
7698 gboolean have_stored_position;
7699 CajaIconPosition position;
7700
7701 /* Get the stored position. */
7702 have_stored_position = FALSE(0);
7703 position.scale = 1.0;
7704 g_signal_emit (container,
7705 signals[GET_STORED_ICON_POSITION], 0,
7706 icon->data,
7707 &position,
7708 &have_stored_position);
7709 icon->scale = position.scale;
7710 if (!container->details->auto_layout)
7711 {
7712 if (have_stored_position)
7713 {
7714 icon_set_position (icon, position.x, position.y);
7715 icon->saved_ltr_x = icon->x;
7716 }
7717 else
7718 {
7719 return FALSE(0);
7720 }
7721 }
7722 return TRUE(!(0));
7723}
7724

7847
7848static gboolean
7849is_old_or_unknown_icon_data (CajaIconContainer *container,
7850 CajaIconData *data)
7851{
7852 time_t timestamp;
7853 gboolean success;
7854
7855 if (container->details->layout_timestamp == UNDEFINED_TIME((time_t) (-1)))
7856 {
7857 /* don't know */
7858 return FALSE(0);
7859 }
7860
7861 g_signal_emit (container,
7862 signals[GET_STORED_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP], 0,
7863 data, &timestamp, &success);
7864 return (!success || timestamp < container->details->layout_timestamp);
7865}
7866
7867/**
7868 * caja_icon_container_add:
7869 * @container: A CajaIconContainer
7870 * @data: Icon data.
7871 *
7872 * Add icon to represent @data to container.
7873 * Returns FALSE if there was already such an icon.
7874 **/
7875gboolean
7876caja_icon_container_add (CajaIconContainer *container,
7877 CajaIconData *data)
7878{
7879 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
7880 CajaIcon *icon;
7881 EelCanvasItem *band, *item;
7882
7883 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_176
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_176 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_176 =
0; _g_boolean_var_176; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
7884 g_return_val_if_fail (data != NULL, FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_177
; if (data != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_177 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_177
= 0; _g_boolean_var_177; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "data != NULL"); return
((0)); } } while (0);
7885
7886 details = container->details;
7887
7888 if (g_hash_table_lookup (details->icon_set, data) != NULL((void*)0))
7889 {
7890 return FALSE(0);
7891 }
7892
7893 /* Create the new icon, including the canvas item. */
7894 icon = g_new0 (CajaIcon, 1)(CajaIcon *) (__extension__ ({ gsize __n = (gsize) (1); gsize
__s = sizeof (CajaIcon); gpointer __p; if (__s == 1) __p = g_malloc0
(__n); else if (__builtin_constant_p (__n) && (__s ==
0 || __n <= (9223372036854775807L *2UL+1UL) / __s)) __p =
g_malloc0 (__n * __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s); __p
; }));
7895 icon->data = data;
7896 icon->x = ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1;
7897 icon->y = ICON_UNPOSITIONED_VALUE-1;
7898
7899 /* Whether the saved icon position should only be used
7900 * if the previous icon position is free. If the position
7901 * is occupied, another position near the last one will
7902 */
7903 icon->has_lazy_position = (is_old_or_unknown_icon_data (container, data) != FALSE(0));
7904 icon->scale = 1.0;
7905 icon->item = CAJA_ICON_CANVAS_ITEM((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((eel_canvas_item_new (((((
EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))), caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (), "visible"
, (0), ((void*)0)))))))
7906 (eel_canvas_item_new (EEL_CANVAS_GROUP (EEL_CANVAS (container)->root),((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((eel_canvas_item_new (((((
EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))), caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (), "visible"
, (0), ((void*)0)))))))
7907 caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (),((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((eel_canvas_item_new (((((
EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))), caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (), "visible"
, (0), ((void*)0)))))))
7908 "visible", FALSE,((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((eel_canvas_item_new (((((
EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))), caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (), "visible"
, (0), ((void*)0)))))))
7909 NULL))((((CajaIconCanvasItem*) (void *) ((eel_canvas_item_new (((((
EelCanvasGroup*) (void *) ((((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container
)))))->root))))), caja_icon_canvas_item_get_type (), "visible"
, (0), ((void*)0)))))));
7910 icon->item->user_data = icon;
7911
7912 /* Make sure the icon is under the selection_rectangle */
7913 item = EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))));
7914 band = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (item->canvas)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((item->canvas)))))->details->rubberband_info.selection_rectangle;
7915 if (band)
7916 {
7917 eel_canvas_item_send_behind (item, band);
7918 }
7919
7920 /* Put it on both lists. */
7921 details->icons = g_list_prepend (details->icons, icon);
7922 details->new_icons = g_list_prepend (details->new_icons, icon);
7923
7924 g_hash_table_insert (details->icon_set, data, icon);
7925
7926 /* Run an idle function to add the icons. */
7927 schedule_redo_layout (container);
7928
7929 return TRUE(!(0));
7930}
7931
7932void
7933caja_icon_container_layout_now (CajaIconContainer *container)
7934{
7935 if (container->details->idle_id != 0)
7936 {
7937 unschedule_redo_layout (container);
7938 redo_layout_internal (container);
7939 }
7940
7941 /* Also need to make sure we're properly resized, for instance
7942 * newly added files may trigger a change in the size allocation and
7943 * thus toggle scrollbars on */
7944 gtk_container_check_resize (GTK_CONTAINER (gtk_widget_get_parent (GTK_WIDGET (container)))((((GtkContainer*) (void *) ((gtk_widget_get_parent (((((GtkWidget
*) (void *) ((container))))))))))));
7945}
7946
7947/**
7948 * caja_icon_container_remove:
7949 * @container: A CajaIconContainer.
7950 * @data: Icon data.
7951 *
7952 * Remove the icon with this data.
7953 **/
7954gboolean
7955caja_icon_container_remove (CajaIconContainer *container,
7956 CajaIconData *data)
7957{
7958 CajaIcon *icon;
7959
7960 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_178
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_178 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_178 =
0; _g_boolean_var_178; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
7961 g_return_val_if_fail (data != NULL, FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_179
; if (data != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_179 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_179
= 0; _g_boolean_var_179; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "data != NULL"); return
((0)); } } while (0);
7962
7963 end_renaming_mode (container, FALSE(0));
7964
7965 icon = g_hash_table_lookup (container->details->icon_set, data);
7966
7967 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
7968 {
7969 return FALSE(0);
7970 }
7971
7972 g_signal_emit (container, signals[ICON_REMOVED], 0, icon);
7973
7974 icon_destroy (container, icon);
7975 schedule_redo_layout (container);
7976
7977 return TRUE(!(0));
7978}
7979
7980/**
7981 * caja_icon_container_request_update:

7990{

); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->

__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_180 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_180 =

8004
8005/* zooming */
8006
8007CajaZoomLevel
8008caja_icon_container_get_zoom_level (CajaIconContainer *container)
8009{
8010 return container->details->zoom_level;
8011}
8012
8013void
8014caja_icon_container_set_zoom_level (CajaIconContainer *container, int new_level)
8015{
8016 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
8017 int pinned_level;
8018 double pixels_per_unit;
8019 guint icon_size;
8020
8021 details = container->details;
8022
8023 end_renaming_mode (container, TRUE(!(0)));
8024
8025 pinned_level = new_level;
8026 if (pinned_level < CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_SMALLEST)
8027 {
8028 pinned_level = CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_SMALLEST;
8029 }
8030 else if (pinned_level > CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST)
8031 {
8032 pinned_level = CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST;
8033 }
8034
8035 if (pinned_level == details->zoom_level)
8036 {
8037 return;
8038 }
8039
8040 details->zoom_level = pinned_level;
8041
8042 icon_size = caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (pinned_level);
8043 pixels_per_unit = ((double) icon_size) / ((double) CAJA_ICON_SIZE_STANDARD48);
8044 eel_canvas_set_pixels_per_unit (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), pixels_per_unit);
8045
8046 invalidate_labels (container);
8047 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
8048}
8049
8050/**

8053 * information from the model.

8057void

__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_182 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_182 =
0; _g_boolean_var_182; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);

8101/**
8102 * caja_icon_container_get_selection:
8103 * @container: An icon container.
8104 *
8105 * Get a list of the icons currently selected in @container.
8106 *
8107 * Return value: A GList of the programmer-specified data associated to each
8108 * selected icon, or NULL if no icon is selected. The caller is expected to
8109 * free the list when it is not needed anymore.
8110 **/
8111GList *
8112caja_icon_container_get_selection (CajaIconContainer *container)
8113{
8114 GList *list, *p;
8115
8116 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_185
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_185 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_185 =
0; _g_boolean_var_185; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return (((void*)0)); } } while (0);
8117
8118 list = NULL((void*)0);
8119 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8120 {
8121 CajaIcon *icon;
8122
8123 icon = p->data;
8124 if (icon->is_selected)
8125 {
8126 list = g_list_prepend (list, icon->data);
8127 }
8128 }
8129
8130 return g_list_reverse (list);
8131}
8132
8133static GList *
8134caja_icon_container_get_selected_icons (CajaIconContainer *container)

(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_186 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_186 =

8142 {

8179
8180/* Returns an array of GdkPoints of locations of the icons. */
8181static GArray *
8182caja_icon_container_get_icon_locations (CajaIconContainer *container,
8183 GList *icons)
8184{
8185 GArray *result;
8186 GList *node;
8187 int index;
8188
8189 result = g_array_new (FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), sizeof (GdkPoint));
8190 result = g_array_set_size (result, g_list_length (icons));
8191
8192 for (index = 0, node = icons; node != NULL((void*)0); index++, node = node->next)
8193 {
8194 g_array_index (result, GdkPoint, index)(((GdkPoint*) (void *) (result)->data) [(index)]).x =
8195 ((CajaIcon *)node->data)->x;
8196 g_array_index (result, GdkPoint, index)(((GdkPoint*) (void *) (result)->data) [(index)]).y =
8197 ((CajaIcon *)node->data)->y;
8198 }
8199
8200 return result;
8201}

8203/**
8204 * caja_icon_container_get_selected_icon_locations:
8205 * @container: An icon container widget.
8206 *
8207 * Returns an array of GdkPoints of locations of the selected icons.
8208 **/
8209GArray *
8210caja_icon_container_get_selected_icon_locations (CajaIconContainer *container)
8211{
8212 GArray *result;
8213 GList *icons;
8214
8215 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_188
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_188 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_188 =
0; _g_boolean_var_188; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return (((void*)0)); } } while (0);
8216
8217 icons = caja_icon_container_get_selected_icons (container);
8218 result = caja_icon_container_get_icon_locations (container, icons);
8219 g_list_free (icons);
8220
8221 return result;
8222}

8224/**
8225 * caja_icon_container_select_all:
8226 * @container: An icon container widget.
8227 *
8228 * Select all the icons in @container at once.
8229 **/
8230void
8231caja_icon_container_select_all (CajaIconContainer *container)
8232{
8233 gboolean selection_changed;
8234 GList *p;
8235 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8236
8237 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_189
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_189 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_189 =
0; _g_boolean_var_189; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8238
8239 selection_changed = FALSE(0);
8240
8241 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8242 {
8243 icon = p->data;
8244
8245 selection_changed |= icon_set_selected (container, icon, TRUE(!(0)));
8246 }
8247
8248 if (selection_changed)
8249 {
8250 g_signal_emit (container,
8251 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
8252 }
8253}
8254
8255/**
8256 * caja_icon_container_set_selection:
8257 * @container: An icon container widget.
8258 * @selection: A list of CajaIconData *.
8259 *
8260 * Set the selection to exactly the icons in @container which have
8261 * programmer data matching one of the items in @selection.
8262 **/
8263void
8264caja_icon_container_set_selection (CajaIconContainer *container,
8265 GList *selection)
8266{
8267 gboolean selection_changed;
8268 GHashTable *hash;
8269 GList *p;
8270 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8271
8272 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_190
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_190 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_190 =
0; _g_boolean_var_190; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8273
8274 selection_changed = FALSE(0);
8275
8276 hash = g_hash_table_new (NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
8277 for (p = selection; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8278 {
8279 g_hash_table_insert (hash, p->data, p->data);
8280 }
8281 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8282 {
8283 icon = p->data;
8284
8285 selection_changed |= icon_set_selected
8286 (container, icon,
8287 g_hash_table_lookup (hash, icon->data) != NULL((void*)0));
8288 }
8289 g_hash_table_destroy (hash);
8290
8291 if (selection_changed)
8292 {
8293 g_signal_emit (container,
8294 signals[SELECTION_CHANGED], 0);
8295 }
8296}

8343 *
8344 * Deselect all the icons in @container.
8345 **/
8346void
