8355
8356/**
8357 * caja_icon_container_get_icon_by_uri:
8358 * @container: An icon container widget.
8359 * @uri: The uri of an icon to find.
8360 *
8361 * Locate an icon, given the URI. The URI must match exactly.
8362 * Later we may have to have some way of figuring out if the
8363 * URI specifies the same object that does not require an exact match.
8364 **/
8365CajaIcon *
8366caja_icon_container_get_icon_by_uri (CajaIconContainer *container,
8367 const char *uri)
8368{
8369 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
8370 GList *p;
8371
8372 /* Eventually, we must avoid searching the entire icon list,
8373 but it's OK for now.
8374 A hash table mapping uri to icon is one possibility.
8375 */
8376
8377 details = container->details;
8378
8379 for (p = details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8380 {
8381 CajaIcon *icon;
8382 char *icon_uri;
8383 gboolean is_match;
8384
8385 icon = p->data;
8386
8387 icon_uri = caja_icon_container_get_icon_uri
8388 (container, icon);
8389 is_match = strcmp (uri, icon_uri) == 0;
8390 g_free (icon_uri);
8391
8392 if (is_match)
8393 {
8394 return icon;
8395 }
8396 }
8397
8398 return NULL((void*)0);
8399}
8400
8401static CajaIcon *
8402get_nth_selected_icon (CajaIconContainer *container, int index)
8403{
8404 GList *p;
8405 int selection_count;
8406 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8407
8408 g_assert (index > 0)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_192
; if (index > 0) _g_boolean_var_192 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_192
= 0; _g_boolean_var_192; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 8408, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "index > 0"); } while (0);
8409
8410 /* Find the nth selected icon. */
8411 selection_count = 0;
8412 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8413 {
8414 icon = p->data;
8415 if (icon->is_selected)
8416 {
8417 if (++selection_count == index)
8418 {
8419 return icon;
8420 }
8421 }
8422 }
8423 return NULL((void*)0);
8424}
8425
8426static CajaIcon *
8427get_first_selected_icon (CajaIconContainer *container)
8428{
8429 return get_nth_selected_icon (container, 1);
8430}
8431
8432static gboolean
8433has_multiple_selection (CajaIconContainer *container)
8434{
8435 return get_nth_selected_icon (container, 2) != NULL((void*)0);
8436}
8437
8438static gboolean
8439all_selected (CajaIconContainer *container)
8440{
8441 GList *p;
8442 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8443
8444 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8445 {
8446 icon = p->data;
8447 if (!icon->is_selected)
8448 {
8449 return FALSE(0);
8450 }
8451 }
8452 return TRUE(!(0));
8453}
8454
8455static gboolean
8456has_selection (CajaIconContainer *container)
8457{
8458 return get_nth_selected_icon (container, 1) != NULL((void*)0);
8459}
8460
8461/**
8462 * caja_icon_container_show_stretch_handles:
8463 * @container: An icon container widget.
8464 *
8465 * Makes stretch handles visible on the first selected icon.
8466 **/
8467void
8468caja_icon_container_show_stretch_handles (CajaIconContainer *container)
8469{
8470 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
8471 CajaIcon *icon;
8472 guint initial_size;
8473
8474 icon = get_first_selected_icon (container);
8475 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
8476 {
8477 return;
8478 }
8479
8480 /* Check if it already has stretch handles. */
8481 details = container->details;
8482 if (details->stretch_icon == icon)
8483 {
8484 return;
8485 }
8486
8487 /* Get rid of the existing stretch handles and put them on the new icon. */
8488 if (details->stretch_icon != NULL((void*)0))
8489 {
8490 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_show_stretch_handles
8491 (details->stretch_icon->item, FALSE(0));
8492 ungrab_stretch_icon (container);
8493 emit_stretch_ended (container, details->stretch_icon);
8494 }
8495 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_show_stretch_handles (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
8496 details->stretch_icon = icon;
8497
8498 icon_get_size (container, icon, &initial_size);
8499
8500 /* only need to keep size in one dimension, since they are constrained to be the same */
8501 container->details->stretch_initial_x = icon->x;
8502 container->details->stretch_initial_y = icon->y;
8503 container->details->stretch_initial_size = initial_size;
8504
8505 emit_stretch_started (container, icon);
8506}
8507
8508/**
8509 * caja_icon_container_has_stretch_handles
8510 * @container: An icon container widget.
8511 *
8512 * Returns true if the first selected item has stretch handles.
8513 **/
8514gboolean
8515caja_icon_container_has_stretch_handles (CajaIconContainer *container)
8516{
8517 CajaIcon *icon;
8518
8519 icon = get_first_selected_icon (container);
8520 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
8521 {
8522 return FALSE(0);
8523 }
8524
8525 return icon == container->details->stretch_icon;
8526}
8527
8528/**
8529 * caja_icon_container_is_stretched
8530 * @container: An icon container widget.
8531 *
8532 * Returns true if the any selected item is stretched to a size other than 1.0.
8533 **/
8534gboolean
8535caja_icon_container_is_stretched (CajaIconContainer *container)
8536{
8537 GList *p;
8538 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8539
8540 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8541 {
8542 icon = p->data;
8543 if (icon->is_selected && icon->scale != 1.0)
8544 {
8545 return TRUE(!(0));
8546 }
8547 }
8548 return FALSE(0);
8549}
8550
8551/**
8552 * caja_icon_container_unstretch
8553 * @container: An icon container widget.
8554 *
8555 * Gets rid of any icon stretching.
8556 **/
8557void
8558caja_icon_container_unstretch (CajaIconContainer *container)
8559{
8560 GList *p;
8561 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
8562
8563 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8564 {
8565 icon = p->data;
8566 if (icon->is_selected)
8567 {
8568 caja_icon_container_move_icon (container, icon,
8569 icon->x, icon->y,
8570 1.0,
8571 FALSE(0), TRUE(!(0)), TRUE(!(0)));
8572 }
8573 }
8574}
8575
8576static void
8577compute_stretch (StretchState *start,
8578 StretchState *current)
8579{
8580 gboolean right, bottom;
8581 int x_stretch, y_stretch;
8582
8583 /* FIXME bugzilla.gnome.org 45390: This doesn't correspond to
8584 * the way the handles are drawn.
8585 */
8586 /* Figure out which handle we are dragging. */
8587 right = start->pointer_x > start->icon_x + (int) start->icon_size / 2;
8588 bottom = start->pointer_y > start->icon_y + (int) start->icon_size / 2;
8589
8590 /* Figure out how big we should stretch. */
8591 x_stretch = start->pointer_x - current->pointer_x;
8592 y_stretch = start->pointer_y - current->pointer_y;
8593 if (right)
8594 {
8595 x_stretch = - x_stretch;
8596 }
8597 if (bottom)
8598 {
8599 y_stretch = - y_stretch;
8600 }
8601 current->icon_size = MAX ((int) start->icon_size + MIN (x_stretch, y_stretch),((((int) start->icon_size + (((x_stretch) < (y_stretch)
) ? (x_stretch) : (y_stretch))) > ((int) 16)) ? ((int) start
->icon_size + (((x_stretch) < (y_stretch)) ? (x_stretch
) : (y_stretch))) : ((int) 16))
8602 (int) CAJA_ICON_SIZE_SMALLEST)((((int) start->icon_size + (((x_stretch) < (y_stretch)
) ? (x_stretch) : (y_stretch))) > ((int) 16)) ? ((int) start
->icon_size + (((x_stretch) < (y_stretch)) ? (x_stretch
) : (y_stretch))) : ((int) 16));
8603
8604 /* Figure out where the corner of the icon should be. */
8605 current->icon_x = start->icon_x;
8606 if (!right)
8607 {
8608 current->icon_x += start->icon_size - current->icon_size;
8609 }
8610 current->icon_y = start->icon_y;
8611 if (!bottom)
8612 {
8613 current->icon_y += start->icon_size - current->icon_size;
8614 }
8615}
8616
8617char *
8618caja_icon_container_get_icon_uri (CajaIconContainer *container,
8619 CajaIcon *icon)
8620{
8621 char *uri;
8622
8623 uri = NULL((void*)0);
8624 g_signal_emit (container,
8625 signals[GET_ICON_URI], 0,
8626 icon->data,
8627 &uri);
8628 return uri;
8629}
8630
8631char *
8632caja_icon_container_get_icon_drop_target_uri (CajaIconContainer *container,
8633 CajaIcon *icon)
8634{
8635 char *uri;
8636
8637 uri = NULL((void*)0);
8638 g_signal_emit (container,
8639 signals[GET_ICON_DROP_TARGET_URI], 0,
8640 icon->data,
8641 &uri);
8642 return uri;
8643}
8644
8645/* Call to reset the scroll region only if the container is not empty,
8646 * to avoid having the flag linger until the next file is added.
8647 */
8648static void
8649reset_scroll_region_if_not_empty (CajaIconContainer *container)
8650{
8651 if (!caja_icon_container_is_empty (container))
8652 {
8653 caja_icon_container_reset_scroll_region (container);
8654 }
8655}
8656
8657/* Switch from automatic layout to manual or vice versa.
8658 * If we switch to manual layout, we restore the icon positions from the
8659 * last manual layout.
8660 */
8661void
8662caja_icon_container_set_auto_layout (CajaIconContainer *container,
8663 gboolean auto_layout)
8664{
8665 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_193
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_193 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_193 =
0; _g_boolean_var_193; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8666 g_return_if_fail (auto_layout == FALSE || auto_layout == TRUE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_194
; if (auto_layout == (0) || auto_layout == (!(0))) _g_boolean_var_194
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_194 = 0; _g_boolean_var_194; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "auto_layout == FALSE || auto_layout == TRUE"
); return; } } while (0);
8667
8668 if (container->details->auto_layout == auto_layout)
8669 {
8670 return;
8671 }
8672
8673 reset_scroll_region_if_not_empty (container);
8674 container->details->auto_layout = auto_layout;
8675
8676 if (!auto_layout)
8677 {
8678 reload_icon_positions (container, TRUE(!(0)));
8679 caja_icon_container_freeze_icon_positions (container);
8680 }
8681
8682 redo_layout (container);
8683
8684 g_signal_emit (container, signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED], 0);
8685}
8686
8687/* Toggle the tighter layout boolean. */
8688void
8689caja_icon_container_set_tighter_layout (CajaIconContainer *container,
8690 gboolean tighter_layout)
8691{
8692 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_195
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_195 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_195 =
0; _g_boolean_var_195; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8693 g_return_if_fail (tighter_layout == FALSE || tighter_layout == TRUE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_196
; if (tighter_layout == (0) || tighter_layout == (!(0))) _g_boolean_var_196
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_196 = 0; _g_boolean_var_196; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "tighter_layout == FALSE || tighter_layout == TRUE"
); return; } } while (0);
8694
8695 if (container->details->tighter_layout == tighter_layout)
8696 {
8697 return;
8698 }
8699
8700 container->details->tighter_layout = tighter_layout;
8701
8702 if (container->details->auto_layout)
8703 {
8704 invalidate_label_sizes (container);
8705 redo_layout (container);
8706
8707 g_signal_emit (container, signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED], 0);
8708 }
8709 else
8710 {
8711 /* in manual layout, label sizes still change, even though
8712 * the icons don't move.
8713 */
8714 invalidate_label_sizes (container);
8715 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
8716 }
8717}
8718
8719gboolean
8720caja_icon_container_is_keep_aligned (CajaIconContainer *container)
8721{
8722 return container->details->keep_aligned;
8723}
8724
8725gboolean
8726caja_icon_container_is_lock_icons_position (CajaIconContainer *container)
8727{
8728 return container->details->lock_icons_position;
8729}
8730
8731static gboolean
8732align_icons_callback (gpointer callback_data)
8733{
8734 CajaIconContainer *container;
8735
8736 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (callback_data)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((callback_data)))));
8737 align_icons (container);
8738 container->details->align_idle_id = 0;
8739
8740 return FALSE(0);
8741}
8742
8743static void
8744unschedule_align_icons (CajaIconContainer *container)
8745{
8746 if (container->details->align_idle_id != 0)
8747 {
8748 g_source_remove (container->details->align_idle_id);
8749 container->details->align_idle_id = 0;
8750 }
8751}
8752
8753static void
8754schedule_align_icons (CajaIconContainer *container)
8755{
8756 if (container->details->align_idle_id == 0
8757 && container->details->has_been_allocated)
8758 {
8759 container->details->align_idle_id = g_idle_add
8760 (align_icons_callback, container);
8761 }
8762}
8763
8764void
8765caja_icon_container_set_keep_aligned (CajaIconContainer *container,
8766 gboolean keep_aligned)
8767{
8768 if (container->details->keep_aligned != keep_aligned)
8769 {
8770 container->details->keep_aligned = keep_aligned;
8771
8772 if (keep_aligned && !container->details->auto_layout)
8773 {
8774 schedule_align_icons (container);
8775 }
8776 else
8777 {
8778 unschedule_align_icons (container);
8779 }
8780 }
8781}
8782
8783void
8784caja_icon_container_set_lock_icons_position (CajaIconContainer *container,
8785 gboolean lock_icons_position)
8786{
8787 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_197
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_197 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_197 =
0; _g_boolean_var_197; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8788
8789 container->details->lock_icons_position = lock_icons_position;
8790}
8791
8792void
8793caja_icon_container_set_layout_mode (CajaIconContainer *container,
8794 CajaIconLayoutMode mode)
8795{
8796 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_198
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_198 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_198 =
0; _g_boolean_var_198; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8797
8798 container->details->layout_mode = mode;
8799 invalidate_labels (container);
8800
8801 redo_layout (container);
8802
8803 g_signal_emit (container, signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED], 0);
8804}
8805
8806void
8807caja_icon_container_set_label_position (CajaIconContainer *container,
8808 CajaIconLabelPosition position)
8809{
8810 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_199
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_199 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_199 =
0; _g_boolean_var_199; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
8811
8812 if (container->details->label_position != position)
8813 {
8814 container->details->label_position = position;
8815
8816 invalidate_labels (container);
8817 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
8818
8819 schedule_redo_layout (container);
8820 }
8821}
8822
8823/* Switch from automatic to manual layout, freezing all the icons in their
8824 * current positions instead of restoring icon positions from the last manual
8825 * layout as set_auto_layout does.
8826 */
8827void
8828caja_icon_container_freeze_icon_positions (CajaIconContainer *container)
8829{
8830 gboolean changed;
8831 GList *p;
8832 CajaIcon *icon;
8833 CajaIconPosition position;
8834
8835 changed = container->details->auto_layout;
8836 container->details->auto_layout = FALSE(0);
8837
8838 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
8839 {
8840 icon = p->data;
8841
8842 position.x = icon->saved_ltr_x;
8843 position.y = icon->y;
8844 position.scale = icon->scale;
8845 g_signal_emit (container, signals[ICON_POSITION_CHANGED], 0,
8846 icon->data, &position);
8847 }
8848
8849 if (changed)
8850 {
8851 g_signal_emit (container, signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED], 0);
8852 }
8853}
8854
8855/* Re-sort, switching to automatic layout if it was in manual layout. */
8856void
8857caja_icon_container_sort (CajaIconContainer *container)
8858{
8859 gboolean changed;
8860
8861 changed = !container->details->auto_layout;
8862 container->details->auto_layout = TRUE(!(0));
8863
8864 reset_scroll_region_if_not_empty (container);
8865 redo_layout (container);
8866
8867 if (changed)
8868 {
8869 g_signal_emit (container, signals[LAYOUT_CHANGED], 0);
8870 }
8871}
8872
8873gboolean
8874caja_icon_container_is_auto_layout (CajaIconContainer *container)
8875{
8876 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_200
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_200 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_200 =
0; _g_boolean_var_200; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
8877
8878 return container->details->auto_layout;
8879}
8880
8881gboolean
8882caja_icon_container_is_tighter_layout (CajaIconContainer *container)
8883{
8884 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_201
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->

(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_201 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_201 =
0; _g_boolean_var_201; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
8885
8886 return container->details->tighter_layout;
8887}
8888
8889static void
8890pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback (CajaIconCanvasItem *item, CajaIconContainer *container)
8891{
8892 g_assert (container->details->pending_icon_to_rename != NULL)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_202
; if (container->details->pending_icon_to_rename != ((void
*)0)) _g_boolean_var_202 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_202 = 0; _g_boolean_var_202
; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 8892, ((const char*) (__func__)), "container->details->pending_icon_to_rename != NULL"
); } while (0);
8893 g_assert (container->details->pending_icon_to_rename->item == item)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_203
; if (container->details->pending_icon_to_rename->item
== item) _g_boolean_var_203 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_203 = 0
; _g_boolean_var_203; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 8893, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "container->details->pending_icon_to_rename->item == item"
); } while (0);
8894 container->details->pending_icon_to_rename = NULL((void*)0);
8895}
8896
8897static CajaIcon*
8898get_pending_icon_to_rename (CajaIconContainer *container)
8899{
8900 return container->details->pending_icon_to_rename;
8901}
8902
8903static void
8904set_pending_icon_to_rename (CajaIconContainer *container, CajaIcon *icon)
8905{
8906 CajaIcon *old_icon;
8907
8908 old_icon = container->details->pending_icon_to_rename;
8909
8910 if (icon == old_icon)
8911 {
8912 return;
8913 }
8914
8915 if (old_icon != NULL((void*)0))
8916 {
8917 g_signal_handlers_disconnect_by_funcg_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
8918 (old_icon->item,g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
8919 G_CALLBACK (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback),g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback)))
, (container))
8920 container)g_signal_handlers_disconnect_matched ((old_icon->item), (GSignalMatchType
) (G_SIGNAL_MATCH_FUNC | G_SIGNAL_MATCH_DATA), 0, 0, ((void*)
0), (((GCallback) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback)))
, (container));
8921 }
8922
8923 if (icon != NULL((void*)0))
8924 {
8925 g_signal_connect (icon->item, "destroy",g_signal_connect_data ((icon->item), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback))), (container), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0)
8926 G_CALLBACK (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback), container)g_signal_connect_data ((icon->item), ("destroy"), (((GCallback
) (pending_icon_to_rename_destroy_callback))), (container), (
(void*)0), (GConnectFlags) 0);
8927 }
8928
8929 container->details->pending_icon_to_rename = icon;
8930}
8931
8932static void
8933process_pending_icon_to_rename (CajaIconContainer *container)
8934{
8935 CajaIcon *pending_icon_to_rename;
8936
8937 pending_icon_to_rename = get_pending_icon_to_rename (container);
8938
8939 if (pending_icon_to_rename != NULL((void*)0))
8940 {
8941 if (pending_icon_to_rename->is_selected && !has_multiple_selection (container))
8942 {
8943 caja_icon_container_start_renaming_selected_item (container, FALSE(0));
8944 }
8945 else
8946 {
8947 set_pending_icon_to_rename (container, NULL((void*)0));
8948 }
8949 }
8950}
8951
8952static gboolean
8953is_renaming_pending (CajaIconContainer *container)
8954{
8955 return get_pending_icon_to_rename (container) != NULL((void*)0);
8956}
8957
8958static gboolean
8959is_renaming (CajaIconContainer *container)
8960{
8961 return container->details->renaming;
8962}
8963
8964/**
8965 * caja_icon_container_start_renaming_selected_item
8966 * @container: An icon container widget.
8967 * @select_all: Whether the whole file should initially be selected, or
8968 * only its basename (i.e. everything except its extension).
8969 *
8970 * Displays the edit name widget on the first selected icon
8971 **/
8972void
8973caja_icon_container_start_renaming_selected_item (CajaIconContainer *container,
8974 gboolean select_all)
8975{
8976 CajaIconContainerDetails *details;
8977 CajaIcon *icon;
8978 EelDRect icon_rect;
8979 EelDRect text_rect;
8980 PangoFontDescription *desc;
8981 const char *editable_text;
8982 int x, y, width;
8983 int start_offset, end_offset;
8984
8985 /* Check if it already in renaming mode, if so - select all */
8986 details = container->details;
8987 if (details->renaming)
8988 {
8989 eel_editable_label_select_region (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))),
8990 0,
8991 -1);
8992 return;
8993 }
8994
8995 /* Find selected icon */
8996 icon = get_first_selected_icon (container);
8997 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
8998 {
8999 return;
9000 }
9001
9002 g_assert (!has_multiple_selection (container))do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_204
; if (!has_multiple_selection (container)) _g_boolean_var_204
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_204 = 0; _g_boolean_var_204; }), 1)
) ; else g_assertion_message_expr (((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c"
, 9002, ((const char*) (__func__)), "!has_multiple_selection (container)"
); } while (0);
9003
9004 if (!icon_is_positioned (icon))
9005 {
9006 set_pending_icon_to_rename (container, icon);
9007 return;
9008 }
9009
9010 set_pending_icon_to_rename (container, NULL((void*)0));
9011
9012 /* Make a copy of the original editable text for a later compare */
9013 editable_text = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_editable_text (icon->item);
9014
9015 /* This could conceivably be NULL if a rename was triggered really early. */
9016 if (editable_text == NULL((void*)0))
9017 {
9018 return;
9019 }
9020
9021 details->original_text = g_strdup (editable_text)g_strdup_inline (editable_text);
9022
9023 /* Freeze updates so files added while renaming don't cause rename to loose focus, bug #318373 */
9024 caja_icon_container_freeze_updates (container);
9025
9026 /* Create text renaming widget, if it hasn't been created already.
9027 * We deal with the broken icon text item widget by keeping it around
9028 * so its contents can still be cut and pasted as part of the clipboard
9029 */
9030 if (details->rename_widget == NULL((void*)0))
9031 {
9032 details->rename_widget = eel_editable_label_new ("Test text");
9033 eel_editable_label_set_line_wrap (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))), TRUE(!(0)));
9034 eel_editable_label_set_line_wrap_mode (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))), PANGO_WRAP_WORD_CHAR);
9035 eel_editable_label_set_draw_outline (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))), TRUE(!(0)));
9036
9037 if (details->label_position != CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
9038 {
9039 eel_editable_label_set_justify (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))), GTK_JUSTIFY_CENTER);
9040 }
9041
9042 gtk_widget_set_margin_start (details->rename_widget, 1);
9043 gtk_widget_set_margin_end (details->rename_widget, 1);
9044 gtk_widget_set_margin_top (details->rename_widget, 1);
9045 gtk_widget_set_margin_bottom (details->rename_widget, 1);
9046 gtk_layout_put (GTK_LAYOUT (container)((((GtkLayout*) (void *) ((container))))),
9047 details->rename_widget, 0, 0);
9048 }
9049
9050 /* Set the right font */
9051 if (details->font)
9052 {
9053 desc = pango_font_description_from_string (details->font);
9054 }
9055 else
9056 {
9057 PangoContext *context;
9058
9059 context = gtk_widget_get_pango_context (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
9060 desc = pango_font_description_copy (pango_context_get_font_description (context));
9061 pango_font_description_set_size (desc,
9062 pango_font_description_get_size (desc) +
9063 container->details->font_size_table [container->details->zoom_level]);
9064 }
9065 eel_editable_label_set_font_description (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))),
9066 desc);
9067 pango_font_description_free (desc);
9068
9069 icon_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_icon_rectangle (icon->item);
9070 text_rect = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_text_rectangle (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
9071
9072 if (caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (container) &&
9073 container->details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
9074 {
9075 /* for one-line editables, the width changes dynamically */
9076 width = -1;
9077 }
9078 else
9079 {
9080 width = caja_icon_canvas_item_get_max_text_width (icon->item);
9081 }
9082
9083 if (details->label_position == CAJA_ICON_LABEL_POSITION_BESIDE)
9084 {
9085 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))))->canvas,
9086 text_rect.x0,
9087 text_rect.y0,
9088 &x, &y);
9089 }
9090 else
9091 {
9092 eel_canvas_w2c (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item)))))->canvas,
9093 (icon_rect.x0 + icon_rect.x1) / 2,
9094 icon_rect.y1,
9095 &x, &y);
9096 x = x - width / 2 - 1;
9097 }
9098
9099 gtk_layout_move (GTK_LAYOUT (container)((((GtkLayout*) (void *) ((container))))),
9100 details->rename_widget,
9101 x, y);
9102
9103 gtk_widget_set_size_request (details->rename_widget,
9104 width, -1);
9105 eel_editable_label_set_text (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))),
9106 editable_text);
9107 if (select_all)
9108 {
9109 start_offset = 0;
9110 end_offset = -1;
9111 }
9112 else
9113 {
9114 eel_filename_get_rename_region (editable_text, &start_offset, &end_offset);
9115 }
9116 gtk_widget_show (details->rename_widget);
9117 gtk_widget_grab_focus (details->rename_widget);
9118
9119 eel_editable_label_select_region (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))
))),
9120 start_offset,
9121 end_offset);
9122 g_signal_emit (container,
9123 signals[RENAMING_ICON], 0,
9124 GTK_EDITABLE (details->rename_widget)((((GtkEditable*) (void *) ((details->rename_widget))))));
9125
9126 caja_icon_container_update_icon (container, icon);
9127
9128 /* We are in renaming mode */
9129 details->renaming = TRUE(!(0));
9130 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_renaming (icon->item, TRUE(!(0)));
9131}
9132
9133static void
9134end_renaming_mode (CajaIconContainer *container, gboolean commit)
9135{
9136 CajaIcon *icon;
9137
9138 set_pending_icon_to_rename (container, NULL((void*)0));
9139
9140 icon = get_icon_being_renamed (container);
9141 if (icon == NULL((void*)0))
9142 {
9143 return;
9144 }
9145
9146 /* We are not in renaming mode */
9147 container->details->renaming = FALSE(0);
9148 caja_icon_canvas_item_set_renaming (icon->item, FALSE(0));
9149
9150 caja_icon_container_unfreeze_updates (container);
9151
9152 if (commit)
9153 {
9154 set_pending_icon_to_reveal (container, icon);
9155 }
9156
9157 gtk_widget_grab_focus (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
9158
9159 if (commit)
9160 {
9161 const char *changed_text;
9162
9163 /* Verify that text has been modified before signalling change. */
9164 changed_text = eel_editable_label_get_text (EEL_EDITABLE_LABEL (container->details->rename_widget)((((EelEditableLabel*) (void *) ((container->details->rename_widget
))))));
9165 if (strcmp (container->details->original_text, changed_text) != 0)
9166 {
9167 AtkObject *accessible_icon;
9168
9169 g_signal_emit (container,
9170 signals[ICON_TEXT_CHANGED], 0,
9171 icon->data,
9172 changed_text);
9173
9174 accessible_icon = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object (G_OBJECT(icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
9175 g_object_notify (G_OBJECT(accessible_icon)((((GObject*) (void *) ((accessible_icon))))), "accessible-name");
9176 }
9177 }
9178
9179 gtk_widget_hide (container->details->rename_widget);
9180
9181 g_free (container->details->original_text);
9182
9183}
9184
9185/* emit preview signal, called by the canvas item */
9186gboolean
9187caja_icon_container_emit_preview_signal (CajaIconContainer *icon_container,
9188 CajaIcon *icon,
9189 gboolean start_flag)
9190{
9191 gboolean result;
9192
9193 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (icon_container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_205
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((icon_container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type
()); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_205 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_205 =
0; _g_boolean_var_205; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (icon_container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
9194 g_return_val_if_fail (icon != NULL, FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_206
; if (icon != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_206 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_206
= 0; _g_boolean_var_206; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "icon != NULL"); return
((0)); } } while (0);
9195 g_return_val_if_fail (start_flag == FALSE || start_flag == TRUE, FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_207
; if (start_flag == (0) || start_flag == (!(0))) _g_boolean_var_207
= 1; else _g_boolean_var_207 = 0; _g_boolean_var_207; }), 1)
)) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const
char*) (__func__)), "start_flag == FALSE || start_flag == TRUE"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
9196
9197 result = FALSE(0);
9198 g_signal_emit (icon_container,
9199 signals[PREVIEW], 0,
9200 icon->data,
9201 start_flag,
9202 &result);
9203
9204 return result;
9205}
9206
9207gboolean
9208caja_icon_container_has_stored_icon_positions (CajaIconContainer *container)
9209{
9210 GList *p;
9211 gboolean have_stored_position;
9212 CajaIconPosition position;
9213 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
9214
9215 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
9216 {
9217 icon = p->data;
9218
9219 have_stored_position = FALSE(0);
9220 g_signal_emit (container,
9221 signals[GET_STORED_ICON_POSITION], 0,
9222 icon->data,
9223 &position,
9224 &have_stored_position);
9225 if (have_stored_position)
9226 {
9227 return TRUE(!(0));
9228 }
9229 }
9230 return FALSE(0);
9231}
9232
9233void
9234caja_icon_container_set_single_click_mode (CajaIconContainer *container,
9235 gboolean single_click_mode)
9236{
9237 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_208
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_208 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_208 =
0; _g_boolean_var_208; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9238
9239 container->details->single_click_mode = single_click_mode;
9240}
9241
9242/* Return if the icon container is a fixed size */
9243gboolean
9244caja_icon_container_get_is_fixed_size (CajaIconContainer *container)
9245{

; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_209 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_209 =
0; _g_boolean_var_209; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
9247
9248 return container->details->is_fixed_size;
9249}

__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_210 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_210 =

9259}
9260
9261gboolean
9262caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (CajaIconContainer *container)
9263{
9264 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_211
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_211 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_211 =
0; _g_boolean_var_211; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
9265

9267}
9268
9269void
9270caja_icon_container_set_is_desktop (CajaIconContainer *container,
9271 gboolean is_desktop)
9272{
9273 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_212
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_212 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_212 =
0; _g_boolean_var_212; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9274
9275 container->details->is_desktop = is_desktop;
9276
9277 if (is_desktop) {
9278 GtkStyleContext *context;
9279
9280 context = gtk_widget_get_style_context (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
9281 gtk_style_context_add_class (context, "caja-desktop");
9282 }
9283}
9284
9285void
9286caja_icon_container_set_margins (CajaIconContainer *container,
9287 int left_margin,
9288 int right_margin,
9289 int top_margin,
9290 int bottom_margin)
9291{
9292 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_213
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_213 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_213 =
0; _g_boolean_var_213; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9293
9294 container->details->left_margin = left_margin;
9295 container->details->right_margin = right_margin;
9296 container->details->top_margin = top_margin;
9297 container->details->bottom_margin = bottom_margin;
9298
9299 /* redo layout of icons as the margins have changed */
9300 schedule_redo_layout (container);
9301}
9302
9303void
9304caja_icon_container_set_use_drop_shadows (CajaIconContainer *container,
9305 gboolean use_drop_shadows)
9306{
9307 if (container->details->drop_shadows_requested == use_drop_shadows)
9308 {
9309 return;
9310 }
9311
9312 container->details->drop_shadows_requested = use_drop_shadows;
9313 container->details->use_drop_shadows = use_drop_shadows;
9314
9315 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
9316}
9317
9318/* handle theme changes */
9319
9320void
9321caja_icon_container_set_font (CajaIconContainer *container,
9322 const char *font)
9323{
9324 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_214
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_214 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_214 =
0; _g_boolean_var_214; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9325
9326 if (g_strcmp0 (container->details->font, font) == 0)
9327 {
9328 return;
9329 }
9330
9331 g_free (container->details->font);
9332 container->details->font = g_strdup (font)g_strdup_inline (font);
9333
9334 invalidate_labels (container);
9335 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
9336 gtk_widget_queue_draw (GTK_WIDGET (container)((((GtkWidget*) (void *) ((container))))));
9337}
9338
9339void
9340caja_icon_container_set_font_size_table (CajaIconContainer *container,
9341 const int font_size_table[CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST + 1])
9342{
9343 int old_font_size;
9344 int i;
9345
9346 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_215
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_215 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_215 =
0; _g_boolean_var_215; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9347 g_return_if_fail (font_size_table != NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_216
; if (font_size_table != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_216 = 1; else
_g_boolean_var_216 = 0; _g_boolean_var_216; }), 1))) { } else
{ g_return_if_fail_warning (((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__
)), "font_size_table != NULL"); return; } } while (0);
9348
9349 old_font_size = container->details->font_size_table[container->details->zoom_level];
9350
9351 for (i = 0; i <= CAJA_ZOOM_LEVEL_LARGEST; i++)
9352 {
9353 if (container->details->font_size_table[i] != font_size_table[i])
9354 {
9355 container->details->font_size_table[i] = font_size_table[i];
9356 }
9357 }
9358
9359 if (old_font_size != container->details->font_size_table[container->details->zoom_level])
9360 {
9361 invalidate_labels (container);
9362 caja_icon_container_request_update_all (container);
9363 }
9364}
9365
9366/**
9367 * caja_icon_container_get_icon_description
9368 * @container: An icon container widget.
9369 * @data: Icon data
9370 *
9371 * Gets the description for the icon. This function may return NULL.
9372 **/
9373char*
9374caja_icon_container_get_icon_description (CajaIconContainer *container,
9375 CajaIconData *data)
9376{
9377 CajaIconContainerClass *klass;
9378
9379 klass = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER_GET_CLASS (container)((((CajaIconContainerClass*) (((GTypeInstance*) ((container))
)->g_class))));
9380
9381 if (klass->get_icon_description)
9382 {
9383 return klass->get_icon_description (container, data);
9384 }
9385 else
9386 {
9387 return NULL((void*)0);
9388 }
9389}

9438/**
9439 * caja_icon_container_set_highlighted_for_clipboard
9440 * @container: An icon container widget.
9441 * @data: Icon Data associated with all icons that should be highlighted.
9442 * Others will be unhighlighted.
9443 **/
9444void
9445caja_icon_container_set_highlighted_for_clipboard (CajaIconContainer *container,
9446 GList *clipboard_icon_data)
9447{
9448 GList *l;
9449 gboolean highlighted_for_clipboard;
9450 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
9451
9452 g_return_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container))do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_221
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_221 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_221 =
0; _g_boolean_var_221; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return; } } while (0);
9453
9454 for (l = container->details->icons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next)
9455 {
9456 icon = l->data;
9457 highlighted_for_clipboard = (g_list_find (clipboard_icon_data, icon->data) != NULL((void*)0));
9458
9459 eel_canvas_item_set (EEL_CANVAS_ITEM (icon->item)((((EelCanvasItem*) (void *) ((icon->item))))),
9460 "highlighted-for-clipboard", highlighted_for_clipboard,
9461 NULL((void*)0));
9462 }

9478
9479/* AtkAction interface */
9480
9481static gboolean
9482caja_icon_container_accessible_do_action (AtkAction *accessible, int i)
9483{
9484 GtkWidget *widget;
9485 CajaIconContainer *container;
9486 GList *selection;
9487
9488 g_return_val_if_fail (i < LAST_ACTION, FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_222
; if (i < LAST_ACTION) _g_boolean_var_222 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_222
= 0; _g_boolean_var_222; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "i < LAST_ACTION"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
9489
9490 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9491 if (!widget)
9492 {
9493 return FALSE(0);
9494 }
9495
9496 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9497 switch (i)
9498 {
9499 case ACTION_ACTIVATE :
9500 selection = caja_icon_container_get_selection (container);
9501
9502 if (selection)
9503 {
9504 g_signal_emit_by_name (container, "activate", selection);
9505 g_list_free (selection);
9506 }
9507 break;
9508 case ACTION_MENU :
9509 handle_popups (container, NULL((void*)0),"context_click_background");
9510 break;
9511 default :
9512 g_warning ("Invalid action passed to CajaIconContainerAccessible::do_action");
9513 return FALSE(0);
9514 }
9515 return TRUE(!(0));
9516}
9517
9518static int
9519caja_icon_container_accessible_get_n_actions (AtkAction *accessible)
9520{
9521 return LAST_ACTION;
9522}
9523
9524static const char *
9525caja_icon_container_accessible_action_get_description (AtkAction *accessible,
9526 int i)
9527{
9528 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9529
9530 g_assert (i < LAST_ACTION)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_223
; if (i < LAST_ACTION) _g_boolean_var_223 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_223
= 0; _g_boolean_var_223; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 9530, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "i < LAST_ACTION"); } while (0);
9531
9532 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9533
9534 if (priv->action_descriptions[i])
9535 {
9536 return priv->action_descriptions[i];
9537 }
9538 else
9539 {
9540 return caja_icon_container_accessible_action_descriptions[i];
9541 }
9542}
9543

9545caja_icon_container_accessible_action_get_name (AtkAction *accessible, int i)
9546{
9547 g_assert (i < LAST_ACTION)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_224
; if (i < LAST_ACTION) _g_boolean_var_224 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_224
= 0; _g_boolean_var_224; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 9547, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "i < LAST_ACTION"); } while (0);
9548
9549 return caja_icon_container_accessible_action_names[i];
9550}

; if (i < LAST_ACTION) _g_boolean_var_225 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_225
= 0; _g_boolean_var_225; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr

9560
9561static gboolean
9562caja_icon_container_accessible_action_set_description (AtkAction *accessible,
9563 int i,
9564 const char *description)
9565{
9566 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9567
9568 g_assert (i < LAST_ACTION)do { if (__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_226
; if (i < LAST_ACTION) _g_boolean_var_226 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_226
= 0; _g_boolean_var_226; }), 1)) ; else g_assertion_message_expr
(((gchar*) 0), "caja-icon-container.c", 9568, ((const char*)
(__func__)), "i < LAST_ACTION"); } while (0);
9569
9570 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9571
9572 if (priv->action_descriptions[i])
9573 {
9574 g_free (priv->action_descriptions[i]);
9575 }
9576 priv->action_descriptions[i] = g_strdup (description)g_strdup_inline (description);
9577
9578 return FALSE(0);
9579}
9580
9581static void
9582caja_icon_container_accessible_action_interface_init (AtkActionIface *iface)
9583{
9584 iface->do_action = caja_icon_container_accessible_do_action;
9585 iface->get_n_actions = caja_icon_container_accessible_get_n_actions;
9586 iface->get_description = caja_icon_container_accessible_action_get_description;
9587 iface->get_name = caja_icon_container_accessible_action_get_name;
9588 iface->get_keybinding = caja_icon_container_accessible_action_get_keybinding;
9589 iface->set_description = caja_icon_container_accessible_action_set_description;
9590}
9591
9592/* AtkSelection interface */
9593
9594static void
9595caja_icon_container_accessible_update_selection (AtkObject *accessible)
9596{
9597 CajaIconContainer *container;
9598 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9599 GList *l;
9600 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
9601
9602 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)))((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((gtk_accessible_get_widget (
((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible)))))))))));
9603
9604 priv = accessible_get_priv (accessible);
9605
9606 if (priv->selection)
9607 {
9608 g_list_free (priv->selection);
9609 priv->selection = NULL((void*)0);
9610 }
9611
9612 for (l = container->details->icons; l != NULL((void*)0); l = l->next)
9613 {
9614 icon = l->data;
9615 if (icon->is_selected)
9616 {
9617 priv->selection = g_list_prepend (priv->selection,
9618 icon);
9619 }
9620 }
9621
9622 priv->selection = g_list_reverse (priv->selection);
9623}
9624
9625static void
9626caja_icon_container_accessible_selection_changed_cb (CajaIconContainer *container,
9627 gpointer data)
9628{
9629 g_signal_emit_by_name (data, "selection_changed");
9630}
9631
9632static void
9633caja_icon_container_accessible_icon_added_cb (CajaIconContainer *container,
9634 CajaIconData *icon_data,
9635 gpointer data)
9636{
9637 CajaIcon *icon;
9638
9639 // We don't want to emit children_changed signals during any type of load.
9640 if (container->details->is_loading || container->details->is_populating_container)
9641 return;
9642
9643 icon = g_hash_table_lookup (container->details->icon_set, icon_data);
9644 if (icon)
9645 {
9646 AtkObject *atk_parent;
9647 AtkObject *atk_child;
9648 int index;
9649
9650 atk_parent = ATK_OBJECT (data)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((data)))));
9651 atk_child = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object
9652 (G_OBJECT (icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
9653 index = g_list_index (container->details->icons, icon);
9654
9655 g_signal_emit_by_name (atk_parent, "children_changed::add",
9656 index, atk_child, NULL((void*)0));
9657 }
9658}
9659
9660static void
9661caja_icon_container_accessible_icon_removed_cb (CajaIconContainer *container,
9662 CajaIconData *icon_data,
9663 gpointer data)
9664{
9665 CajaIcon *icon;
9666
9667 icon = g_hash_table_lookup (container->details->icon_set, icon_data);
9668 if (icon)
9669 {
9670 AtkObject *atk_parent;
9671 AtkObject *atk_child;
9672 int index;
9673
9674 atk_parent = ATK_OBJECT (data)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((data)))));
9675 atk_child = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object
9676 (G_OBJECT (icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
9677 index = g_list_index (container->details->icons, icon);
9678
9679 g_signal_emit_by_name (atk_parent, "children_changed::remove",
9680 index, atk_child, NULL((void*)0));
9681 }
9682}
9683
9684static void
9685caja_icon_container_accessible_cleared_cb (CajaIconContainer *container,
9686 gpointer data)
9687{
9688 g_signal_emit_by_name (data, "children_changed", 0, NULL((void*)0), NULL((void*)0));
9689}
9690
9691static gboolean
9692caja_icon_container_accessible_add_selection (AtkSelection *accessible,
9693 int i)
9694{
9695 GtkWidget *widget;
9696 CajaIconContainer *container;
9697 CajaIcon *icon;
9698
9699 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9700 if (!widget)
9701 {
9702 return FALSE(0);
9703 }
9704
9705 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9706
9707 icon = g_list_nth_data (container->details->icons, i);
9708 if (icon)
9709 {
9710 GList *selection;
9711
9712 selection = caja_icon_container_get_selection (container);
9713 selection = g_list_prepend (selection,
9714 icon->data);
9715 caja_icon_container_set_selection (container, selection);
9716
9717 g_list_free (selection);
9718 return TRUE(!(0));
9719 }
9720
9721 return FALSE(0);
9722}
9723
9724static gboolean
9725caja_icon_container_accessible_clear_selection (AtkSelection *accessible)
9726{
9727 GtkWidget *widget;
9728 CajaIconContainer *container;
9729
9730 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9731 if (!widget)
9732 {
9733 return FALSE(0);
9734 }
9735
9736 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9737
9738 caja_icon_container_unselect_all (container);
9739
9740 return TRUE(!(0));
9741}
9742
9743static AtkObject *
9744caja_icon_container_accessible_ref_selection (AtkSelection *accessible,
9745 int i)
9746{
9747 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9748 CajaIcon *icon;
9749
9750 caja_icon_container_accessible_update_selection (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9751 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9752
9753 icon = g_list_nth_data (priv->selection, i);
9754 if (icon)
9755 {
9756 AtkObject *atk_object;
9757
9758 atk_object = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object (G_OBJECT (icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
9759 if (atk_object)
9760 {
9761 g_object_ref (atk_object)((__typeof__ (atk_object)) (g_object_ref) (atk_object));
9762 }
9763
9764 return atk_object;
9765 }
9766 else
9767 {
9768 return NULL((void*)0);
9769 }
9770}
9771
9772static int
9773caja_icon_container_accessible_get_selection_count (AtkSelection *accessible)
9774{
9775 int count;
9776 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9777
9778 caja_icon_container_accessible_update_selection (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9779 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9780
9781 count = g_list_length (priv->selection);
9782
9783 return count;
9784}
9785
9786static gboolean
9787caja_icon_container_accessible_is_child_selected (AtkSelection *accessible,
9788 int i)
9789{
9790 CajaIconContainer *container;
9791 CajaIcon *icon;
9792 GtkWidget *widget;
9793
9794 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9795 if (!widget)
9796 {
9797 return FALSE(0);
9798 }
9799
9800 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9801
9802 icon = g_list_nth_data (container->details->icons, i);
9803 return icon ? icon->is_selected : FALSE(0);
9804}
9805
9806static gboolean
9807caja_icon_container_accessible_remove_selection (AtkSelection *accessible,
9808 int i)
9809{
9810 CajaIconContainer *container;
9811 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9812 CajaIcon *icon;
9813 GtkWidget *widget;
9814
9815 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9816 if (!widget)
9817 {
9818 return FALSE(0);
9819 }
9820
9821 caja_icon_container_accessible_update_selection (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9822 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (accessible)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9823
9824 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9825
9826 icon = g_list_nth_data (priv->selection, i);
9827 if (icon)
9828 {
9829 GList *selection;
9830
9831 selection = caja_icon_container_get_selection (container);
9832 selection = g_list_remove (selection, icon->data);
9833 caja_icon_container_set_selection (container, selection);
9834
9835 g_list_free (selection);
9836 return TRUE(!(0));
9837 }
9838
9839 return FALSE(0);
9840}
9841

9843caja_icon_container_accessible_select_all_selection (AtkSelection *accessible)
9844{
9845 CajaIconContainer *container;
9846 GtkWidget *widget;
9847
9848 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9849 if (!widget)
9850 {
9851 return FALSE(0);
9852 }

9854 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9855
9856 caja_icon_container_select_all (container);
9857
9858 return TRUE(!(0));
9859}
9860
9861void
9862caja_icon_container_widget_to_file_operation_position (CajaIconContainer *container,
9863 GdkPoint *position)
9864{
9865 double x, y;
9866
9867 g_return_if_fail (position != NULL)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_227
; if (position != ((void*)0)) _g_boolean_var_227 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_227
= 0; _g_boolean_var_227; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "position != NULL"
); return; } } while (0);
9868
9869 x = position->x;
9870 y = position->y;
9871
9872 eel_canvas_window_to_world (EEL_CANVAS (container)((((EelCanvas*) (void *) ((container))))), x, y, &x, &y);
9873
9874 position->x = (int) x;
9875 position->y = (int) y;
9876
9877 /* ensure that we end up in the middle of the icon */
9878 position->x -= caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (container->details->zoom_level) / 2;
9879 position->y -= caja_get_icon_size_for_zoom_level (container->details->zoom_level) / 2;
9880}
9881
9882static void
9883caja_icon_container_accessible_selection_interface_init (AtkSelectionIface *iface)
9884{
9885 iface->add_selection = caja_icon_container_accessible_add_selection;
9886 iface->clear_selection = caja_icon_container_accessible_clear_selection;
9887 iface->ref_selection = caja_icon_container_accessible_ref_selection;
9888 iface->get_selection_count = caja_icon_container_accessible_get_selection_count;
9889 iface->is_child_selected = caja_icon_container_accessible_is_child_selected;
9890 iface->remove_selection = caja_icon_container_accessible_remove_selection;
9891 iface->select_all_selection = caja_icon_container_accessible_select_all_selection;
9892}
9893
9894static gint
9895caja_icon_container_accessible_get_n_children (AtkObject *accessible)
9896{
9897 CajaIconContainer *container;
9898 GtkWidget *widget;
9899 gint i;
9900
9901 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9902 if (!widget)
9903 {
9904 return FALSE(0);
9905 }
9906
9907 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9908
9909 i = g_hash_table_size (container->details->icon_set);
9910 if (container->details->rename_widget)
9911 {
9912 i++;
9913 }
9914 return i;
9915}
9916
9917static AtkObject*
9918caja_icon_container_accessible_ref_child (AtkObject *accessible, int i)
9919{
9920 AtkObject *atk_object;
9921 CajaIconContainer *container;
9922 CajaIcon *icon;
9923 GtkWidget *widget;
9924
9925 widget = gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible))))));
9926 if (!widget)
9927 {
9928 return NULL((void*)0);
9929 }
9930
9931 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (widget)((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((widget)))));
9932
9933 icon = g_list_nth_data (container->details->icons, i);
9934 if (icon)
9935 {
9936 atk_object = atk_gobject_accessible_for_object (G_OBJECT (icon->item)((((GObject*) (void *) ((icon->item))))));
9937 g_object_ref (atk_object)((__typeof__ (atk_object)) (g_object_ref) (atk_object));
9938
9939 return atk_object;
9940 }
9941 else
9942 {
9943 if (i == g_list_length (container->details->icons))
9944 {
9945 if (container->details->rename_widget)
9946 {
9947 atk_object = gtk_widget_get_accessible (container->details->rename_widget);
9948 g_object_ref (atk_object)((__typeof__ (atk_object)) (g_object_ref) (atk_object));
9949
9950 return atk_object;
9951 }
9952 }
9953 return NULL((void*)0);
9954 }
9955}
9956
9957static void

9959 gpointer data)
9960{
9961 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
9962

9966 }

* __s); else __p = g_malloc0_n (__n, __s); __p; }));

9970 accessible_private_data_quark,

__inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r = (!(0)); else __r
= g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t); __r; })))))
9974 {
9975 CajaIconContainer *container;
9976
9977 caja_icon_container_accessible_update_selection

9979
9980 container = CAJA_ICON_CONTAINER (gtk_accessible_get_widget (GTK_ACCESSIBLE (accessible)))((((CajaIconContainer*) (void *) ((gtk_accessible_get_widget (
((((GtkAccessible*) (void *) ((accessible)))))))))));

9995
9996static void
9997caja_icon_container_accessible_finalize (GObject *object)
9998{
9999 CajaIconContainerAccessiblePrivate *priv;
10000 int i;
10001
10002 priv = accessible_get_priv (ATK_OBJECT (object)((((AtkObject*) (void *) ((object))))));
10003 if (priv->selection)
10004 {
10005 g_list_free (priv->selection);
10006 }
10007
10008 for (i = 0; i < LAST_ACTION; i++)
10009 {
10010 if (priv->action_descriptions[i])
10011 {
10012 g_free (priv->action_descriptions[i]);
10013 }
10014 }
10015
10016 g_free (priv);
10017
10018 G_OBJECT_CLASS (accessible_parent_class)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((accessible_parent_class)))))->finalize (object);
10019}

10028
10029static void
10030caja_icon_container_accessible_init (CajaIconContainerAccessible *accessible)
10031{
10032}
10033
10034static void
10035caja_icon_container_accessible_class_init (CajaIconContainerAccessibleClass *klass)
10036{
10037 GObjectClass *gobject_class = G_OBJECT_CLASS (klass)((((GObjectClass*) (void *) ((klass)))));
10038 AtkObjectClass *atk_class = ATK_OBJECT_CLASS (klass)((((AtkObjectClass*) (void *) ((klass)))));
10039
10040 accessible_parent_class = g_type_class_peek_parent (klass);
10041
10042 gobject_class->finalize = caja_icon_container_accessible_finalize;
10043
10044 atk_class->get_n_children = caja_icon_container_accessible_get_n_children;
10045 atk_class->ref_child = caja_icon_container_accessible_ref_child;
10046 atk_class->initialize = caja_icon_container_accessible_initialize;
10047
10048 accessible_private_data_quark = g_quark_from_static_string ("icon-container-accessible-private-data");
10049}
10050
10051#if ! defined (CAJA_OMIT_SELF_CHECK)
10052
10053static char *
10054check_compute_stretch (int icon_x, int icon_y, int icon_size,
10055 int start_pointer_x, int start_pointer_y,
10056 int end_pointer_x, int end_pointer_y)
10057{
10058 StretchState start, current;
10059
10060 start.icon_x = icon_x;
10061 start.icon_y = icon_y;
10062 start.icon_size = icon_size;
10063 start.pointer_x = start_pointer_x;
10064 start.pointer_y = start_pointer_y;
10065 current.pointer_x = end_pointer_x;
10066 current.pointer_y = end_pointer_y;
10067
10068 compute_stretch (&start, &current);
10069
10070 return g_strdup_printf ("%d,%d:%d",
10071 current.icon_x,
10072 current.icon_y,
10073 current.icon_size);
10074}
10075
10076void
10077caja_self_check_icon_container (void)
10078{
10079 EEL_CHECK_STRING_RESULT (check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 0, 0, 0, 0), "0,0:16")do { eel_before_check ("check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 0, 0, 0, 0)"
, "caja-icon-container.c", 10079); eel_check_string_result (check_compute_stretch
(0, 0, 16, 0, 0, 0, 0), "0,0:16"); } while (0);
10080 EEL_CHECK_STRING_RESULT (check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 17), "0,0:17")do { eel_before_check ("check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 17)"
, "caja-icon-container.c", 10080); eel_check_string_result (check_compute_stretch
(0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 17), "0,0:17"); } while (0);
10081 EEL_CHECK_STRING_RESULT (check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 16), "0,0:16")do { eel_before_check ("check_compute_stretch (0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 16)"
, "caja-icon-container.c", 10081); eel_check_string_result (check_compute_stretch
(0, 0, 16, 16, 16, 17, 16), "0,0:16"); } while (0);
10082 EEL_CHECK_STRING_RESULT (check_compute_stretch (100, 100, 64, 105, 105, 40, 40), "35,35:129")do { eel_before_check ("check_compute_stretch (100, 100, 64, 105, 105, 40, 40)"
, "caja-icon-container.c", 10082); eel_check_string_result (check_compute_stretch
(100, 100, 64, 105, 105, 40, 40), "35,35:129"); } while (0);
10083}
10084#endif /* ! CAJA_OMIT_SELF_CHECK */
10085
10086gboolean
10087caja_icon_container_is_layout_rtl (CajaIconContainer *container)
10088{
10089 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), 0)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_228
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_228 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_228 =
0; _g_boolean_var_228; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return (0); } } while (0);
10090
10091 return container->details->layout_mode == CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_T_B_R_L ||
10092 container->details->layout_mode == CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_R_L_T_B;
10093}
10094
10095gboolean
10096caja_icon_container_is_layout_vertical (CajaIconContainer *container)
10097{
10098 g_return_val_if_fail (CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container), FALSE)do { if ((__builtin_expect (__extension__ ({ int _g_boolean_var_229
; if ((((__extension__ ({ GTypeInstance *__inst = (GTypeInstance
*) ((container)); GType __t = (caja_icon_container_get_type()
); gboolean __r; if (!__inst) __r = (0); else if (__inst->
g_class && __inst->g_class->g_type == __t) __r =
(!(0)); else __r = g_type_check_instance_is_a (__inst, __t);
__r; }))))) _g_boolean_var_229 = 1; else _g_boolean_var_229 =
0; _g_boolean_var_229; }), 1))) { } else { g_return_if_fail_warning
(((gchar*) 0), ((const char*) (__func__)), "CAJA_IS_ICON_CONTAINER (container)"
); return ((0)); } } while (0);
10099
10100 return (container->details->layout_mode == CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_T_B_L_R ||
10101 container->details->layout_mode == CAJA_ICON_LAYOUT_T_B_R_L);
10102}
10103
10104int
10105caja_icon_container_get_max_layout_lines_for_pango (CajaIconContainer *container)
10106{
10107 int limit;
10108
10109 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (container))
10110 {
10111 limit = desktop_text_ellipsis_limit;
10112 }
10113 else
10114 {
10115 limit = text_ellipsis_limits[container->details->zoom_level];
10116 }
10117
10118 if (limit <= 0)
10119 {
10120 return G_MININT(-2147483647 -1);
10121 }
10122
10123 return -limit;
10124}
10125
10126int
10127caja_icon_container_get_max_layout_lines (CajaIconContainer *container)
10128{
10129 int limit;
10130
10131 if (caja_icon_container_get_is_desktop (container))
10132 {
10133 limit = desktop_text_ellipsis_limit;
10134 }
10135 else
10136 {
10137 limit = text_ellipsis_limits[container->details->zoom_level];
10138 }
10139
10140 if (limit <= 0)
10141 {
10142 return G_MAXINT2147483647;
10143 }
10144
10145 return limit;
10146}
10147
10148void
10149caja_icon_container_begin_loading (CajaIconContainer *container)
10150{
10151 gboolean dummy;
10152
10153 if (caja_icon_container_get_store_layout_timestamps (container))
10154 {
10155 container->details->layout_timestamp = UNDEFINED_TIME((time_t) (-1));
10156 g_signal_emit (container,
10157 signals[GET_STORED_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP], 0,
10158 NULL((void*)0), &container->details->layout_timestamp, &dummy);
10159 }
10160}
10161
10162static void
10163store_layout_timestamps_now (CajaIconContainer *container)
10164{
10165 GList *p;
10166 gboolean dummy;
10167 CajaIcon *icon = NULL((void*)0);
10168
10169 container->details->layout_timestamp = time (NULL((void*)0));
10170 g_signal_emit (container,
10171 signals[STORE_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP], 0,
10172 NULL((void*)0), &container->details->layout_timestamp, &dummy);
10173
10174 for (p = container->details->icons; p != NULL((void*)0); p = p->next)
10175 {
10176 icon = p->data;
10177
10178 g_signal_emit (container,
10179 signals[STORE_LAYOUT_TIMESTAMP], 0,
10180 icon->data, &container->details->layout_timestamp, &dummy);
10181 }
10182}
10183
10184void
10185caja_icon_container_end_loading (CajaIconContainer *container,
10186 gboolean all_icons_added)
10187{
10188 if (all_icons_added &&
10189 caja_icon_container_get_store_layout_timestamps (container))
10190 {
10191 if (container->details->new_icons == NULL((void*)0))
10192 {
10193 store_layout_timestamps_now (container);
10194 }
10195 else
10196 {
10197 container->details->store_layout_timestamps_when_finishing_new_icons = TRUE(!(0));
10198 }
10199 }
10200}
10201
10202gboolean
10203caja_icon_container_get_store_layout_timestamps (CajaIconContainer *container)
10204{
10205 return container->details->store_layout_timestamps;
10206}
10207
10208void
10209caja_icon_container_set_store_layout_timestamps (CajaIconContainer *container,
10210 gboolean store_layout_timestamps)
10211{
10212 container->details->store_layout_timestamps = (store_layout_timestamps != FALSE(0));
10213}
